title: Tolle Lage, gutes Frühstück inklusive. Schöne große Zimmer.
text:
Schönes Hotel, tolle Lage. Gut ausgestattete Apartments mit Platz ( hatten eines mit 2 Queensize Betten) auch um viele Koffer mitzubringen:-) kleine Küche mit allem was man braucht. Frühstück inklusive war gut. Felix war beim Frühstück sehr aufmerksam und nett. Die Sauberkeit der Zimmer war OK. Die der Dusche amerikanischer Standard. 
Wir würden wieder kommen.

title: Very nice!
text:
This is my fifth time in this hotel with my husband, very nice to be back there. The receptionists are very attentive. I thank everyone there for their attention, Ana Rosário, Giovanni, Miguel and also the friendly Idris. 
The breakfast has gluten-free bread, I just asked the very polite attendants Angelica and Elizabeth  bring it on my table. Many options of fruits and breads.
The room always clean.I also really like the kitchenette, it makes it a lot easier.
They take orders from Amazon.
 I hope to be back soon. Thanks.

title: Everything OK
text: Good location, close to the subway, rooms were OK, occasional problems with the towels. But they were refilled without any problems when asked. Breakfast could be more varied, we Europeans had a hard time with that. Definitely bookable for a vacation, staff very nice.

title: Great NYC experience
text: Great experience and great attention! People working here are really nice and always willing to help. Rooms are very well equipped and big enough. Towels are soft and the pillows are really comfortable. You can send packages to the hotel and they receive them which is really good too.

title: Trendy and spacious rooms, Felix is great
text: This hotel has a very trendy design and nice modern suites that are spacious by Manhattan standards. It does get a bit crowded in the lobby/dining area but the staff is overwhelmingly nice and helpful. Felix in the dining area was especially helpful. The fitness center is also spacious and clean. My only complaint would be the constant presence of Hilton "brand ambassadors" in the lobby selling vacation packages. You feel like you're dealing with fast-talking used car salesmen every time you pass through.

title: Perfect for families
text:
The value for money is unbeatable, especially for Manhattan.
The hotel is an urban hotel with good size rooms. For families it is a very good option.
The reservation includes breakfast, which is very complete and offers, among other things, fresh fruit.
The hotel is very clean and the staff is very nice. Especially Felix and Josstym, who were very friendly at breakfasts.

title: A week in New York
text: Good location, well connected, spacious room with everything you need, very convenient especially having the kitchenette (with NY prices then..)! Very sloppy cleaning. The breakfast room was definitely too small, luckily due to the time zone I got up at dawn and it was still manageable, otherwise forget about sitting down! Average quality and variety of food, I really appreciated the presence of baskets to be able to take something away. Decent value for money

title: Good service
text:
Very nice hotel. The beds were quite comfortable and everyday when we came back in the evening, the cleaning was done nicely.
Everyone was really nice with us : The people at the reception, the servers for the breakfast... Josttyn is one of the nicest.

title: We will repeat
text: Very well located and central. Very practical, since you have a kitchen, you can have lunch or dinner in your room. The breakfast is very complete and generous. All the staff are very friendly, especially Josstn, who is very attentive and friendly during breakfast. You will find him in the dining room.

title: The place to stay in NY
text:
A full and fascinating experience. All perfect, location, breakfast, facilities. And staff very kindly special mention to Félix. All the places to  visit are very close and a lot of places to eat, restaurants, deliverys.
 We Will be back soon.

title: Nicest staff of any hotel I’ve stayed at in years!
text:
This was such a great hotel.  Everyone was kind and attentive.  Clean rooms with all the amenities. Great breakfast (for hotel buffet).  Huge workout room.  
Special shout out to Oliver T. and Shanay for exceptional customer service.  We felt so welcomed and taken care of.

title: Great Location
text: Great Location. Breakfast was outstanding- despite a fully booked hotel, never a line for the breakfast. Staff was very friendly especially Jorge. Rooms were clean though slightly worn. We received waters and cookies as Diamond members

title: Jone Unzueta
text: Josttyn nos atendió muy bien en el desayuno. Muy amable dedicado y atento. La ubicación del hotel es muy buena así como el servicio. Las habitaciones también están muy bien y muy cómodas. Estamos muy contentos, volveremos ! Muchas gracias!!

title: Business trip in NY.
text:
Nice place to stay for a business trip ! ( and holidays as well ) 
Nice clean room and good breakfast. 
Ask « Jessica » at the front desk ! She is exceptional ! She will try to do her best for you in order to have a good stay.
We recommend it …………………………..!

title: Great midtown location
text: This Homewood Suites location was great-so close to Madison Square Garden and easy walking distance to Times Square.  The room was spacious and even had a bigger refrigerator than expected.  Breakfast was good and area nice,  Josttyn was very friendly and helpful.  It’s on a one way street and the parking garage is on the right side of the street across from the hotel a few buildings down.

title: Breakfast every morning and they always have coffee hot chocolate or tea in the lobby
text: Felix was the best very friendly and when he saw that we needed a table he cleaned up the table and gave us the table where we could sit and eat our breakfast and took our plates when we were done very excellent service from Felix in the week that we stayed in New York in this hotel Homewood suites. Appreciate his excellent service

title: Great
text:
Nice and confortable hotel, very nice bed, good shower with good beauty products! very kind staff, especially Jorge, that was especially polite and helpful! Good breakfast, with local and international food. 
Good location close to time square

title: Hotel experience
text: The hotel was nice and comfy.  I loved the hot chocolate and the breakfast. The only problem I had was that the bathroom did not have a door lock.  This could be a problem if a person is coming with a group.  The hotel staff was great.  Josttyn was very attentive and made us feel very welcome.  Great job!

title: Heart of Manhattan - Solid Stay
text:
Great location in the heart of Manhattan. Walking distance to so much at a reasonable rate (at least on this trip). Easy check-in effort with friendly staff. Room was clean and well-maintained. Tight for space, but isn't everything in Manhattan?

Good breakfast buffet that can get crowded so plan ahead and try not to be too crunched for time. 

Solid stay and will likely return again.

title: Amazing
text: The experience at this establishment surpassed all our expectations! From the moment we walked in, we were greeted with an amazing atmosphere and warm hospitality. The staff was incredibly friendly and attentive, ensuring that our every need was met. The service was top-notch, with every detail carefully attended to. The food was simply outstanding, with each dish bursting with flavor and expertly prepared. Every bite was a delight to the senses! The professionalism displayed by the entire team was commendable, making our visit truly enjoyable. Without a doubt, we will be returning again and again, and we can't wait to bring the rest of our family along to share in the experience. This place has earned our highest recommendation, and we can't wait to come back for more unforgettable moments. If you're looking for a fantastic dining experience, look no further—this place has it all!

title: Very good hotel! Recommendable!
text:
Excellent service from Josttin during breakfast, very attentive and cordial, thank you
The gluten-free option is very delicious and I can't find it in any hotel, even
In Miami.
It is the second time I come to this hotel, the first with my son in 2017 and it has improved a lot.

title: Great experience!
text: Very recommended hotel. Great position, very clean and the employees are very available and kind. A great team that works in the restaurant where they prepare breakfast. Especially Josttyn, always very polite, kind and available.

title: It met my expectations
text: Excellent location of the hotel and its services. Very good facilities and cleanliness. Varied breakfast. You can have coffee at any time of the day and even soup at sunset. Our room had a kitchen and even a dishwasher. Felix and Jorge treated us very well in the breakfast room.

title: Recommended
text: Well located hotel, good price-quality ratio. They don't speak Spanish at the reception, which is a bit complicated at first. But in the rest of the areas there are staff who do speak Spanish and are very friendly, especially Jostynn who is at breakfast. He is a very nice person and solved everything for us. A genius!! Thanks Jostynn!!

title: Great service, Jorge is amazing
text:
Breaksfast is amazing
We met a very kind worker, Jorge 
Very friendly and nice! We talked during breakfast and he helped us by speaking in Spanish. Thank you Jorge for being so nice!
Good location and hotel rooms, very spacious. Great service on the lobby, gives you everything you need. 10/10

title: Google expérience with josttyn
text:
Perfect service clean and smiley boy ..like it thanks. Choice vers Good room small but clean .need more choice in breakfast miss ham and cheese .
Our boy in charge Josttyn was perfect .for ou travel in New York. We will come Black here  xxxcxcxcccccccccc ccc

title: Idéal pour visiter Manhattan sur une semaine
text:
Excellent emplacement ! 
Les chambres (la nôtre était une petite très suffisante pour 2) avec cuisine sont très agréable.
Service ménage parfait et personnel très agréable 
Nous avons beaucoup apprécié le chocolat et café à discrétion l’entrée. 
Nous avions lu que c’était compliqué le matin pour le petit déjeuner, c’est vrai que parfois on attend un peu mais jamais plus de 3 ou 4 minutes. Ça n’a pas été un problème pour nos vacances.
Merci à l’équipe !

title: Family Trip
text:
Great staff and location.  All requests were handled quickly and efficiently. 

The breakfast each morning was great!  Jorge was always nice and attentive!  

Having laundry facilities was an added bonus since we were staying for 6 days. 

We can’t wait to return!

title: Felix is the best
text: Felix is truly exceptional. His dedication to service in the dining hall left an indelible impression, showcasing his kindness and tireless work ethic. His commitment to excellence shines through in every task he undertakes, embodying the qualities of a model employee. With his outstanding performance deserving recognition, it's without hesitation that I offer him a glowing review.

title: Best vacation ever
text:
Good breakfast, It varies everyday. 
Justtyn was very helpful and friendly, he offer recommendations regarding few places to visit. 
He made our stay  way better.
100% would recommend. 
Coffee avaliable 24/7 at reception, it's a great plus when your return after a whole day outside in the cold.

title: Great Midtown Hotel
text: This is my new go-to hotel in Manhattan. The Midtown location is convenient to the Theater District and major subway lines. The hotel is clean, the rooms are comfortable and spacious, and the staff is very friendly. Lee texted us daily to ask if we were enjoying our stay and if we needed anything, and Jeffersen was especially helpful at checkout in securely storing our luggage so we could enjoy the day in NYC prior to leaving for the airport.

title: Needs more staff! Good location
text:
For it desk staff were completely overwhelmed by visitors and therefore resulted in lack of information and service upon our arrival. 
Great central location minutes walk from grand central station and Times Square. Breakfast was good enough,  spacious room.

title: Hotel céntrico
text: Hotel confortable y céntrico ideal para familias, limpio y con personal muy servicial en especial Jorge quien nos brindó una atención excelente. El desayuno un poco caótico y poca variedad, lugar muy concurrido y había que esperar a encontrar mesa para poder desayunar sobre todo entre 7.30 y 8.30

title: Excelente servicio
text:
Excelente servicio, amables, las habitaciones son comodas, las almohadas de 10, el desayuno es variado  y rico, y por si fuera poco hay cajitas donde puedes llevar un pequeño lonche para acompañar tus recorridos. 
Josttyn, es amable y siempre al pendiente.

title: Muy bueno todo
text:
Muy bien servicio, Josttin es muy amable y servicial, además de que también habla español, lo cual es de gran ayuda. 
El servicio de desayuno es muy basto además de que te ponen cajitas por si quieres llevar comida para el camino. 
Los cuartos son amplios y con todas las comodidades básicas.

title: Gran atención por parte de Josttyn
text: Las habitaciones muy bonitas y buenas vistas. Todos los dias una gran variedad en los desayunos. Muy buen servicio, limpieza, atención por parte de todo el personal. Josttyn el mejor, una persona que ama a su trabajo y todo el tiempo está con una linda sonrisa

title: frustration due to not fulfilling the reserved and paid rooms
text: We arrived on Saturday, March 9 with two confirmed reservations, a room for 4 people with two queen beds and a room for two people with a king bed. Our surprise was when they gave us two rooms for 3 people, a king bed and a very small sofa, on which 2 people could not sleep. Speaking to the front desk manager, he told us there was nothing he could do to change our room, but I emailed them our confirmed reservation as described at the beginning. I have asked the hotel every day and they have done nothing to give us what we reserved and paid for. That is why I want to record my complaint that the hotel has not fulfilled the reservations that we had confirmed, not enjoying our vacation as we expected and had paid for,

title: One person can ruin an entire experience
text: Our stay was great. Although there is not much of a selection on the tv channels. The staff was super friendly. With the exception of one employee (Lee) who always seemed to have an unnecessary attitude. We stayed there several times and on each occasion her energy was not very pleasant to interact with. It takes less muscles to smile they say. Otherwise we enjoyed our stay. The breakfast was awesome too!

title: Home Suite Midtown Manhattan
text: we had two types of pillows. one was gentle and the other was harder. So everyone can choose their own food. it was very neat and clean. the elevators moved very quickly. There was no long waiting time. Jorge listened to all of our wishes during breakfast. a very nice employee of the hotel.

title: Breakfast Service
text: Josttyn at the breakfast service is one of the best servers I have ever had. Very kind, accommodating, and good with conversation. Great guy overall. Additionally, the beds were comfortable and the service as a whole has been very good. Breakfast was good too!!

title: Great NYC trip (Manhattan and Hilton hotels)
text:
Great Hilton hotel close to everything cool in NYC and with great perks. 
Breakfast was a great add (variety and quality), roof top, gym, business lounge, etc)
We had great service and specially from JOSTTYN who was of great help during our breakfast. Wonderful to find joyful and helpful people.

title: Excellent location, comfortable stay in Midtown Manhatten
text: Location very central and practical. Room correct. Staff friendly and helpful only negative point would be the breakfast choice. Missing simple slice of ham or cheese that isn’t processed, or croissants rather than sugar pasties - shame.

title: Excelente estudia en Hilton asistido de primera por Josttyn
text:
Excelente estadía y servicio en el hotel
Gracias Josttyn!!!
Excelente ubicación y muy cómoda la habitación
Pasamos una excelente semana en familia recorriendo New York
Cerca de times Square y de todos los medios de transporte para moverte por Manhattan

title: El desayuno es un must
text: Es un excelente lugar para viajar en familia, es limpio y práctico. El desayuno es un gran extra, tienen varias opciones y te despreocupas de donde desayunar. Félix fue muy amable y de gran ayuda todos los días durante el desayuno. Gracias a todo el equipo!

title: Loved it!!
text:
The Homewoods suutes in Midtown is a great hotel, superbly located, clean and with extraordinary staff !

Our room was spacious with a kitchen and lots of space for 4 people.

We had super service ! Thanks Felix at the breakfast area and Jessica at the front desk! You've made our stay comfortable and we appreciate it !!

title: 10 days in NYC
text:
Super hotel !
Thanks to Josttyn for Gluten free breakfast and for all 😁. 

L'hôtel est top, bien situé et le personnel est à votre écoute.
Les petits déjeuner sont variés et changent chaque jour. 
Nous étions venus pour des vacances en famille..

title: Great customer service
text: Great customer service by Jackson. Share great tips on what to do and see while on our visit. Very friendly and personable. Provided excellent Wednesday afternoon special for a rainy day to help lift the spirits of all the guests. He clearly is proud of his work.

title: Séjour parfait pour notre première fois à NYC !
text:
Le personnel est très agréables et gentils,
Je vous conseille cet hôtel
Surtout josttyn qui est toujours là aux petits soins
Lieu très bien localisé, à deux pas de Times Square et les petits déjeuners sont terribles ! Il y a tout ce qu'il faut pour bien démarrer sa journée, sachant que le café et les boissons sont accessibles toute la journée pour notre bien,
Les chambres sont assez grandes et propres,

title: Great experience
text:
The Homewood suites hotel is comfortable to reach everywhere, the room is clean with all the comfort and quiet.
Great services, laundry and gym area are perfect for use! 
We appreciate the breakfast corner and the service and kindness of Josttyn.

title: Un très bon hôtel ! Je recommande
text: Un super hôtel situé au près de tout ! L’hôtel est très bien isolé avec un bon personnel ! Je vous recommande Josttyn, toujours à l’accueil des clients puis toujours souriant ! Le petit dej est top et vous pouvez même emporter dans votre chambre !

title: Poor services, many clients
text:
Strategical position in Manhattan, but with many problems such as: 
breakfast very very poor!!! Quality and quantity understimated, with dedicate space understimated too!!!!
Elevators where you can spend more than half hour before to reach the floor.

So an hotel with too much people, no able or designed to manage the high Numbers of clients

title: Great place to stay in New York
text: This hotel was very nice and the staff was great! We got there early and they did there best to get us in early! We even received late checkout to accommodate us! We also signed up for Hilton Honors and got great points. Dave even asked us how our stay was and what they could do to make things better!

title: Great location and stay
text: Room was quiet and housekeeping was great. Location is good and convenient to many attractions. Staff was very nice. Spoke with Dave upon checkout. Very courteous and welcoming. I have stayed here many times before and will more than likely be back for our next trip. Love that I have a small kitchenette for leftovers and beverages.

title: El casi hotel perfecto...
text:
Todo estuvo muy bien, el desayuno, la habitación, la cama y vistas.
Pero al llegar todo era un desastre, llegamos a las 3 de la madrugada y nos dijieron que no nos podrían dar nuestra habitación, incluso nos llegamos a sentir discriminados, sin duda deberían decirle al personal que entienda que hay gente que viene de un viaje que dura más de un día y no nos pueden llegar y decir que la habitación se entrega a las 4 de la tarde, y si queríamos dormir que nos vayamos a otro hotel.
El hotel nos costó 300 Dólares y solo lo ocupamos 6 horas

title: NY
text:
It was a very good experience, the services was so good, and the our room was so clean and with all the comfortable  and the position is good, very nice to times Square 
Josttym took care of us and he was fun 
I’ll come back as soon as possibile 
Thank you so much

title: PARFAIT
text: idéalement placé, Time square , ESB et autres visites à pied ! le métro à coté. Les chambres sont confortables, bien équipées, propres, bonne literie, une kitchenette complète la chambre ; petits déjeuners variés et copieux, on peut même composer sa box pour piquer niquer la journée! un roof top avec vue incroyable, le staff est au petit soin pour la clientèle. foncez sans hésiter,  enfin merci à JOSTTYN pour son accueil!

title: Best customer service ever!!!
text: All of the staff was absolutely wonderful.  Karen, Dewayne and Donnaven went over the top to assist me. They were polite professional and very helpful.  I will  always stay at this property when I am in NYC.  The suites are absolutely beautiful 😍

title: Homewood suites unpleasant experience
text: My family and I arrived early on March 2, 2024 and wanted to ask questions regarding early check in or where to leave our luggages. At the front desk at that time was Miguel Briones Flores operations manager was rude. I said excuse me the response was yea? His demeanor and the way he responded is definitely not a manager… his attitude is unbecoming of a Hilton employee. And everyone at the front desk looked miserable. The room we stayed in is spacious enough but the employees look miserable… Homewood suites is one of the least expensive hotels in the city but employees are rude and miserable

title: Awesome spot at the center of Manhattan
text: The hospitality at the hotel was exceptional, and I must commend Felix, Josttyn, and Jorge from the hotel staff for their outstanding service. Their attentiveness and assistance truly made my stay memorable. Their friendly demeanor and willingness to assist with any request made me feel welcomed and valued as a guest. I highly recommend this hotel to anyone seeking exceptional service and a memorable experience.

title: Found a new Great Place to stay while in Manhattan
text:
I recently traveled to new York-Manhattan and stayed at the Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY.  

My usualy Hilton brand hotel was closed permantely so I needed to find a new Hilton brand to stay at while in Manhattan.  I will admit that I can be picky about where I stay and Hilton hotels usually never let me know.  And this time it was true again.

I must give kidos to the staff, especially Charlene at the front desk.  I called the hotel and spoke to Charlene a few days before my arrival. I have a few questions for about rooms, room locations, etc. She was great when speaking to her and she assured me I would like their hotel and locations.  

Upon my arrival Charlene was at the front desk and checked me in.  She remembered speaking to be a few days before and was just a joy!!  She was right, my room was great, the service is excellent and the breakfast is really good every morning.  Charlene has a great attitude!

I also want to give kudos to Lee and Donovan at the Front desk.  Whenever they say me that asked if I needed anything.  I appreciate the attention to service.

I will say that this hotel due to locations is very busy. Sometimes you have to wait for the elevators during peak times.  Other than that, it's all good!

The loacation of this hotel is perfect if you want to be in the Times Square area and just a couple blocks from Mavy's and other great shopping.  There are so many good restaruants to eat in the area it will be hard to pick where to go. :)

All in all, I have found my new place to stay when I am in Manhattan!!  Give this hotel a try when in Manhattan :)

title: Attention and care
text:
The clean Space and all the facilities was great. Good breakfast and attention all time. 
Karin was super helpful. The hotel is very close to Times Square and has good space in the rooms. A diversified meal on breakfast and elevator for the rooms. There is no carpet which is awesome.

title: Outstanding stay.  Great customer service. Clean spaces. Very responsive to requests.  Thank you Homewood Suites.
text: Our stay at Homewood Suites was outstanding!   Donnoven, the front desk attendant, provided a wonderful first impression of the facility.  He was welcoming, knowledgable and very enthusiastic.  After multiple positive interactions with Donnoven, I shared my appreciation with management.  Our entire stay was perfect due to Donnoven and several other delightful staff members.  Five star service! *****

title: Trip over the pond
text:
Joshua was really helpful in getting me gluten free bagels in the morning. 
All staff were really friendly greeting us each day . Only downside was how busy breakfast area was in morning if your not an early riser and head to breakfast at 8am there usually was no tables to sit at so ended up taking breakfast back to room.

title: Great staff and excellent room and location
text: I want to start by giving five stars to the staff. Charlene at the front desk was there with a brilliant smile every day. Her cheery helpful attitude made my stay very special. I felt like I was greeting a family member!  And she was so efficient ordering cabs, providing suggestions, etc. Jessica was excellent also. It was so convenient to grab breakfast in the hotel and even bring it to the room which had a frig microwave even a stove. We could bring leftovers from dinner and snack the next day. It was within walking distance to theatres although as a senior I cabbed it some of the time. It was a home away from home.

title: February holidays
text: Thank you Josttyn for your helpful and kindness. Hope I will comeback soon in this hotel. The staff are great and the service is very helpful and good. We appreciate the emplacement in the city. It’s our fourth time in New York and it’s always a great experience and pleasure to come. See you soon

title: Feels exactly like it’s grand opening
text:
I have stayed at this hotel many times since it opened almost ten years ago. It is clean and the staff is very friendly.  It  feels modern and well maintained. 
It is in an area convenient to Times Square and the subway. You are only 4 avenues from the Hudson River if you want to explore that area. 
Always happy to return to this Hilton property!

title: Todo hermoso
text:
Excelente todo! Segunda vez que lo elegimos para nuestra visita a NYC
Buena ubicación,  el mejor desayuno lejos y sus cajitas para llevar son incomparables. 
Todo el personal es muy atento y servicial.
Volveremos !!!!!!!!
Felix, el mejor!!

title: Muy recomendable
text: Excelente ubicacion e instalaciones. El desayuno super completo. Las habitaciones comodas y limpias.  Queremos resaltar la atencion de Pedro, Josttyn y Felix y del resto del equipo que siempre estuvieron a nuestra disposicion para solucionarnos cualquier necesidad que se nos presentaran.

title: Nice place to stay
text: Nice accommodations and amenities. The breakfast buffet is really nice, fruits are good and fresh. We love the hot beverage service 24/7. The style of the hotel is casual fashion. Service is excellent. Special mention to the waiter Felix for his kind attention to us.

title: Not all that is cracked up to be
text:
Only thing worth staying with this hotel is the coffee and watermelon.
Room looks tired 
The promise u a room then give u a room not worth the value of points.
Breakfast isn’t worth it, go pay for something outside this hotel.
Couldn’t get to hotel due to work on road area, boom crane in the way.
Not a good location, should have paid more or less money a block down the street

title: Jorge being nice
text: Jorge was very nice and respectful. He helped me with where to go and told me more about the hotel. Great Guy! He showed us where the good breakfast was and talked to us about boston because we related to that subject. overall a great guy and very helpful in all aspects.

title: Great service
text: Josttyn was a wonderful server and very welcoming. He helped us get food for our special needs daughter and even spoke Spanish with my daughters who are learning the language. What a great employee and so hard working!!  The food was delicious and even though there were a lot of guests, I didn’t feel rushed and everything was so clean. We have stayed here before and came back for many reasons. The breakfast was definitely a reason why we returned.

title: Josthyn y felix
text: EL HOTEL HASTA EL MOMENTO HA SIDO EXTRAORDINARIO, EL DESAYUNO RIQUÍSIMO, JOSTHYN Y FELIX EL TRATO HA SIDO A OTROS NIVELES, SIEMPRE TAN ATENTO, SON SERVICIALES, EDUCADOS, SI NECESITAS ALGO SIEMPREN ESTAN DISPUESTO AYUDAR. GRACIAS POR HACER MIS VACACIONES MEJORES

title: Great hotel, would recommend.
text: Customer service was excellent. Room service is very good. Love the breakfast would like some variation. What was awesome was the 24hr hot water, tea and coffee. After a long cold walk outside nothing better to lift your spirits. Jorge was very helpful at breakfast. All other staff are excellent.

title: Good Hotel
text: fijn verblijf en goede bediening. vlak bij times square. goed op loop afstand van alle bezieningswaardigheden. genoeg eet plekjes. vriendelijk personeel. alle faciliteiten zijn binnen het hotel. ook een sportschool. kortom een top verblijf om het centrum van new york te bezichten

title: Excelente hotel
text:
Todo excelente.
Muy limpio, muy buena atencion, estrategicamente ubicado.
El desayuno muy variado, a ciertas horas es un poco dificil conseguir mesa, pero se puede desayunar en la barra del lobby junto al fogon
Excelente la atencion de Felix

title: Gran hotelpor el precio
text:
Todo el hotel perfecto. Servicio excelente, gran desayuno en especial joysttyn super atento a la limpieza de las mesas.
Gran ubicacion cerca de tido cerca del metro azul y de muchas atracciones turisticas de manhattan. Excelente lugar para hispedarse.

title: Buon rapporto qualità/prezzo
text:
Buona posizione, buona accoglienza e camera grande (con terrazzo), silenziosa e pulita. Letto molto comodo. Bagno comodo con unica pecca la mancanza di un flessibile amovibile nella doccia. Mi hanno detto che solo le camere per disabili ne sono dotate.  Struttura pulita e curata. Pulizia della camera e cambio asciugamani quotidiani. Molto comodo e ben accessoriato l'angolo cottura. La colazione... nell'insieme buona ma molto caotica e con posti insufficienti nella sala da pranzo e di conseguenza i clienti consumano la colazione anche sui tavoli e sui divani della hall. C'è comunque la possibilità di portare in camera la colazione. 
Ci sono degli homeless fuori dall'Hotel ( ci sono quasi ovunque a NY..) ma non danno nessun fastidio. 
Sono stata altre volte a NY in alberghi di categoria superiore nei quali non tornerei e devo dire che nell'insieme le dimensioni della camera e la pulizia hanno supplito ad altre piccole mancanze. Ci tornerò.

title: Trato agradable de felix
text:
Felix fue muy amable con nosotras en el desayuno. Muy atento y agradable. Nos facilitó mucho encontrar platos, tazas y demás. 
Buscamos el chocolate para le leche y no lo encontramos, él se dio cuenta enseguida y nos lo facilitó. Ojalá todo el servicio del hotel fuese así.

title: Great hotel in NY
text: Great place to stay. The price was good. The rooms are fine. The elevators always are crowded so you have to wait too much. Felix in the breakfast area give us a great service. The breakfast is very good, bagel, toast, fruit, coffee, hot chocolate, tea, pancakes, is really good.

title: Very good
text: The hotel is very good. It’s clean and comfortable mattresses. Perfectly located.  We're a 10-minute walk from Times Square. The breakfast is excellent. We have a lot of choice. The hotel staff are friendly and welcoming, especially Josttyn :)

title: A great hotel in a great city
text: Everything was fantastic! The staff, the room. Wonderful the possibility of having a box with some food to face the cold while visiting this amazing city. The area is excellent as well. Subway, train station .... Times Square in ten minutes walking. Special mention to Jorge and Oliver, great people! I feel like home. I highly recommend the hotel. Thanks a lot for being so kind!

title: Muy bueno
text: Muy buena ubicación, un poco colapsado el hotel pero nada imposible de sortear. Muy bien atendidos por Josttyn, se acercó muy amable y predispuesto. Nos asistió en todo lo que necesitábamos. Rico el desayuno y va variando. Lo único una de la recepcionistas muy mala onda, grosera  y no hizo esfuerzo por hablar en español

title: Brilliant place
text: Good location to get to most places of interest and to get some snacks from the very near “7 eleven” also service has a good standard. Josttym was our waiter, he was so polite and caring when serving us and so attentive. I would recommend to come here I needing a hotel.

title: Great location
text: Perfect location, and staff very friendly. Rooms were of a good standard, quality and size, with only part that could be crazy was the breakfast  at certain times. Staff like Josttyn do a great job keeping the food replenished and the tables cleaned down. Would come back

title: Visita familiar
text:
Excelente atención! Destaco la atención de josttyn y de Oliver! Siempre muy atentos! Atentos a las necesidades de los clientes! 
Las habitaciones son muy cómodas! Muy completas! El desayuno está muy bien!, hay cosas diferentes algunos días!

title: Excelente y céntrico lugar
text:
Gran lugar, cuentan con muchas comodidades para hacer tu estadía una gran experiencia, destaco la atención de Josttyn, muy preocupado y atento. Nos dio algunos tips para conocer y hablaba español, además de inglés. 
Además es muy centrico y puedes ir caminando a todos lados

title: Excelent
text: The buffet is excellent and Josttin is the best. His Service was exceptional! I like the experience very much , because i feel like home . The food is delicious and the Service at room too. I like to come back in next oportunity. Bye bye , i ll recomend the hotel

title: Great place
text: Came with my family on February and the Homewood was really good news. Great breakfast service. The food is good and all the staff is really kind. Josttyn is just amazing! Romos are confortable, elevators are quick and every common lounge is big  and couzy. We'll be back. 👏👏👏👏

title: Reseña
text:
Felix es una persona super atenta, estuvo el miercoles en el horario del desayuno ayudando a todos en todo momento. MUY ATENTO atendiendo las necesidades de todos en el hotel con buen humor y buena predisposicion.
Por mas Felixs trabajando

title: Muy bien
text:
El desayuno bastante bien.El camarero Josttyn nos atendió perfecto, muy pendiente y atento.
Al tanto de todo, reponiendo rápido lo que se acababa. 
Las habitaciones amplias y las camas cómodas. Ducha con agua caliente perfecto.
Bien situado.

title: Some issues but response and service is why we’ll be back.
text:
Second time staying here…will stay here again.

Had some minor issues with the room and each time the Front Desk and Maintenance personnel responded promptly to fix the issue.

My last night, we got some hot chocolate from the front desk area - and I was looking for some ice to cool down the piping hot drink.  Oliver T. Went out of his way to get me a cup of ice and visited with us for several minutes.  He asked where we were w from and asked if we needed anything…didn’t have to, but did and made us feel welcome.

title: Perfect location and kind people
text: La estancia en el hotel fue un éxito. La habitación perfecta para 3 personas, todo super limpio. La ubicación es muy buena y el trato del personal fue muy amable. En especial Félix, durante el desayuno. Félix se preocupaba porque estuviera todo perfecto.

title: NY
text:
Both Oliver T and Donnavon went out of the way to make our stay  at The Homeward Suits Midtown more enjoyable.

Donovan helped navigate transportation, and helped me with many room keys. All supplied the necessities needed to keep our room clean.
Thank you gentlemen

title: Great service
text:
Lovely helpful employee called Jorge.
Couldn’t be more helpful at breakfast.
Clean room great view. Hotel súper central.
Coffee needs changing as it’s week, only thing I have negative to say.
Little bit to hot in the hotel on the floors by the lifts :)  I suppose it better warm than cold.

title: A great stay
text: Joshua gave great customer service. He supplied anything I needed, and answered any questions I had being it was my first time staying here. I was taken care of very well while staying here. Definitely would come back again and recommend it to my peers. Can’t wait to come back again in the future

title: Feb in NY
text: Great location close to everything we wanted to see.  Nice room, tasty breakfast and very helpful staff.  Felix and Pedro were very nice and gave us a good service .  Over all, it was a great experience and next time we will choose homewood suites.

title: The best hotel in NYC!
text: I love this hotel, so much, it is clean,  close to the attractions, every time that I come to New York I stay here!  The service is good, especially in the food area. There was a guy named Jousttyn, who was amazing helping us.! I highly recommen this place, you won’t regret it.!

title: Amazing hotel
text: I came from Poland for vacation with my mother and sister. The hotel was clean, well-kept and in a very good location, everything we needed was very close. The hotel offers breakfasts which were very good, the breakfast service was very nice and helpful, especially Felix and Josttyn.

title: Un equipo muy atento
text: La experiencia en el desayuno con Josttyn fue muy buena, atendió a mi familia con calidez y amabilidad. Su servicio fue muy cuidado y estuvo atento a cada necesidad. En general siempre lo vi conversar con cada huésped intentando saber sus necesidades y ofreciéndoles su apoyo, alegre y de buena actitud, un excelente trabajador. Asimismo, el supervisor también estuvo en la entrada del desayuno cada mañana, preguntándonos qué tal estaba todo. Nos recibieron con sopa caliente, cada detalle contó. Muy agradecidos por la super experiencia.

title: Fun
text: The beds are nice and soft, nice service and the breakfast is amazing. The location is right in manhattan and is very close to all the shops and time square. Jorge gave us the best experience while eating the nicest breakfast, you should give him a pay rise.

title: NY 2024
text: Todo fantástico en el hotel y fuera de el, Nueva York es una ciudad impresionante que merece una visita al menos una vez en la vida y en este hotel tendrás todo lo necesario para vivir esa experiencia. Un saludo en especial a Félix, muchas gracias por todo lo que hiciste por nosotros!!

title: Amazing hotel with friendly staff
text: Very impressed with the overall hotel, room is really good! The staff is very friendly specially Josttyn who clean all the tables in the breakfast and paid attention on everything me and my mom needed. The front desk was always helpful and even had a social with food on Wednesday. Recommend 10/10 and will stay here more times.

title: Great experience
text:
We came for a week to visit NYC.
We found in this hotel a very friendly staff, especially Josttyn and Felix who were very helpful.
The rooms were large enough for a family of 4 and in general was a great experience.
NYC is a dream that came true. We'll definitely come back.

title: Very good
text:
Muy bueno el hotel y la atención en general muy buen en servicio en general de la comida y jostyn muy buena predisposición y sevicio excelte  y atención  predisposición y calidad la ubicación del hotel muy buena
El desayuno excelente confortable clisa atención muy buen recibimiento

title: Vacaciones en Nueva York!
text:
Excelente servicio! Gran ubicación y el desayuno con la opción de las cajas para llevarse algo para el día es lo mejor. Un especial reconocimiento a Josttyn en el desayuno!
La habitación muy linda y la limpieza también. El acceso al hotel te recibe con café o chocolate caliente... muy bueno para los días de frío

title: Convenient studio suites in the middle of Garment District
text:
Stayed here for a few nights and it was a decent experience. Booked direct and was able to check-in and select my suite directly from the Hilton app. 

Upon arrival, managed to bypass the front desk and operate the lift using the digital key from the Hilton app. There are 3 speedy lifts for the 22 floor building. 

The 1 King suite itself was spacious, featuring a full kitchen with crockery and hood, dish washer, fridge, and microwave. The loo was spacious and featured Hilton's latest toileteries attached to the wall. Water pressure in the shower was weak and the towels were thick and fluffy. 

The TV inside the suite had premium business channels although the signal would cut in and out. There is a wardrobe in the suite that also features an iron, ironing board, along with an in-room safe. The "desk" for the suite was a touch counterintuiative as it was hard working with such a big TV by one's forehead.

There was a seating area in living area that turned into a sofabed. The mattress was a lower end bonnell spring mattress and the blankets were quite warm. The mattress was a touch worn out as there were pretty huge indents from heavy usage.

The HVAC system was quiet and the A/C kicked on periodically as the suite got pretty warm, especially mid-afternoon.

Within the property, there is a rooftop garden on the 22nd floor. In addition, there is a laundry room and gym within the building as well. There is complimentary breakfast that is served every morning.

The convenience store on site has a variety of goods available for sale although the prices on the wall do not correspond to the prices of the goods as an employee informed me. Caveat emptor for those making purchases from the on-site convenience store. Definitely validate the price of items and perhaps even ask for a receipt before stepping away.

There are hand sanitizer stations throughout the lobby.

Housekeeping does drop by daily as a stayover, although it's a rather quick service of rubbish disposable, towel replacement, and quick bed making.

title: Front desk personnel get a 10 out of 10
text: Check-in was very smooth. Jefferson and Gio answered all of our questions and were super friendly. We were surprised how accommodating they both were.    amazing service.!!!!!! We will definitely come back to this hotel.  The room was clean and surprisingly pretty quiet.

title: Agréable séjour à New York.
text: Personnelles très à l'écoute Raphi nous a bien accueilli et conseillé, bon petit déjeuner Jossttym c'est bien occupé de nous , on peut prendre à emporter . Les chambres spacieuses la climatisation fait un  peu de bruit mais on s'habitue. Chambres faites tout les jours.  Je recommande.

title: Bonne expérience
text:
L’emplacement de l’hôtel est très bien Bon accueil, le petit déjeuner valable, par contre les chambres, la ventilation était trop froide ou trop chaude et trop bruyante
Par contre pour se déplacer, c’est pas très explicite au niveau des métros et des bus
Le personnel est accueillant et serviable et merci à JOSTTYM

title: Homewood Suites Midtown 02/2024
text: We had exemplary service at the Homewood Suites, especially at the morning buffet. A young gentleman server by the name of Jost T Ym was attentive and professional, a credit to the hotel. He always seemed very approachable and friendly. He made our trip to NYC a bit more pleasurable.

title: We had a great breakfast thanks to Josttym.
text: I was worried about the hotel before I came because it is a family trip with children. But it turned out it was unnecessary when we stepped into a spacious room. Staffs were all nice when we asked something. Breakfast was always good and staffs made us more happy.

title: Excelente
text: Muy bien servicio, Josttyn  !!!! Nos atendió muy cordial, perfecta ubicación. Buena ayuda de todo el personal, tiene cocina y está cerca de todo. Nos atendieron muy bien en el desayunador al igual que tiene gym y también centro de negocios. Muy buena experiencia

title: Visita a NY❤️ con family
text:
Hotel molto comodo ed efficiente nel cuore di Manhattan, camere grandi confortevoli e con ogni attrezzatura, personale gentilissimo! Grazie a Josttyn che si è dimostrato molto gentile! 
La colazione potrebbe essere migliorabile …ma abbiamo soggiornato molto bene 👍

title: Good employees
text:
Mainly giving this Hotel 5 stars due to their employee Jorge! He was helpful and sweet during our interactions at Breakfast!
It's only our second day out of a week long trip, and he is the first person I have had a entire conversation with. So thanks Jorge for making our stay that much better!!

title: Super recomendable 100% Muy bien ubicado. Cerca del metro y de la zona top de NY. Excelente para ir con niños! Gracias!!
text:
Excelente la atención y servicio de todos. En especial Jorge en el sector del desayuno!!! Un capo total !!!
También Félix y Jostum 
Siempre todos predispuestos a ayudar y hacer de nuestra estadía lo mejor
La limpieza de la habitación 100% !!!

title: Great area, great service, great time…great experience!
text: The area was great and all of the staff were amazing! Felix and the other gentleman helped us get  situated during breakfast and they really went out of their way to make sure we had everything we needed. The rooms were spacious and the housekeeping staff did a great job! We will definitely be staying here again whenever we’re in the area…thank you!

title: Very goog
text: Everything was good but especially the great and charming attendance from Josttyn during breakfast. He not only help us with cleaning and stuff but also he treated us amazing. Moreover, the place and the whole vibe is great. Definitly the stuff of the hotel make a great place to stay.

title: On vacation in New York
text:
The room is complete with fridge and cook top. In addiction, very comfortable and attendance is very nice!
I totally recommend this place! The breakfast has a variety as fruit, breads and sweets.
The localization is another positive point, near from Time Square.

title: Un séjour new yorkais parfait !
text:
Cet hôtel est top. Il est situé parfaitement. 
Le petit déjeuner est très bien tous les matins. Le personnel est très agréable, notamment l’accueil chaleureux de Josttym et Félix qui nous ont accueillis tous les matins.
Je garde un très bon souvenir et je recommande !

title: Great service
text:
Dear Homewood team,

We are staying for a week with you and have enjoyed our stay and the friendliness of the staff. We met Pedro at breakfast and he was awesome. He made us a custom breakfast sandwich. He really made the experience special !

All the best,

Joël and Kate

title: Highly recommend!
text: Thoroughly enjoyed our stay at this hotel. It was very centrally located to all of the activities we had planned while in the city. Every staff member we encountered was wonderful and they texted us multiple times during our 3 night stay to check on us and to make sure all was well. We have not experienced that with other Hilton properties and it was a nice touch. The room was very clean and had more room than we expected for a room in NYC. The breakfast was great with a lot of variety and they did a great job of replenishing during busy periods. We will definitely stay here again when we return!

title: Great attention
text: Al the staff was very attentive since I checked in. Shoutout to Josttym who was so helpful in the restaurant. I enjoyed the service during my stay. I had an internet conexion issues and the person through the phone was also very helpful. thanks

title: Felix!
text: Felix is the best housekeeper! He is so kind and nice ! Thanks for everything Felix! I recommand Felix as housekeeper because he is always available and do everything to make you happy of your stay in the hotel! Thank you Felix I hope to see you again !

title: Buen servicio
text: Josttym fue muy amable. Estuvo muy atento durante todo el desayuno. Al igual que su compañero Jorge. Hemos estado una semana alojados y sin duda repetiríamos. Un servicio muy bueno. El personal del desayuno encantador. Opción de preparar almuerzo. Un acierto.

title: Buen servicio
text:
JOSTTYM muy buen servicio en el restaurante al igual que su compañero Jorge, muy atentos. 
El hotel muy bien situado y con unas instalaciones perfectas, el desayuno es buffet y puedes preparar un picnic para llevarte. 
Por destacar algo negativo es que éramos 5 en la habitación y solo había sábanas para 4 y toalla para 4

title: Very Friendly Staff
text: Great location, only 10 minutes walking from Penn Station, we walked to all the main attractions in Midtown, even to Central Park.  There is no concierge but the staff is very helpful, Donnaven, a very friendly young man was always ready to give us some precious information.

title: Très bon séjour
text: Good welcome, well taken care of, the staff was very friendly and the room was perfect. I will come back with pleasure! The hotel is very well located not far from Times Square, 5 or 6 minutes walk. There is everything near by to get around to eat and enjoy the city

title: Mixed Feelings
text:
The efficency studios at this property - though in need of some TLC already-  quite possibly have everything you might need for a stay longer than three nights, so I would definitely consider it if I needed to stay for a week (kitchenette fully equipped etc)  They are maintained very clean by a dedicated housekeeping staff. 
There are  conveniences like laundry facilities  -also in need of some TLC-  on site, which also cater to longer  stays and breakfast in included in the rate.  It's OK, nothing to write home about; It is exactly the same stuff served by any other  Hampton Inn.   

This said, as a Hilton Honors Diamond Member I was a bit disapointed by some of the staff at front desk, rather dismissive and uninterested.
- specifically  this one sassy young girl with short redish hair who reminded me of  Merryl Streep on the "Devil Wears Prada"-  Her no eye contact, no thank you, no hope you feel better after noticing I bought the whole convenience store  worth of flu medication... made me giggle but gave me  zero of the hospitable, warm and welcoming vibe you kind of expect under this circumstances.

Who knows, maybe the flu had me overly sensitive.... or the stay was not  all that memorable, so she just stood out that much...

Anyways, If I went back I would make sure to get a unit facing the front of the bulding because mine faced the back and it felt dark and depressing. 
Yes, it was  also a bit disappointing they would put a valued member in a dark, cold depressing efficiency in the back... nothing in the front?  Maybe a higher floor?   Nope.  
Maybe  spending 90 nights a year on Hilton properties does not get you much recognition here either.  Hey, it's good to know.

title: Boa relação qualidade-preço
text:
Hotel muito central e com bom uma boa relação qualidade-preço. Nada de luxos, simples e confortável. O quarto onde fiquei não tinha alcatifa.
O pequeno-almoço é variado e há boxes para podermos trazer alguns alimentos/snacks do pequeno-almoço connosco.
A equipa é, de uma maneira geral, simpática. Destaco o Jorge e o Josttyn, sempre atenciosos e disponíveis para ajudar.
Caso regresse a NY, este hotel será novamente uma opção.

title: Je recommande
text:
L’hôtel est très propres.
Le personnel du petit déjeuner est très sympathique surtout Josttyn.
Dommage qu’il n’y ai pas de Pancakes tous les jours c’est ce que je préfère au petit déjeuner.
Bien placé, proche de Times Square.
Petit plus, dépôt de bagages gratuits

title: Great family hotel!
text: Josttyn was so helpful.  Hotel was great with room for 5 of us!  Breakfast was very was very good.  The room was very clean and perfect for us.  Hotel was safe and easy to use.  We hope to come back to visit again soon.  For this trip we brought our kids, so this was the perfect place for us.

title: Muy bien
text: Servicio excelente de Adriana, soy celíaca y mi padre también y en todo momento ha estado atenta de nosotros y nos ha brindando una excelente experiencia en el desayuno 😊 La ubicación del hotel es perfecta al lado de times square y de la parada del metro

title: This hotel is everything you need :)
text: Love the stay! The hotel is very well located, the rooms are comfortable, breakfast are delicious and the view from the 22nd floor tarace is so nice. The staff is very kind and helpful. Thank you Josttym for being there for us anytime :):):):)

title: Momentum and synergy was captivating.
text: My family and I had a wonderful stay at your Homewood suite hotel located in Manhattan!  Annabelle was a great source of energy, she accommodated us to our stay!  We both spoke and I told her that I was excited to stay at this location and me and my family look forward to visiting this same location in the future.

title: Estupendo hotel en el Centro de Manhattan Times Square
text:
Nos hemos alojado en este Hotel y la experiencia ha sido buenísima. Todo el personal, Dave, Félix, Jorge y algún nombre que se me escapa nos han resuelto dudas y nos han ayudado en todo momento. Limpieza excelente, buffet de desayuno completo. Sin duda repetiremos. Un saludo y agradecimiento para todo el Personal.
Jaime Peris (room 414)

title: Nice but not fantastic
text:
Same food every day, too many eggs and too many potatoes. Rooms without wardrobes and without a table to eat.
Unparalleled, however, availability and courtesy of the staff. We particularly thank josttyn as he was very attentive to our needs, doing everything to satisfy us

title: Limoea
text: Justin é um excelente atendente, sempre preocupado em nos oferecer a melhor experiência. Além disso,  o hotel está sempre limpo e organizado, com  todas as instalações funcionando  perfeitamente.  Como estamos viajando em família, pedimos para ficar no mesmo andar e fomos prontamente atendidos.

title: Great folks at Homewood Midtown!
text: Our trip to NYC was made even more awesome by the professional, efficient, and super friendly service we recieved rom Oliver T. and rest of the staff at Homewood Suites Midtown ... perfect location, great lobby, helpful front desk folks, and modern, clean rooms.

title: Great location and hotel
text: Loved the location of this hotel! It was in the middle of everything and great food. We could walk to most popular sights, Times Square, Radio City Hall, Empire State Building and lots more. Subway was close by. The staff were friendly and helpful. They always had coffee, tea and hot chocolate available. Breakfast was busy but good. Lots of choices. We felt very safe in this location. Felix was especially friendly and helpful! Room was a good size and clean

title: Muy recomendable
text:
Para mi lo mejor del hotel la ubicación y la atención del personal, muchas gracias Jorge por tu amabilidad.
Lo peor fue la nevera de la habitación que a ratos era muy ruidosa.
Es una opción muy recomendable, relación calidad-precio siendo New York muy bien

title: Nice hotel but ..
text:
This hotel off Times Square shares a lobby and breakfast room with its Hilton siblinng Hampton Inn. The rooms are new and extremely well laid out. They did not feel New York small boastes fridge, microwave dishes and dishwasher.   Rooms are quiet- well soundproofed. Table and desk that fold in out. Room is not well lit.  BIGGEST ISSUE- shades do not truly block light from flashing Times Square billboard.  To much light comes in the side of he shade. Bathroom is tight- one person only.

Breakfast loud and noisy. Not worth the calories but it is included.  Other issue when I was there, only one entry door was open and smokers congregated there.

title: Great lobby
text: Enjoyed our breakfast by the fire in the Homer western themed lobby! Bill was a friendly server who kept the area stocked & clean. He gave us advice on best times to go to Yellowstone. Great Mountain View from our spacious room!

title: I felt at home and it's about an 8-minute walk from Time Square.
text: Jos TT4m and  Felix housekeeping and busboy They helped us at breakfast and were very kind in helping us by talking to their boss to get us another night at the hotel because at the last minute we decided to stay another night and they told us that it was full, but Jos and Félix listened and helped us by talking to His boss is all very friendly.  and they offered us more clean towels. Besides, when we arrived the receptionist gave me some cookies for my Shih Tzu dog, that was cute. I give it a 10/10

title: Don't touch that phone
text: I stayed with my family from August 29th to September 5th at this property and I must say that, as already done on the Agoda website, I wrote an excellent review, in all respects; all this immediately upon my return to Italy, except that after a few days I found myself having a charge of around $110 on my credit card; I didn't immediately understand what it was about and I decided to ask for information by writing to the hotel concerned, especially since nothing was told to me at the time of check-out. After several communications (they couldn't find my reservation) I was told that I was charged $110 for 6 phone calls (actually made by me) lasting approximately 1 minute each made in Italy to my elderly parents; There was no point in pointing out the exorbitant nature of these costs, this is the hotel's policy! At least write down the costs somewhere...

title: Perfect for an NYC Weekend
text: I find this hotel to be perfect for 2 or 3 day visits to NYC. Great location close to Penn Station, Broadway and shopping. Spacious rooms with kitchenettes. Free breakfasts. But the staff are what truly make this hotel special. From the time we arrived until checkout, we received warm, personal attention. Special shout outs to Jelani, Donnaven, and Annabelle.

title: Servicio comedor - alimentación
text: Hemos iniciado un gran día, solo llevamos 40 minutos en el lugar y ha sido grandiosa la atención. Especialmente Josttyn en el servicio del comedor quien nos ha regalo un buen ambiente y así continuaremos esta aventura del primer día!

title: Josttyn!!
text:
Très bien accueilli par josttyn avec une gentillesse débordante et un séjour rempli de joie et de bonne humeur.
Un hotel avec une bonne localisation dans Manhattan, à côté de empire states building, time square ect…
Les chambres sont très chaleureuses.

title: —
text: It was my pleasure to be in this hotel and I had such a good breakfast whole week, and Josttyn was so good garson and he helped me to orginize table for a family every day. Thank gou Josttyn! If I will come to New York City again so only to this hotel!!

title: My favorite NYC hotel for business trips
text: This place is the ideal hotel for me. Rooms have a fridge, microwave, stovetop, dishwasher, great blackout curtains, a variety of pillows, and are quiet. Strong wifi, huge free breakfast, friendly staff, nice fitness center. 3 blocks from Penn station.

title: BON HOTEL
text:
Super hôtel ,la chambre  très grande top 2 grand lits avec la cuisine , salle de bain très bien et le gardien du matin très très gentil.
Par contre très  gros bémol sur sur une jeune femme dont je n ai pas le nom mais présente le 27/12 à 16h .
Nous avions réservé un taxi le mardi ou l'on nous dit que le prix est 83$et moment de partir cela  passe à 95$, ce n était pas la voiture que l'on avait demandé et qui était à105$Bref!!
Pour faire cour  on prend le taxi pas le choix 95$ et qu'est ce que je vois en attendent nos baguages le taxi  donner un bakchiche à la demoiselle .
Bilan on se  fait avoir continuellement car on est des touristes !!

title: Best hotel in Hell’s Kitchen
text: I’ve been staying in Hells Kitchen for years attending and event at the Javitz every January. I think I’ve been in most of the properties around the area. The Homewood Suites this time is hands down the best experience I’ve had. The rooms are large, massive for New York, staff is friendly , place is spotless. Michalyn was especially helpful when I needed a cab to the airport. Highly recommend this property.

title: Good
text:
everyone was kind and lovely, patient, and did a great service. the rooms are great, big and comfortable. 
The only bad thing was that we had a little difficulty communicating with reception to ask for blankets, mainly but everything has already been resolved.

title: New York for New Year's Eve 2023
text: We cannot say enough good things about the Homewood Suites Hilton on 37th St. The staff was friendly, helpful, and went beyond the call of duty whenever asked. The location is excellent  with plenty of restaurants and amenities nearby, and obviously close to tons of attractions. The breakfast was bountiful and delicious and the staff were friendly and efficient. The room was clean and comfortable. Shout out to Juan who helped make our stay more enjoyable and for managing a busy time with almost 1,000 guests. We recommend it.

title: Location, Clean, Great Staff 10/10
text: This hotel is in the perfect location if you are going to MSG. We loved our stay here, the room was very spacious and came with a full kitchenette. Breakfast area was super busy in the morning but had great options to choose from for breakfast. It was also great to have the opportunity to make coffee in the lobby all throughout the day. The staff texted me throughout my stay and made sure I was always taken care of. The front desk held our bags after checkout which allowed us to explore the city for a while before heading home. Parking garage was 300 feet away and made it extremely convenient when I picked this hotel. Would 100000% stay here again on all my future trips to NYC moving forward. Highly recommend!

title: Would definitely stay here again!
text: We had a great experience here! Rooms are clean and very spacious! We were in a double, and it even had a small kitchenette with a large fridge. Being a food allergy family, we like to bring our own food so it was nice having enough room for everything. The hotel also served a hot breakfast in the morning. There was plenty of food and more than enough options. There was also staff taking away plates as you finished with them. Felix especially was kind and helpful and made sure that we had everything we needed.

title: Unforgettable experience in the hotel surrounded by excellent people who made  their best to make us feel at home
text:
I’d like to say a big thanks to Adriana and Oliver T.  For making each breakfast in the restaurant a fantastic moment to share with my kids.
They were both so kind, helpful and joyful that I would definitely visit the hotel again.

title: COMODIDAD, AMABILIDAD Y PROFESIONALIDAD.
text: Hotel fantástico, en pleno centro de Manhattan. Trabajadores muy profesionales y amables. Hemos estado muy a gusto. Volveríamos a repetir sin ninguna duda. Destacar en especial a Jorge, Josttym y Oliver por su buen trato y simpatía. Experiencia excelente.

title: Great
text: Very kind, friendly and helpful. It's lucky to come on a trip and meet people like that because they make the trip so much more enjoyable. The cleanliness of the whole hotel was very good. Jorge, Josttyn and Oliver are very good employees, I hope that their careers in this hotel will be long lasting.

title: Very good
text: Overall room was very clean and spacious and the breakfast delivery was very well organized and had a wide variety of foods. The staff was very helpful when they you need assistance and were very friendly. I would like if you served the cookies more often as they were delicious!!

title: Very friendly and cozy!
text:
The place is very warm and cozy!
My, my wife and our little 20 months old baby felt immediately wellcomed.
Once arrived my wife had an injury in her shoulder, reception supported us and helped us fixing the situation.
A special thanks to Olivier T. that helped us during the trip making it more funny! And providing special advices :-)

title: NYC family adventure
text: What a great hotel and location for families and a great location to explore the city as it is walking distance to many of the main attractions and Penn Station is only a short walk away. Staff were great and helpful. Breakfast had many hot and cold options and even supplied 'take out' boxes to fill up if you wanted to take anything extra for the day. The only negative thing I can say was there wasn't enough seating to have breakfast and had to stand to have our breakfast on the first morning. The positive was the next 2 mornings we were able to find a seat. We will definitely book this hotel again on our next visit to NYC and would recommend to families.

title: Oliver T.
text:
The most enjoyable part of my stay was meeting Oliver T. He answered all my concerns and endured that the lobby area was at its best for all of us to experience.  

The bathroom towel dispensers not working.  He stayed with the problem until it was resolved.

title: Relaxed and comfortable
text: Oliver was very helpful and friendly. You can tell he loves working here. He made sure to take care of us and provided any service we may have needed with no questions asked. Would definitely recommend coming here.

title: Excelente!!!
text: Me gustó el servicio y sobretodo la amabilidad de josttyn y Jorge la eficiencia en el buen trato que me dieron me gustó mucho el desayuno muy variado y nutritivo súper recomendable el hotel está muy bien ubicado volveremos me encantó!!!

title: Excellent !
text:
We are delighted to have stayed at this hotel. we received a quality room and perfect service. Thanks to Josttyn for his good humor and his service at breakfast. 
Good address, good experience, we recommend

title: Secondo soggiorno a New York......Non Bene saro' "stato sfortunato"?
text: Struttura in ottima posizione,Camera piccola non adeguata a 3 persone (con lo stesso importo ci sono camere migliori) Personale alla reception indisponente e poco collaborativo (in tutti gli alberghi dove ho soggiornato alla reception parlano le lingue principali!) non spiegano nulla .Segnalazioni di problematiche alla stanza,(rifacimento,salviette,pulizia ecc ecc) se risolte....! dopo 3/4 segnalazioni, Pulizia in generale scarsa.Colazione ben fornita ma sala inadeguata alle persone in hotel (sembrava di essere ad un mercato) nota positiva la gentilezza e professionalita' del  Sig.Felix addetto alla sala.Gli ascensori per accedere ai piani non adeguati alla struttura

title: Awesome experience just days after Christmas
text: Awesome service! We’ve gone to NYC just before or after Christmas (in other words, busy for hotels and other service industry) 3 times over the last 5 years and our hotel experience this time was by far the best. Everyone we encountered from front desk to lobby to breakfast area were polite and helpful. It was myself, my mom and my 15 year old son and we all want to especially acknowledge Jorge. Every morning without fail he was there with a smile, asking if we needed anything, answering questions and just being overall kind and helpful. Again- the front desk staff was great too! We will stay here again!

title: Booking.com  reservations
text:
Unfortunately when we arrived on 30th December 2023 late night to check out on 4th Jan 2024. They didn’t check us in straight away as they spent one hour thirty minutes trying to figure out if we made payment. Which I made full payment on booking .com for 2 no Efficiency king studios before I arrived. They were insisting that I make another payment of $1500 but I argued that $3558 had already left my account and demanded they called booking.com. Booking.com confirmed my payment and asked them to give me the  2no rooms I paid for. They only managed to give me one room I paid for and issued a lower grade room as the second room. On checking out they tried to charge my card which I asked them shouldn’t it be them refunding me the $100 they took during check in.
Felix was very helpful

title: Formidable établissement pour court ou long séjour
text:
Formidable séjour. Très grand studio au 5e étage (pratique pour ne pas perdre de temps avec les ascenseurs), deux doubles lits très confortables. Cuisinette, très grande salle de bains. Chauffage ou clim nickel. Très propre. ménage fait chaque jour. 
Surprise: petit déjeuner buffet compris! et c est très copieux. Rooftop au 22e: sympa. 
très bien placé : à 10 mn de Times Square, 4 mn du Madison Square Garden et des stations de métro. Idéal! Quartier très sur et bien équipé en petites épiceries ou pizza pas chères.

title: Best hotel experience
text:
Excellent service and attention. The breakfast is too delicious and the rooms are spacious and comfortable. Jostty and Felix gived us a good service!!! 

The hotel is in a good location close to anywhere and main tourist attractions.

title: An incredible experience!
text: The hotel is gorge and very well located to everything we need. The rooms are spacious, comfortable, clean and beautiful!  There is a parking garage right across the street and Penn station is walking distance! The service was incredible, we were greeted at check in by the manager Jon Lomitola, who gave us a tour of the lobby AND a swag bag of great gifts!! We felt so welcomed and cared for. We can’t wait to go back!

title: Breakfast experience
text: Rooms were spacious and clean.  Location fantastic. Breakfast was awesome and Jostty our server was kind and enthusiastic about his job. He was very friendly and respectful. It was awesome. The breakfast was fantastic and the coffee great!

title: New Year in New York
text:
Josttyn is the best, very kind and funny!!!
We’ll return for sure, the hotel is top and the positions is fantastic.
Breakfast is very very good and also the happy hour in the afternoon.
Very silent during the night

title: Home away from home
text:
Brilliant hotel, right in the middle of New York attractions.
This hotel is Situated 5mins walk to Port Authority Bus Station.
You step out and turn right , walk a few yards and straight on to 8th Avenue.
Carlos Bakery is less then 10 minute walk from the hotel.
Very close to all shops. Eating out no problem.
The hotel rooms were spacious with a little kitchen in it. Big fridge to store your left overs and keep water or drinks in.
Breakfast was amazing.
Did get busy often and finding a place to sit and eat was tricky. But was manageable. People even took pieces of food back into their rooms.
The watermelon was a blast. Big sizes.
Staff very friendly and helpful.
Would definitely stay in the same hotel if I ever went back to New York.

title: Un super hôtel bien situé
text: Hôtel super bien situé dans une rue calme à 2 pas de Times square et des métros. Pas mal de restau à coter. Chambre spacieuse dotée d’une petite cuisine très utile ! Le ménage est parfaitement fait chaque jours. Bref je recommande cet hôtel! Le petit dej est très bon, on peux même se faire une lunch box ou petit dej dans la chambre.

title: Great hospitality
text: Everyone was helpful when asking information about where to go and what to see in New York. They were also very good with refilling the coffee and cups in the rooms. Overall a good experience for my family’s first time in New York.

title: New York experience
text: My family and I had a great experience at Homewood suites.  It was my wife’s first time in New York and the very helpful/ friendly staff made the trip a delight. Jorge was very friendly at breakfast!

title: Awesome service and personnel
text: The breafast was perfect and attention to the room cleaning was bar none but to top the stay was Karen who managed to find my old account and awarded us points for staying...Thanks Karen...keep on being awesome.

title: A good place to stay
text: Very good attention, specially from Josttyn! Ideal place and excellent location, near Madison Square Garden and other touristic sights. Good breakfast and possibility to take it away. Coffe and tea all day long available. Comfortable rooms with fridge and mini kitchen.

title: Uitstekende ervaring.
text:
Het ontbijt was uitstekend. Mijn zoon met een ernstige pinda allegie, kon er goed eten. Iedere ochtend bestelde ik bij Joshua muffins voor mijn zoon die dan speciaal door Merve klaar gemaakt werd. En Joshua kwam ze dan persoonlijk bij onze tafel brengen. Dit waarderen we enorm.
De kamer was einde van de middag weer voorzien van schone handdoeken en een opgeschut bed.
Personeel is zeer vriendelijk en behulpzaam.

title: Best place to celebrate a birthday ;-)
text:
Staff simply amazing - always available and eager to respond to our requests. In the mornings there was always a staff member walking around to check guests were pleased
Central location, between 8th and 9th avenues, 15 min away from Times Square or 15min away from the Hudson river 
Stay super relaxed with hot beverages available 24/7 which felt so good to have one, when arriving to the hotel from cold freezing weather outside :-D
On breakfast, disposable card boxes were available to take all the food out we wanted with no questions asked or raised eyebrow

single minor remark goes to the refrigerator's noise over night which was to loud when someone is sleeping

title: Fantastic hotel
text: I couldn’t rate this hotel highly enough, clean , tidy everywhere ,  comfortable rooms . It’s  really well located , breakfast very nice and  good value , great staff who were all really helpful , cheerful and polite .  Loved the free tea and coffee  in the hotel reception area 24/7 .

title: Christmas stay! Perfect!
text: Very clean, location was great and convenient to subway. We stayed in a king studio suite which was located on the corner the room was very quiet and extremely clean. Three of us fit more than comfortably in the room. Overall we couldn’t ask for a better stay. The free breakfast was a bonus too!

title: Geweldig hotel
text: Geweldig verblijf gehad bij Homewood Suites. Fijne kamers met meer voorzieningen dan verwacht. Personeel is aardig en helpen je graag. Dank aan het personeelslid Jorge voor het fijne ontvangst bij het ontbijt.

title: Great breakfast, quiet room, pleasant staff
text:
Nice clean hotel in a great location because it was quite central to everything. 
Breakfast time busy but had everything you needed. Tea and coffee available all day.
What makes this hotel is the staff. They where all lovely, friendly and helpful.  Thanks to Jorge and Felix for finding us a seat each morning at breakfast time. All the staff work hard and deserve a mention.

title: Good option in midtown manhattan
text:
Very good location and friendly staff. Breakfast can be a zoo due to high number of guests and the food is  average. Kitchenette in the room was very useful and it was pretty quiet given the location, which may have been because we were on a high floor. 
Good place to stay in midtown

title: Christmas fun
text: Very comfortable room, excellent all included breakfast and friendly, helpful staff especially Juan. Traveled with my college aged children for our first visit to NYC. This location was great for sight seeing and subway travel.

title: Busy hotel
text: We arrived at this hotel on December 11th at 12.30 in the afternoon.  The room wasn’t ready but was expected as check in isn’t until 16.00and it was very busy, so they kindly stored our baggage and told us to come back at 16.00. We arrived back at 16.30 but the room still wasn’t ready , was slightly disappointed as we had only come back to freshen up then go back out to explore, we waited 20 minutes then was given our room key.  On first glance of the room we thought it was quite small for 3 people with nowhere to place suitcases out of the way , but this didn’t really impacted us to much as we spent a very small amount of time in the room . Breakfast was very busy so we ended up getting a take out and taking it back to our room . Free tea and coffee in the lobby to help yourself . Location was pretty good , 10 mins to time square, 20min walk to rocket feller and 1hr to history museum . All in all it was a pretty average stay until our journey back home. I had messed up and booked our transfer back to the airport for the wrong day, a lady at reception said they had there own car ( not sure if this meant it was hotel run or just a car service they use ) , she told us it would be $95 so we went ahead.  Driver picked us up , smartly dressed and car was nice , however 20 mins into our journey he tell us we have to pay an extra $ 10 , we explained that we was told it was $95 , he said no no it’s $105 plus an extra $10 , I know it’s not a huge amount extra and luckily I had a few extra $ to hand but if we didn’t we would have found ourselves in a tricky situation . He also said if your not happy with this then you can get out here , obviously we was not going to do that with our son , suitcases and in the middle of god knows where . So there is obviously a miss communication between the hotel and the car service or the hotel just don’t have up to date prices .

title: 1 Week stay at Homewood Suites NYC
text: First time in NYC and have to say the location of this friendly hotel/suites is fantastic, the staff are very helpful. The young man on front reception [sorry didn`t get his name] took the time to write down our journeys through the subways which was very helpful to us both. Bed and pillows are very comfortable and a well equipped kitchen, tea and coffee available all day at reception. Jorge and Josttym and all the breakfast staff are very helpful and friendly. We would not hesitate to stay at this hotel again in the future and would recommend to friends and family.

title: excelente
text: la decoración es hermosa, muy buena atención en general, buen desayuno, muy completo para todos los gustos,Y destacó la atención de Jorge que nos atendió en nuestro primer día muy amablemente y las habitaciones son muy buenas y completas

title: Great breakfast and location
text: Breakfast is great! Nice options and variety. Josttyn and the crew are so helpful and friendly. Rooms are big for New York City standards, but the sofa bed could be better. Shower is nice, but bathroom is bite-sized. Location is great, easy to get around. Would stay here again if in the area!

title: Josttyn!
text: Service at breakfast was good- even though space was limited, Josttyn made sure we had somewhere to sit and cleaned up for us so we were comfortable! He came a few times to check on us, and made sure we had everything we needed

title: christmas in NYC
text: Josttyn is awesome!! He helped us in the breakfast and he is super helper. The breakfast is amazing too. The bedroom is super cozy. Me and my family felt welcomed by everyone ate Homewood by Hilton. I recommend!

title: great staff and facilities
text: a really great hotel with kind and friendly staff , especially josttyn , he always greets us enthusiastically which makes my morning even better and he approaches us when we need help , thank you . the hotel has great facilities and it’s more convenient for tourist like me,will definitely stay in this hotel again

title: Great location, great sized rooms.
text:
Great sized rooms for New York, kitchenette and bathroom really nice. Great location, walking distance to Penn station (5 mins) and Madison Square Garden. About 20 min walk to Radio City Hall and short stroll to Times Sq.
