Breakfast was very good, but get there early (before 7) unless you like manoeuvring and fighting your way to the breakfast bar, jostling with overweight yokels loading their plates with enough food to sink the USS Enterprise, as if they were never going to see waffles and syrup again in their lives. Omelettes were good when they were  available, and not smothered in maple and stacked 10 high on Jabba the Hut's plate on the table behind you. I would stay here again in a heartbeat, but be prepared to get up early if you aren't keen on grappling for your morning cup of joe and eggs.

title: Non male
text:
Posizione centralissima a 5 minuti dalla metro e a dieci da Times square , comodo e naturalmente vista la zona costosa.
Colazione accettabile e abbastanza varia , spuntino pomeridiano offerto e deposito bagagli.
La Puliza non è’ proprio al top ma qua in zona è’ sempre cosi.
Un unico appunto il frigo in camera e’ molto rumoroso e di notte lo staccavo.
Ci tornerei

title: Annual Christmas NYC Trip - Good Location and Excellent Customer Service
text:
During my recent trip to NYC, I stayed at the Homewood Suites Midtown/Times Square

Pros:
1. Great location on a quite block 8th/37th and close to both Herald Square and Times Square. (walkable)
2. Wednesday evening cocoa and hot soup reception 
3. Customer Service: The ENTIRE staff from check in to check out (shout out to Juan) was great. Everyone was so helpful 
4. Response to request: Room was not cleaned well, brought this issue up with the front staff, room was cleaned after check-in
5. Take out box for breakfast. Especially helpful since the hotel was full due to the holidays. This helped with congestion in the small lobby/eating area

Cons:
1. Cleanliness of rooms 
2. Rooms are a bit worn
3. Small rooms (to be expected for NYC)

Overall - I would stay at this hotel again

Happy Holidays!

title: Great stay at Homewood Suites
text: It was a great place to stay, they took our bags early so we could spend some time exploring, the room was spacious with a kitchenette, and the staff was extremely friendly! Jorge especially was great during breakfast!

title: Amazing holiday experience
text: Amazing holiday experience! Pride in service shows from the moment you enter the lobby: gorgeous Xmas tree, clean space, superior evening social. Shout out to Karen, Donna, Sharlene, Jessica, Jackson, Pedro, Luis, Jorge, and Ana.

title: Will definitely be visiting again. The city is beautiful, and the holiday lights are beautiful. Love
text: The dining room breakfast service was great! Jostyn was very friendly, and courteous, and was attentive, to our every need. The hotel was very clean, and definitely had a holiday vibe! The stff ws nc.

title: Service makes the difference.
text: Jorge was excellent. He helped us by keeping the table clean, was kind and service oriented. We asked him a few questions and he was quick to answer, spoke in a very respectful manner and kept on checking if we were ok.

title: Clean, family friendly and polite!
text: The staff was wonderful! Everyone was beyond nice! It seemed like customer service was their priority. Jorge and Josttym were super friendly and helped us out throughout the entire meal process! Great stay! High recommend!

title: Extremely nice!
text: Had an awesome stay at the homewood suites! Was very close to time Square and the room was perfect for what we needed. The breakfast was great and the staff was extremely helpful and polite especially Jorge Josttym. Will definitely be back!

title: Buena ubicación
text:
Pieza en general muy buena y  cómoda,  la tercera cama no es muy cómoda para una persona adulta.
La limpieza se realiza muy tarde.  a las 17:00 pm aún no está lista.  Esto no es muy agradable.,
Buena ubuicación y rico desayuno.  Jorge es muy amable y preocupado.

title: Such helpful staff!
text: Such a great stay - the breakfast was amazing and Jorge couldn’t have been more attentive. The hotel is really central so makes getting around so simple. Me and my family have had a really amazing trip

title: Happieness
text:
The staff are very friendly and helpful. 
Especially Jorge is a nice guy. He is looking that everything is fine on your table at the lunch. He is very helpfully and explain us the routes to some importent sights in New York city.

title: Homewood is my home in NY
text: Josttyn the guy in breakfast room was very pretty and professional... GREAT BOY. Great breakfast in Homewood hotel in Manhattan. The hoyeyis very central and near to times square, and MACY'S. Was the best

title: Viaje familiar
text:
Perfecta ubicación.
 Todo muy bien. Mencion especial en los desayunos a Jorge que siempre tenía una palabra amable para los huéspedes.
Muy bien situado, muy agradable y limpio.
Está muy cerca de times square. En mitad de Manhattan, lo que facilita mucho la organización de las visitas a la ciudad.

title: Amazing wonderful lady called Karen  New York
text: I had a lovely lady called  Karen, directed me around New York, we arrived  Friday she give us an amazing welcome in that she understands how I  felt. Karen also help where to go to health shop that I was think about but didn’t know how to find the places, what a wonderful women god bless her

title: Best service
text:
Best customer service experience jorge was expectacular very kind and friendly always trying to give us the best  possible service
I actually work in the service industry,and i think he did a phenomenal job.. He is a great asset to the company he was  always willing to help and to give us the best service very knowledgeable about the area

title: American dream🇺🇸
text: L’hotel si trova in una posizione comoda e strategica, a pochi passi dalla metro e da times square. Il personale dell’hotel gentilissimo e disponibile. Soprattutto FELIX, gentile e simpatico, super disponibile.

title: Best breakfast and polite service
text: We had no big expectations in breakfast. Just wanted something in our stomach to honing the city. But the breakfast was awesome! Over all our expectations. And Josttyn (from the service) was very polite and helpful :-). The tables were always clean.

title: Our trip to new york
text: The view is beautiful, the breakfast is ok you will get everything you need and jostyyn is such a friendly and welcoming waiter/guy. He asked us how we like new york so far and helped us with everything.

title: Awesome team!! We’ll be back!!
text: Felix was so helpful at breakfast, Kelly and Giovanni at the front desk were great— everyone at the property was so friendly! We will be back for sure! Breakfast was a huge plus for our family of ten !

title: Mason Family Trip
text:
Josttym, Felix and Jorge were terrific! Helped us every morning while we had breakfast. Very nice young men who embodied hospitality and courtesy. Thank you gentleman!! 
The night staff was very helpful and made our stay that much more enjoyable. The room was perfect for our family of five.

title: Accogliente e soddisfacente, soprattutto Josttyn.
text: L’esperienza è stata fantastica, il personale accogliente e cordiale, soprattutto Josttyn (amichevole e cordiale nel servizio). comere molto pulite e particolare attenzione verso l’igiene. il servizio di colazione ottimo e variegato.

title: Christmas in New York
text: Nice hotel with perfect service and good breakfast. Josttyn has helped us in all necessary to have a perfect experience, he is helpful and attentive. Room is a litle small, beds are good and have nice pillows.

title: Bellissima vacanza
text:
Bellissima vacanza
Ottima impressione per questo hotel. Stanze pulite e ben organizzate. Angolo cucina attrezzato e curato in ogni dettaglio.
Buona colazione e sevizio professionale. Josttyn molto gentile e disponibile.

title: Great employees
text: Josttyn and Felix were very friendly and helpful. They asked if we needed something additional and made our breakfast experience enjoyable. They really made our morning! Plus the breakfast was well stocked and the tables clean.

title: Christmas theme. Hot chocolate was wonderful
text:
Josttyn was friendly and helpful- 5
It feels like home away from home. ❤️
Very Clean. Great breakfast! 
The room is very clean. The essentials in the bathroom that like the shampoo, conditioner, gel, and lotions were wonderful. Definitely a cozy feel

title: New York week trip
text:
We staid for one week and totally loved it.
The room service was excellent and the daily changing breakfast buffet was made with love and you’ve never missed anything. We can totally recommend this hotel.

title: Bellissima vacanza
text:
Ottima impressione per questo hotel.  Stanze pulite e ben organizzate. Angolo cucina attrezzato e curato in ogni dettaglio.
Buona colazione e sevizio professionale. Josttyn molto gentile e disponibile.

title: Estancia NY
text: habitaciones grandes y limpias, atención al público genial, Josttym nos atendió muy bien y servicial, el servicio de desayuno fue variado, el gym muy bien y la lavandería  rápida, no hay que esperar mucho en el ascensor,  todo el personal muy bien.

title: I would recommend
text: The hotel is in a good location for seeing the majority of the sites, it was clean and the rooms a really decent size, we had a couple of issues which they sorted straight away. The lobby i would say is small and a little cramped for the amount of people who pass through it on a daily basis. There isn't really a facility for keeping your bags safe or one that i would feel keeps them safe if you are leaving a lot later than check out and still want to go out of the hotel. Breakfast is decent, i would say the hot food is what lets it down. My wife is Gluten intolerant and there was plenty of options for her including fresh muffins and bagels, special shout out to Joshua at breakfast for helping with these every morning and always been welcoming and happy to help every morning.

title: Staff
text: Beautiful hotel and amazing staff, particularly at breakfast. Jorge was so welcoming and lovely to chat to! They were all so helpful and friendly. Thankyou! Definitely would come back. The hotel is also in such a good location, very happy with my stay!

title: Great place to stay and well worth the money
text:
Beautiful hotel and beautiful food. Was served by a lovely gentlemen called Jorge who was very accommodating. He attended to our needs and was just a lovely man to chat too. 

The stay was really comfortable and the room was beautiful. Would honestly rate a ten out of ten

title: great!
text: Great service and thanks to felix and jorge for being so nice the entire time. Breakfast is amazing and the idea of the boxes to take some stuff is really great, also there’s coffee and hot chocolate available 24/7 so it makes it even better.

title: Muy recomendable
text:
El hotel es super bonito, la atencion impecable y los cuatros super limpios. El desayuno tenía mucha variedad y estaba todo super Rico y el camarero que nos atendió, Jorge, era muy agradable, pendiente y servicial.
Os recomendamos mucho venir a este hotel.

title: ¡Perfecto!
text:
La experiencia en el hotel está siendo fabulosa, todo el equipo está pendiente de que estemos a gusto y cómodos durante nuestra estancia en Nueva York. La habitación es amplia (venimos con tres maletas), luminosa y limpia. 

Soy celíaca y en el desayuno hay varias opciones sin gluten. Además, Jorge y Joshua están pendientes de prepararme tostadas sin gluten en cuanto entro al buffet. 

De tanto andar, Mi marido se ha hecho daño en el pie y enseguida nos dieron vendas y nos explicaron donde estaban las máquinas de hielo. 

¡Un equipo fantástico!

title: Joshua at the breakfast bar
text: Joshua at the breakfast bar was excellent. He was very  attentive to our needs and made sure we had our gluten free breakfast items. We appreciated his warm hospitality and friendliness! Joshua helped us start the day right!

title: Soggiorno perfetto!!!
text:
Stanze pulite e confortevoli.
Servizio di colazione inclusa eccellente: ampia scelta dolce/salata.
Personale estremamente gentile e disponibile, a tal proposito un ringraziamento speciale va a Jorge per la sua grande professionalità e simpatia!
A cinque minuti a piedi da Times Square e metro. 
Consigliatissimo! 
Quando tornerò a New York sapremo dove alloggiare, grazie!

title: Amazing trip!!
text: the breakfasts were varied and all very delicious. The staff are very welcoming and understanding. the rooms are beautiful, and the hotel is perfectly located. I would recommend 100%, next trip I will return to this hotel! lots of love to Jorge who gave us an excellent service!❤️

title: Jorge
text:
Jorge is a really nice guy who has been completely kind with us asking and helping for Everything. Congrats!
Moreover, the hotel is superb. It has a lot of facilities that make you feel like in your own house.

title: New York visit
text: Great hotel in a good location. Staff were friendly especially Felix. Breakfast was a great surprise and set us up for the day. Would definitely recommend staying here if looking for somewhere in midtown Manhattan.

title: Excelente opción
text: Muy buena ubicación, hotel agradable y acogedora recepción. habitación muy amplia  cama grande y cómoda con mobiliario suficiente para guardar las cosas, cocina completa. Buen desayuno buffet con posibilidad de llevártelo en una cajita si no da tiempo a desayunar en el hotel.

title: Great experience
text:
Oliver the houseman in the lobby was awesome helpful very bright, nice smile, deserves a raise or a promotion made my stay special 
He was a great help with our family 
He went out of his way to help us and especially keep the lobby clean

title: Muy buena experiencia excelente ubicación cerca de todo
text:
Muy buena atención 
El desayuno bien. No tiene gran variedad pero es correcto
Uno se puede armar viandas para el mediodía o noche
Ubicación excelente 
Cerca de todo
Las camas cómodas
En determinados horarios es complicado el uso ascensor. Se congestiona

title: Great place to stay
text: We were able to check in early, store our bags, and start exploring the city right away. Hot beverages were always available for us in the lobby which was nice, especially on cold days. Jorge was very nice and friendly!

title: Perfect experience
text:
Great experience.
Staff is super nice, especially Miguel and Jessica that helped us with the check in and oliver T who was very nice.
We were traveling with a 11 month kid and a lot of luggages, Oliver really helped us.

Hotel is in a perfect location, 5 minutes to time square and all the main lines.

Hotel is clean (considering NYC standard) even though the room is not cleaned daily.

Great breakfast included + box to go.

Super nice experience!!!!
Thank you

title: Fab grub and a friendly face
text: Great customer service by Jorge every morning from breakfast, a good variation of breakfast and great help from the night shift team to get us back into our room when we were locked out, overall fabulous base for our new york adventures.

title: Breakfast staff
text: Breakfast was very enjoyable and Felix was extremely helpful and made sure we had everything we needed felt very welcome thanks to Felix. It is a buffet breakfast and there is a Large selection to pick from and caters for all.

title: Good location fit sightseeing
text: Good location for Times Square and exploring New York attractions. Breakfast hot options were variable. Special mention to Jorges for making us so welcome on day one. The rooms are well equipped and beds are comfortable. Staff are quick to respond to requests   I would stay here again.

title: Family trip
text: Large rooms for NYC. Refrigerator and microwave.  Good service.  Good breakfast buffet.  Felt safe in neighborhood.  Variety of dining options near hotel.  Staff were welcoming and helpful, especially Jefferson at front desk.  Plan to visit again.

title: New York stay
text: Centrally located, quiet and clean. Breakfasts were a bit underwhelming. Having said that the staff worked like Trojans. Special mention to Jorge and Joshua who were courteous and polite no matter how demanding the patrons were. Really enjoyed the Wed supper. The fruit, cheese and biscuits and chicken soup were delicious and the young man serving it ( sorry I forgot your name) was extremely helpful in giving us good tips about the city.

title: Excellent! Perfect location, very good rooms and service!
text: Beautiful room with just what you need in the perfect location. We were able to see the Macys Parade and go to the nearest tourist places such as Rockerfeller Tower, Sumit, Central Park just walking distance. Also Excellent service. Jorge assisted us in the breakfast. It was good to meet another boricua in New York city.

title: New York
text:
Hôtel très bien situé, a deux pas de Times Square et du Madison Square Garden. Tous commerces, restaurants et métro disponibles juste à côté mais quartier calme. 
Les chambres sont équipées de kitchenette qui permettent de manger sur place. 
Petits déjeuners copieux en self proposés les matins jusqu'à 10h30. (Bonne équipe pour vous accueillir les matins dont Jorge).

title: great for our first trip to NYC
text: Our stay was great, the hotel is very close to many attractions like time square and hudson yards and you can get everywhere by bus and subway. The laundry and included breakfast was very convenient, the room had a small kitchen and enough room. The personnel is very helpful and always taking care of your needs, Felix attention at the breakfast was splendid!

title: Muy buena experiencia
text: Excelente servicio, buena ubicación y muy buena atención de Félix nuestro mesero. El hotel tiene todo lo necesario para una estancia tranquila, nosotros estuvimos en Thanksgiving y está cerca del desfile

title: Vacaciones en NY
text:
Todo bien . Especialmente la atención de Félix , siempre dispuesto a ayudar en todo , durante el desayuno nos ayudó siempre , muy servicial …
Y Jorge también … el hotel está muy bien , solo necesitaría tener más habitaciones con dos camas queen , dado que los sofá son muy incómodos .gracias

title: Great staff, great location
text: Loved the breakfast, Jorge was great help. Very close to all important sights. Staff are very friendly. Interior looked clean and very well maintained. We walked everywhere as the hotel was really central. Would highly recommend to anyone

title: Great location, great staff, great hotel.
text:
This was a trip to mark my wife’s landmark birthday, and as a Hilton Honors Gold member I sent an email to the hotel before to enquire if a room upgrade was available.

I received a very pleasant response and was indeed upgraded to a balcony room.

On checking in, we were warmly welcomed by Charlene, given a welcome gift of snacks and water. 

On entry the room, we were delighted to find a hand written Birthday Card for my wife along with a lovely bag of treats. What a nice touch.

We have stayed at several Homewood Suites properties in Florida, and are familiar with the brand. However with space in Manhattan being so expensive, this suite was smaller, but had all the essentials we needed. One small thing to remember is that the fridge is alongside the bed, and  can be a little noisy during the night.

The breakfast selection is smaller than we expected, but this is most likely due to the space available. That said, there is a good choice of hot and cold items, and the 24 hour coffee station is a great benefit.

A self service laundry is provided, and was very useful for our 9 night stay.

The Evening Reception is now only on Wednesdays, and this was a little disappointing.

However, all the staff we met during our stay were without exception friendly, helpful and a pleasure to meet.

The hotel is perfectly located for sightseeing, shopping and very close to the subway. Times Square is a short walk away, and there are plenty of restaurants and bars in the area.

This was a very pleasant stay, and we appreciated the nice touches from the hotel to make our visitors memorable.

The roof terrace on the 22nd floor is a lovely area, and in warmer weather, would be a lovely place to relax after a days sightseeing.

The Homewood Suites is a great brand and this hotel is an excellent example of great hospitality.

title: Super-friendly staff!
text: Great hotel! Clean and spacious, and in a great location. What I appreciated most was the friendly staff. Oliver, in particular, helped us several times. When we first arrived, he offered to watch our suitcases in the lobby while we changed clothes. Later in the visit, he delivered some extra towels quickly and with a huge smile. He and the rest of the staff made us feel right at home, and I would definitely stay here again!

title: Great Stay!!
text: The place and staff are great! Juan and Charlene provided the best service. Clean and convenient location to all the hot spots! 🔥 We weren't able to check in until 4 p.m. but the staff held our bags so we could let fun begin! 😍

title: Great hotel and staff!
text: The hotel staff has been so kind and helpful. Having a breakfast included is so helpful for our family. I have to eat gluten free and Jorge, a breakfast attendant, was super kind and helpful. I really appreciated his willingness to get me what I needed. I will recommend your hotel to others visiting the city.

title: Good option if you're willing to take the "pay-less-package"
text:
First of all, even though I'm going to point out some flaws, I am very happy with the time I spent on the Homewood Suites Midtown, and those shortcomings make sense as part of a decision of paying less for a hotel in NYC.

We all know every hotel in NYC charges more than it is worth. This may be an exception as their price is fair within that context.

Reception is clean, employees are friendly and breakfast is free! Worth mentioning is a pretty good breakfast - way better than those Continental which some hotels offer and it is really a couple of apples and stale bread.

Rooms are decent - we're a family of 5 and we had 2 Queen bed + sofa-bed. We also had a tiny kitchen and big fridge.

Bathroom is ok. We had some problems with the shower. Telephone was also not working. I told them about the problems but I guess they didn't have time to fix them. No worries.

I'd like to point out that the following employees were VERY helpful and kind to us:
Jelani, Oliver T. and Kelly.

Thanks, everyone!

title: Great Experience
text: Karen was fabulous and fantastic.  I loved her custom service.  Will book again.   Also sign up to become a Hilton honors member.  The little perks like bottled water makes you feel special. Glad Karen explained everything thoroughly 👏 👌

title: Convenient and Comfortable
text: Most of all I wanted to give a compliment to the staff, all of whom were helpful and kind. In particular, I'd like to give a shout-out to Jorge who was working at breakfast. Thank you for your kindness and attention to detail - it does not go unnoticed.

title: Family stay
text: Really enjoying our stay at Homewoood studios. Lovely breakfast area, very clean, lots of choice. All staff were warm and welcoming and Felix was very helpful. Looking forward to the rest of our stay.

title: A New York per la maratona
text:
Ci siamo trovati molto bene, ottima posizione dell'hotel vicino a molte attrazioni della Midtown.
Staff molto gentile e disponibile, come Oliver negli spazi della colazione.
Ottima colazione compresa nel pacchetto con possibilità di preparazione del bag da portare.
Hotel ben insonorizzato non su sentivano rumori provenire dall'esterno e dall'interno della struttura.

title: Convenient location, kind staff
text:
An extraordinary surprise in the middle of NY.
The room was very large - they offered us an upgrade which we took. Extremely comfortable, with a place to prepare a quick meal, a refrigerator to store milk, fruits and vegetables. Very comfortable.
I wouldn't fail to mention that we arrived around 11:00 and they allowed us to check in. It was a commendable kindness.Not many places do that. Jefferson was quite kind.
Hotel is in 37thSt and though we are used to book near 50St, we found it  convenient to go from and to airport. Penn St is 3 blocks away and from there you can take E Subway line to Jamaica Center, Air Train. Penn is accesible station, an elevator on 34th so it makes transportation easy.
The neighborhood is possibly not the prettiest in NY but it looks plenty of places to buy food nearby. The subway is very close and, in short, one can move quickly. Oh, and it's two blocks from 2Bros Pizzeria, which I warmly recommend for purchase and delivery to your room.
Staff is very kind: all the times. 
Free breakfast is not much, but you can have coffee, take it to your room, and top it off with fruits or other foods you have bought. In the afternoon, we saw it the day we were leaving, they offer a snack.
I recommend this place.

title: Great breakfast
text: My family stayed for four days. Our first day we were greeted with a full snack bar. Great location. Kind staff, clean, and great hot breakfast. Joshua was able to provide gluten free toast. Overall great experience.

title: Good experience
text:
Very good service and the staff members are  kind. Greetings to Jorge, he treated us very nicely!. 
Lo pasamos muy bien, el desayuno muy variado y el personal simpatico.
Era muy bueno el housekeeping, dejaban todo limpio

title: A lot of functionality in a relatively small space
text: The room is cleverly engineered to fit a lot of functionality into a small space - king bed w two night tables, stovetop, midsize refrigerator, small dishwasher, sink, long desk surface, big tv, small wardrobe, bathroom with good sized sink and nice shower - really everything you need for a comfortable stay. Location is good - walkable from Port Authority or Penn Station, and to Times Sauare and Bryant Park. Nice (small) lobby with attractive gas fireplace. Efficient reception. On a weekend, breakfast was crowded and unexciting, and there were lines for the elevators. Overall, a good (relatively) economical comfortable and clean place to stay. Would stay again.

title: Close to Time Square and a pleasureable stay was had by us!
text:
The staff were wonderful no matter what shift they were working.

We enjoyed our stay immensely and loved the smiling faces at the FREE breakfasts everyday, especially Jorge.

He was very happy to help when ANYTHING was wrong and kept our table clean and the whole area very neat and tidy.

My husband has Parkinson's so spills, sloshes, or dropped utensils are an every meal experience.  Jorge brought clean utensils and an extra napkin, before either I or my husband could even get up to fix the issue.

The desk staff were always helpful and cheerful even after a DIFFICULT guest (I was next in line) had been very rude to her/him.

Thanks for another great stay!

title: Great experience, incredibly engaged and accommodating staff. Looking forward to a return stay.
text:
Great experience!  Staff is incredibly accommodating and attentive.  Jorge in the restaurant is willing to do whatever it takes to make you satisfied. Very outgoing and an extremely hard worker.  

Evening reception was nice.  Several staff members thanked me for staying here throughout my stay.  They seemed genuinely interested in making it a perfect experience.

title: Recommendable!
text:
+ Spacious rooms, comfortable sensation
+ Friendly staff, especially in the breakfast buffet (thanks a lot Jorge and Felix)
+ Laundry facilities (washing, drying, iron in the room)
+ Free coffee and tea always available, very convenient 
+ Excellent position for tourist purposes

- Although the hotel claims to be „energy saving“ / „eco friendly“ there is a lot of single use products - totally unnecessary: in the breakfast buffet! That’s just greenwashing and a big minus

title: Fantastic convenient experience
text:
Fantastic room and with the outdoor terrace is an awesome experience 
Staff super friendly on a super busy hotel on a great spot of the city.
From welcoming staff to checking out staff like Jefferson was an awesome experience.

Not my first time here but definitely this hotel and the convenience of kitchen is a exceptional experience

title: Excellent séjour à Manhattan
text: Hôtel confortable bien insonorisé et climatisé,avec une literie douillette et une jolie salle de bains,d 'une propreté irréprochable.Idéalement situé au coeur de Midtown,ce qui permet de visiter les principaux centres d'intérêt à pied:Bryant Park,New York Public Library, Grand Central Station, Chrysler Building ainsi que Times Square.A qq minutes du métro de la 34éme rue.Copieux petit déjeuner en buffet,personnel efficace et agréable.Il y a une petite salle de gym au RDC et une spacieuse terrasse au 22 éme étage.Le seul bémol,la salle du petit déjeuner peut être pleine le matin, mais on peut récupérer une box et le prendre en chambre.Le coin cuisine entièrement équipé permet de manger dans la chambre.Enfin,des boissons chaudes sont à disposition ds le lobby,24h sur 24.Last but not least,nous avons même eu droit à un apéro dinatoire en rentrant un soir.Le prix est assez onéreux,mais nous sommes au coeur de Manhattan,l'agitation de Times Square en moins.Je recommande vivement l'endroit qui s'avère d'un très bon rapport qualité prix.

title: A great visit to Manhattan
text:
We had a great time staying Homewood Suites recently. All of the staff we encountered were very friendly and helpful, the room was spotless and bigger than most of the hotels we have stayed in the area. 
Bed was comfortable and most of all the room was quiet, it was next to an elevator but I never head any noise. 
The hotel is centrally located on a quieter street. It’s close to Broadway, Penn Station, Times Square, Bryant Park, Central Park, The High Line and so much more. 
I have seen a few reviews mention long elevator waits, maybe we got lucky but there were no issues with our stay. 
A week prior we had a terrible experience at a different Hilton property in a different state, this stay really helped Hilton redeem themselves.

title: To have the room ready after a long flight is to win the lottery
text:
Great reception by Jefferson
Our room was ready and after a very long flight, that’s awesome 
The room is very large, with a desk to work and a table to dinne
Microwe and fridge
The hotel is well located , close to the subway ( Penn Station)
Once again, the check inn with Jefferson was excellent

title: Muy recomendable
text: Bien situado a un paso de Times Square, un buen almuerzo, personal muy atento sobre todo el personal de cocina, la limpieza muy correcta. Atención de la recepción 24 horas, siempre leche y café en la recepción.

title: Good access from the station
text: It was a minimum breakfast, but it was very good. I just wanted a table and a chair in the room. The rooftop was cold, but the morning sun was shining on the building in the middle of the city and it was beautiful. Jefferson at the front desk carefully explained the points and responded well.

title: Tolles Hotel in NY
text: Tolles Hotel mit einem sehr freundlichen und zuvorkommenden Team. Die Lage war super. Zentral, mitten in Manhattan, aber ruhig & alles gut zu erreichen. Das Zimmer war sehr geräumig. Das Personal war sehr freundlich und hat während des Aufenthalts nachgefragt, ob alles in Ordnung ist.

title: Great stay after the NYC Marathon
text:
Convenient, clean, and handy to get around mid town and south Manhattan.  Good sized room (king). 

Thanks to Jorge, Joshua and Luis for great, attentive service at breakfast. 

Also thanks Donovan - sorted an extra night for us, we kept our room and each time he saw us was very welcoming and with a smile. Typified the friendly place this is. Thanks mate (from Hugh J 😅).

title: Perfect work trip!
text: I’m in town for work and picked this hotel for the location. I’m so pleased! The room is fantastic, the staff - specifically Juan and AT - are so friendly and super helpful, and I love the environment downstairs around the fire.

title: Great place - will come again!
text: The rooms are good, the location is great but what made the stay is the wonderful staff working here. Everyone is so sweet and welcoming - especially the staff at breakfast. Shout out to Jorge & Joshua!

title: Nice simple hotel
text:
Very well located hotel.

Cleaning on demand which is okay. No issues about that.

Was assigned the wrong room lower category and told that the one I payed for was occupied.  And obviously no refund. 
  
friendly and nice stuff at breakfast buffet , especially Jorge.

title: GRAN HOTEL EN MANHATTAN
text: Muy buen trato por parte de todo el personal del hotel, Felix nos fue  de gran ayuda en todo momento y nos facilito  mucho el desayuno, el hotel en líneas generales es muy recomendable por situación  limpieza y trato personal.

title: Great customer service
text:
Great customer service 
Above and beyond 
Thanks Kristina for starting our weekend right for our friend’s birthday  
Good breakfast and lots of variety 
Clean room and functional 
Quiet area and close to everything

title: Interesting finding no FNC news channel allowed.
text:
Really nice hotel, with very professional and friendly staff.
But was mildly surprised to find that the FNC news channel was "out of service - please tune to alternative channel" makes you wonder why all other news channels were available but just that one was not a choice.

title: OVERBOOKING
text:
Notre chambre a été overbookée ; nous avons du attendre 3H avant de pouvoir dormir, dans un autre hôtel ! 
Nous entendons nos voisins parler depuis notre chambre !
Il y avait beaucoup trop de gens a l' hotel pour le petit dejeuner c 'ete tres complique de trouver une place assise !

title: Good stay
text: Hotel ideally situated in mid-town Manhattan. Just down the road from Penn Station. Rooms spacious, clean and well equipped. Would have given a 5 rating but attitude of a couple of staff was very poor. Great idea to supply takeaway breakfast boxes. Would definitely return.

title: Thank You Jorge
text: Jorge in the breakfast area was so sweet and attentive. He made my hotel trip even better than being almost robbed $300 from the front desk clerk, Giovanni. Thank you Jorge for taking the time to check in on me and my family!!!!

title: Best Service!
text: Had an amazing first time in NYC at the Homewood Suites! Jorge was an excellent server and the breakfast was fantastic. Super friendly staff!! Great experience in NYC. I would recommend that people come back!

title: Just like at home, with friendly service as well.
text: Hotel in a great location, 2 minutes walk from the metro. Quick and easy check in/out. The staff is top notch, always available while being discreet. Comfortable bed and well soundproofed room. The sofa bed is just right for a child. Cleaning done every day. Accessible roof top, very nice in the evening with a little relaxing music. Lots of people at breakfast (Halloween period) but the staff is very attentive and fills the trays gradually. The muffins are terribly delicious accompanied by hot chocolate :)...Look no further, this is the place to go.

title: Bon rapport qualité/prix
text:
Les + l’emplacement, la vue, le RoofTop, le petit déjeuner, la chambre avec Kitchenette, la salle de sport, petit déjeuner inclus et copieux. Bien insonorisé. Lit confortable. Ascenseur rapide. 
Le - manque de table au petit déjeuner et attente au buffet. Canapé peu confortable 

Nous recommanderons

title: Top hotel for vacation
text:
Wir haben diese Unterkunft gebucht, da wir ein Hotel mit vernünftigem Preis-Leistungs-Verhältnis gesucht haben und hofften, dies im Homewood Suites zu finden.
Dann haben wir negative Bewertungen bzgl. Zimmerservice und Sauberkeit gelesen und waren kurz vor dem Check-In verunsichert. 

Es hat sich nicht(!) bestätigt.

Das Hotel ist top! Alles sehr gut zu erreichen, sowohl mit Gepäck bei An- und Abreise, als auch zu sämtlichen Shopping- oder Ausflugtrips in und um New York. 
Das Personal ist sehr freundlich und hilfsbereit. Ein frühzeitiger Check-In war kein Problem. Beim Check-Out konnten wir die Koffer bis am späten Nachmittag gesichert im Hotel abstellen. 

Das Zimmer war groß! Ein großes Bett, eine ausziehbare Couch. Das ist für New Yorker Verhältnisse fast schon eine Wohnung ;-)

Das Zimmer wurde jeden Tag gereinigt. Täglich frische Handtücher etc. Wir waren damit sehr zufrieden, da haben wir in Deutschland manchmal schon einen ganz anderen Zimmerservice erlebt. 

Das Frühstück in Buffetform. Nun - amerikanisch halt. Muss man wissen, bevor man bucht. Bagel, Toast (auch Vollkorn), aber eben kein Brot oder Brötchen wie wir es aus Deutschland kannten. Ebenfalls gab es keinen Wurst- oder Käseaufschnitt. Dafür Waffeln mit Sirup, Bagel, Eier (gebraten, gerührt oder gekocht), Pancakes, Würstchen, Bratkartoffeln, Taccos. Als Aufstrich verschiedene Marmeladen, Erdnussbutter, Frischkäse, Honig…  
Aber auch Obst mit Joghurt, Müsli, Oat war verfügbar.

Wir kommen gerne wieder! :)

title: Très bonne expérience
text:
Chambre propre et de qualité 
Personnel très gentil/très bon accueil 
Très bien situé à 10/15 minutes à pied de Times Square 
Petit déjeuner très copieux et varié (sucré et salé) 
Le seul point faible du séjour pourrait être l’attente au petit déjeuner car la salle est trop petite mais très bon hôtel

title: Estancia miy agradable
text:
Hemos estado 8 noches en este hotel 5 amigas. Ha sito muy agradable, nos hemos sentido bien atendidas por los empleados, especial mención a Jessica, que solucionó cualquier contratiempo siempre con una sonrisa.

El desayuno muy completo. Mucha rapidez de los empleados para reponer los productos, graciasc a Félix y Josttyn.  En pocos minutos siempre conseguimos mesa.

Nuestras habitaciones las encontramos siempre limpias y bien arregladas. La nevera hace un poco de ruido, pero el rincón cocina es un plus.

Gracias a todos!!!!@

title: Octubre en ny
text: Muy bien todo, la habitación con heladera/ freezer , microondas, lavavajillas, anafe, ollas, vajilla, cafetera , secador de pelo. Nos toco piso 17 con habitación a la calle , con la ventana cerrada no se escuchaba nada . Tiene una terraza en el piso 22 muy lindo y las vistas son hermosas

title: Atención de Josttyn
text: La atención recibida por Josttyn en el desayuno fue excelente. Me atendió muy bien y con mucha amabilidad. Logró resolver mi problema siendo celiaca y consiguió desayuno sin gluten. Me recibió todos los días contento y siempre muy cordial. Recomendaría siempre la atención con él.

title: Great location, great staff, will stay again!
text: Well equipped rooms although compact, very friendly staff, great location away from the street noise, free hot water & coffee throughout the day & daily housekeeping. Kitchenette was very useful. Unfortunately we needed to extend our stay but no rooms were available. So we've just moved to Hyatt Centric times square & I'm disappointed already. Would have loved to stay longer at Homewood Suites Hilton!

title: Good expérience
text:
Je suis venu en famille. Belle expérience dans cette hotel et les employés sont vraiment sympa surtout Josttyn and Felix ! Bon petit déjeuner avec beaucoup de choix
Très Bien situé, chambre à la hauteur des photos.

title: Well
text: At the begining the breakfast was horrible becaud at 6 am wasn't hot meal, thé second day, at 8.30 am there wasn't bread, hot meal, boil egg and afterJosttyn arrive and it was wonderfull, all dishes was in the breakfast room.

title: Good place for a family trip!
text: Venus pour un voyage en famille nous sommes très contents de cet hôtel. Nous avons choisi une chambre avec cuisine parfait pour se réchauffer des plats le soir. Le lit adulte est très grand, le lit canapé est suffisant pour un enfant de 12 ans. Lits fiat tous les jours, petit déjeuner varié et josttyn is so friendly and do a very good work😉

title: Great place to stay...quiet and walking distance to many attractions
text:
We just returned from a 7 day trip to New York where we stayed at the Homewood Suites [no resort fees], which is located in the Garment District.  This hotel was in a great location...close to Penn Station [about a 5 minute walk], Macy's, Times Square, Bryant Park, etc. Our room was a king with a small loveseat.  It had a good size fridge and a two top burner [which we didn't use].  The bed was very comfortable and the room was extremely quiet.  We were on the 19th floor and overlooked a quiet dead end street.  We had a good view of the building where the Edge Observation deck is located.  The hotel has a rooftop terrace that was nice, as well.  The hotel also has a self-serve laundry.  We used it once while there - cost between $8 and $10 for wash and dry [the dryer wasn't very effective, so it did take a while to dry clothes and some we laid out in the room to dry].

Breakfast is included and coffee/tea is available 24/7.  There were 3 food sections - one was cereal and fruit, one was breads and pastries that could be toasted, and one was a hot food area.  The hot food area was interesting.  There were a few days where I thought the choices were a bit odd - corned beef and hash was an offering one morning.  Always a type of sausage offered, but never bacon.  And, the food in this area was lukewarm, at best.  That would be my only complaint. 

If you arrive before your room is ready, the staff will hold your luggage for you so that you can go out and start exploring.  Other reviews will mention the homeless people.  We did see them, but not directly in front of the hotel.  We did not have any approach us, and we never felt unsafe.  I did notice that early morning and late evening, they seemed to "disappear" from the surrounding areas.  Not sure where they went.  

Couple of restaurant choices that we liked near the hotel - Tick Tock Diner and Joyce Public House.  We had breakfast at Tick Tock and dinner at Joyce. We enjoyed both.

title: New York City 2023
text: We really lucked out with this hotel. Room was very spacious and the breakfast each day saved us a fortune. Location is perfect for our day trips around the city and the staff were really helpful. Gym onsite wasn’t busy and we had the chance to use the equipment each day. Special mention to Josttyn who helped us each day and really made sure we were looked after.

title: On recommande à 100% !
text: Josttyn est aux petits soins avec nous ! Il s’est occupé de nous pour le petit déjeuner et il a été de très bon conseil pour nos visites ! Merci à lui ;-)  malgré de mauvais avis sur le petit déjeuner, on a trouvé ça très bon. La chambre est impeccable, spacieuse et très propre ! Super expérience et magnifique hôtel !!!

title: JOSTTYN
text: Josttyn ha sido el más amable de los colaboradores del hotel con nosotros,  tiene calidez humana y latina, ha platicado con nosotros y nos ha ofrecido sus servicios para cuando lo necesitáramos. Estamos muy contentos con el.

title: Muy bueno
text: Encantados con la experiencia, totalmente recomendable, una buena estancia, en pleno centro y muy cerca de times square, con un desayuno excelente y muy bien atendidos por Jorge y Félix. Lo recomendare a la gente que conozca y que vayan a venir

title: A perfect home away from home in Midtown Manhattan.
text:
A very convenient location in Midtown Manhattan. Transportation is so easy by the subway or car service or famous New York City yellow cab. The hotel is located right between New York Penn Station and Port Authority bus station and you ca connect and travel to other parts the country from both stations. The hotel really feels like a home where you can bring your own groceries and make your own food yourself.
Everyday complimentary breakfast is a beautiful thing to start your day with.
Just one the nicest hotels in midtown Manhattan period!

title: Amazing family getaway! Will not be disappointed.
text:
Awesome job by the entire team at the Homewood Suites by Hilton Manhattan Time Square!  Excellent service and hospitality given by the front desk, housekeeping and breakfast staff! 

Also, the General Manager Jonathan Lomitola was superb! Awesome guy!

title: Josttyn was very helpful
text:
Breakfast was amazing and Josttyn was very polite, helpful and kind! 
Rooms are clean and have a lot of space! Loved the fact that have tea and coffee all day for the guests! Location is perfect and very near to times sq

title: Perfect servis during breakfast
text: Our stay was fantastic! We enjoyed the breakfast the most. We were lucky to have Josttyn to make our stay even more comfortable when he always made sure our table was clean and that we had everything during breakfast. Thank you Josttyn!

title: Visit to New York
text: Family room was quite small with limited storage and no where to sit considering it had a small kitchen. However great service from Josttyn during the breakfast time, very polite and helpful, a credit to the Homewood staff.

title: Reseña de hotel
text: La hemos pasado excelente, el área del la comida es muy buena. La ubicación del hotel la mejor de todas. El trato del personal es muy amable. Muy excelente estadía. Comida muy completa. Las habitaciones son cómodas

title: Great hotel with everything you might want
text: The hotel has hardwood floor, which is rare in HILTON hotels.  Hot breakfast was plentiful and even has boxes for carry out.  Dining staff were very efficient and friendly.   Really enjoyed my stay here, and would choose this hotel again if coming back to NYC

title: Thank you for Josttyn!
text:
Josttyn was very kind to me!
I would like to come back to see him again!
The room was spacious and the breakfast was delicious!

Room was spacious and comfortable
Coffee was always available

Thank you!

title: Muy bien 👌🏽
text:
La atención ha sido maravilla, Adriana Baca en el área de la cocina nos ha atendido fabuloso ha sido muy amable y cortes, 

Necesitábamos asistencia en español y bueno allí estuvo ella para solucionarlo 😄
volveré!!!

title: Great service in the Breakfast area!
text: The team in the breakfast area were friendly and welcoming. Super accommodating and kind. Anytime we went down to get food they were excited to welcome us in and clean off a table for us. Great time overall

title: Excelente hotel
text: Excelente ubicación, cama cómoda, desayuno diferente todos los días, estación de café 24h, la atención de todo el personal fue increíble, especialmente Félix y Justin nos hicieron sentir como en casa

title: Lo recomiendo
text: La habitación muy bonita y tenía de todo, el desayuno muy bueno y los camareros muy atentos, nos atendió Felix y estuvo muy atento a lo que nos faltaba y fue muy simpático, en general nos gustó todo, la situación del apartamento que está céntrico, la limpieza de la habitación y todo en general, si vuelvo a Nueva York me volvería a hospedar aqui

title: Una recomendación, disfrutar de esta linda experiencia.
text: Excelente servicio, nos atendieron muy bien, el lugar muy lindo, los ascensores muy rápidos, desayuno incluido, comida deliciosa, la habitación es cómoda, lugar espacioso, nos trataron muy bien y una buena experiencia para recordar

title: We had a great stay!
text: I was initially apprehensive when entering the hotel as it was very busy. However, I was pleasantly surprised by a clean room and continued excellent customer service. I highly recommend this hotel for visitors who want to be close enough to all of what New York City has to offer, but also want a quiet and comfortable place to rest at night and in between exploring. There is a little bit of a view from the quiet rooftop. There is also an outdoor patio to eat in during breakfast. With the great customer service, variety of breakfast offerings, and proximity to activities, I cannot recommend this hotel more. I would come back even just for the warm greeting, chocolate on my pillow and fluffy bed. Thank you to the staff for making our stay comfortable!!!

title: Assolutamente consigliato!
text:
Lo consiglio vivamente, rapporto qualità/prezzo ottimo, camera ampia ben servita con piccolo angolo cucina con occorrente per colazione (bustine per the, camomilla, caffè, zucchero), presenti stoviglie e pentole, frigorifero,lavastoviglie, microonde.
Veramente completa di tutto l’occorrente .
Letto molto ampio e comodo. 
Completamente insonorizzata, ero al sesto piano, nessun rumore percepito.
Personale gentilissimo.

title: Perfect for families without the noise of Times Square
text: We arrived so early on a Thursday morning  (as did many others) and the opportunity to hold our luggage while we explored allllll day and early evening was so nice. The front staff was helpful and by Friday and Saturday mornings I was thanking the breakfast staff as it got CRAZY with rude/pushy people— these workers kept their cool and were efficient and accommodating. The room was skinny but but appropriate for the city. Love HWS for the cooking nook. :-)

title: Exelente
text:
La atención fue excelente, especialmente la de Josttin, muy atento y diligente durante el desyuno. 
La ubicación del hotel, el house keeping, la cama y la cocina de la habitación son excelentes.
Lo recomiendo y volvería!

title: Muy buena experiencia
text:
Excelente atención del personal, en especial Justyn. 
Desayuno completo,  van reponiendo lo que falta.
Habitación muy cómoda. Tiene una bonita terraza donde se puede ver el  atardecer cuando no hace frío

title: Como en Casa
text:
Nos sentimos muy cómodos , la habitación muy bien con su cocina completa. 

La terraza es la frutilla del postre

El personal muy atentos 
Felix recordaba hasta nuestros nombres😊 mu amable.

El desayuno bueno te podes llevar lo q quieras

title: A budget friendly accommodation in Manhattan
text: Rushed into town for a 6-day stay, Michel and the staff were friendly and did wonders by showing the room first and we felt so glad to have a peaceful stay during the pouring rain and flood in NY. If you would like to stay in Manhattan on a budget, definitely pick this location where you can sleep 5 in a room.

title: Una semana en NYC
text:
El personal del Hotel es muy amable y atento. Debo destacar a  Idris Sare ( Guest Service Agent), muy paciente, servicial y predispuesto. 
El desayuno es muy variado y tiene la posibilidad de armar viandas para llevar durante el recorrido del día, lo que resuelve meriendas o cenas. Los miércoles sirven además del desayuno, una merienda muy completa, que incluye sopas y quesos .
Las habitaciones son cómodas y muy bien equipadas. La limpieza del Hotel también es un punto importante a destacar.
Está ubicado  muy cerca de  Penn station, lo que hace muy fácil trasladarse hacia cualquier destino de Manhattan y viceversa.
El barrio del hotel es seguro, en ningún momento viví situaciones de peligro, solo mencionar , pero que pasa en otros lugares también, la presencia de personas "zombies" pero que no hacen nada.
Sin dudas es un Hotel que volvería a elegir en mi próxima visita a NYC.

title: Great
text:
It was great! Lovely experince! Thanks for reception that gave me the key right the way to explore NYC ( Harlene Mahlie  and team) hope to be back soon! My best!!!!!!! 
Also love the location! At the heart of NYC

title: The BEST experience ever! We LOVE Homewood Suites!
text: We loved every aspect of this hotel and it was perfect for us. We enjoyed having the space including a sofa, microwave and hob AND breakfast included was an amazing treat and made the whole experience great value as well. The bed was super-comfortable with great pillows, the bathroom and shower were great, the lighting perfect. The suite was sound-proofed, very quiet and had good air-conditioning. I send warmest thanks to the lovely staff for their helpfulness and kindness. It was my 70th birthday while I was there and they made it an absolute treat with a special personally signed birthday card and sparkling gift. We stayed for 4 nights, when the rain was torrential every day. The hotel was a wonderfully comfortable haven from the storms where we could also eat in. We loved our time there. THANK YOU to Jonathan the manager and to all the staff at Homewood Suites. We are so grateful to you for making our stay so wonderful and cannot recommend you more highly!

title: Good Location
text: Good location easy to find  warm welcome. Breakfast buffet always busy and not refilled. Roof space a nice quiet area away from the crowds. Room with full facilities clean and well equipped excellent room service

title: Attentive and Friendly
text: I've been working with the team here for several weeks to ask questions and request services for our stay. They've been attentive and friendly! Thank you for helping our family enjoy our first experience to New York!

title: Breakfast-gluten and dairy free
text: Nice large breakfast with gluten free and a couple dairy free choices. Luis &Lizbeth did well!   Lizbeth was SOOO helpful letting me read the ingredients list on the food so we could find my son and I something we could safely eat!  Good start to the day!

title: Homewood Suits by Hilton New York .
text: The treatment is very upscale, the employees are helpful and always smiling. I was happy to deal with the hotel, whether from the general manager and the rest of the employees Eighteen  as well as Josttym Thank you very much all and for sure i will recommend to all my friends .

title: Excelente  servicio
text:
Excelente servicio  y atención. 
Excelente  ubicación y predisposición. 
Excelente desempeño del personal  como Josttyn en colaboración y amabilidad..
Calidad de los alimentos al igual q las frutas y los las verduras all igual q el servicio al cuarto.
Además la limpieza y el orden.

title: Great hotel to visit the city !
text: We spent an amazing 10 days stay at the Homewood Suites. The hotel is well located in the city. The staff is very welcoming, nice and helpful. The bedroom was very spacious, comfortable  and well equipped. Even though it can get very crowded (especially on rainy days when the terrace is closed) the breakfast was delicious and different every day. At the end of the day, they offered us a refreshments which was quite enjoyable. Special thanks to Josttyn, who was particularly available and always eager to help!

title: Great place to stay
text: The staff was friendly and helpful. The room was clean and comfortable. Josttyn was always cleaning and with a smile! He offered assistance at every turn. Kristina with a “K” took excellent care of us all week. We missed her when she had a day off.

title: Amazing, 100% recommended
text: The room was very comfortable, the small kitchen was a nice bonus. The staff was amazing and friendly, especially Josttyn. This hotel has a great location, is clean, and has great service. The breakfast is great. I’ll definitely stay here again.

title: Great experience
text: The experience was great!! Hotel staff is top notch! Very helpful and customer oriented. Josttym was the one that stood out! He was professional and friendly! Thank you too everyone that worked hard to make our stay great.

title: Great spacious experience
text: The hotel was great. Rooms was very spacious especially for New York City. It worked great for 5 guests! Location was also very good. Jefferson at reception was very helpful and got us quickly into our rooms!

title: Okay place to stay
text: This was not my first time there. The proximity to meeting venue is a great advantage. The rate for the first night was super expensive because of the UN General Assembly. The employees were polite and helpful and the beverage area was completely stacked at all times. The snacks in the room were non existent.

title: Room sat empty but early check-in could not be accommodated
text: Waited all day for an early check-in but we could not be accommodated -- while the room sat empty.  By 4pm, the breakfast area was completely packed with luggage of guests waiting to check in.  While waiting for exactly 4pm, guests were given 500 points ($1-$2 value) to listen to the Hilton timeshare salespeople spiel in the lobby.  Bed was uncomfortably hard.  Minimal shower water pressure.  Mirror was not aligned with sink, and view was blocked by a huge blue sticker.  Lots of unfortunate homeless living on this street.  Would not stay there again.

title: Great Hotel and staff
text: Josttym  was  very  helpful  and  had  amazing  service.  Hotel  was  very  clean,  good  location  easy  to  access  places  from.  All  staff  are  very  friendly and  extremely  helpful  with  everything

title: Amazing experiance
text: I would like to take a moment to share a very special experiance and great time at homewood suites.  The staff at Homewood suites in Manhattan, NY,  all around were by far the best I have ever  experienced.   From the time we checked in and met the staff at the desk, we felt at home until the moment we left, (well even after).  During our departure,  My wife left a very important jacket in our room as we checked out.  For runners it is called a "Ragnar" and she waited 50 years to run this race as a team member.  So you can see how important this jacket was to her.  The housekeeping staff took in upon themselves to make sure we got it home.  When I could not get a prepaid package sent to the hotel, the manager took it upon herself and at her own expense to send the jacket back to my wife.  It brings back something very special to today's society..  I want to thank everyone at Homewood Suites for an outstanding and unforgettable 2 day stay.  They truly went above and beyond to give us a NewYork experiance, that we will never forget, We will be back,  and I will never forget the personal attention they gave us all around  . Thank you.  Carl & Sue

title: The best hotel in NYC
text: I loved every detail of the hotel, the breakfast was perfect and the cleaning service was awsome and the guys who work there are very attentious and kind. When I come Back tô NYC I have a hotel to come Back and its homewood

title: Very good value
text: The hotel was clean and efficient. The staff were friendly and helpful especially Jefferson on reception who was very helpful in facilitating an early check in after a long journey.  The room was bright with good cooking facilities and breakfast the following morning was very good.

title: Wonderful hotel
text: Always scary to try a new hotel, but we were delighted.  Wonderful, spacious room with full kitchen, fantastic shower and even a nice view out the window.  Very welcoming staff at the front desk, spotless room, comfortable bed, and everything was in working order.   A nice hot breakfast in the morning was also included.   And it was HALF THE PRICE of the hotel we used to stay at.  This is now our favorite hotel in NYC.

title: A Home Away From Home 🗽
text:
I had a pretty decent experience. Was able to check in through my phone and access my room before I reached the hotel which was great. The lobby was nice and inviting. Didn’t have to wait in any lines or come in contact with anyone. Just went straight to my room! 

The staff, although I didn’t have to come in contact with them that much, were good. It really does help & makes a big difference when you have enough staff to cover different areas throughout the hotel! 

It is a safe hotel. You have to use your room key for everything!

The complimentary breakfast was ok. Glad they had different options (cold & hot) available. The options were on the healthier side. A variety of fruits to choose from……… eggs, potatoes, turkey & chicken sausage, turkey bacon, french toast, pancakes, oatmeal, etc. I liked that they had to-go boxes if you wanted to take some food with you. 

The rooms were great!!! Lots of space and the kitchen was fully furnished (stove, dishwasher, sink, pots, pans, untensils) in case you wanted to cook or anything. There was also a huge refrigerator in the room with plenty of space to store your food & drinks. Felt like a mini home!

The hotel is in a good location, about a 5-10mins. walk to Times Square, Broadway, and the Subway. Madison Square Gardens is about the same distance in the opposite direction. 

Will stay here again if I visit NYC! 👍🏼🗽

title: Very pleased
text:
We were very pleased with our five night stay. The Hotel seemed very well managed and staff were helpful and polite. Our room/studio was clean and quiet (though light sleepers may find the fridge noise a little annoying at night). Nice to get a  breakfast in the hotel; the eating area was pleasant, the breakfast ok.
Location in centre of Midtown Manhattan was perfect for us. The streets in the area were busy and noisy but for us existing; the hotel a bit of a sanctuary.

title: Best Customer Service!
text: The staff is amazing. They really go out of their way to help customers in their time of need. Would like to specifically mention Donnaven who helped us tremendously. We will definitely be back to stay at this Homewood Suites on our next trip to NYC!

title: New York in September
text: Had a great experience at this hotel. Very clean and on time with the check in process. The unlimited coffee and included breakfast make you feel at home. The staff had excellent personalities and made all communication easy. Friendly staff and inviting. Thanks to Mahliek for keeping the hotel appealing to guests!

title: Excelente localização, ótimo atendimento, Patrick nos atendeu na recepção , brasileiro é muito atencioso
text: Localização ótima , estação de metrô muito perto , hotel limpo, receptação quem nos atendeu foi um brasileiro chamado Patrick , muito atencioso., super indico!. Quartos bons , banheiro moderno, televisão grande frigobar, cafeteira , banheiro tem shampoo, condicionador .

title: Vacaciones
text: El hotel está bien ubicado y el servicio correcto. La atención al cliente ha sido excelente, sobretodo la de un trabajador llamado Pedro, siempre estaba para ayudar en todo lo que necesitábamos. Nos encantó!

title: Worst hotel ever
text: The worst hotel in all of Manhattan, drug addicts right outside the entrance, a discussing breakfast, woken up night and day by another guest's dog. A hell ! Run away ! The management just do nothing about it, can’t wait to live they ruined my holidays.

title: Una buena opción en Nueva York
text:
Es un hotel muy cómodo y muy bien situado.
Nuestra habitación tenía una cocina completa, que puede resultar muy útil si en algún momento no te apetece salir a comer.
Está limpio y el personal es muy amable.
Lo único con lo que no estoy de acuerdo es cuando hablan del desayuno como continental, está muy lejos de eso.
Por lo demás, totalmente recomendable.

title: Increíble
text: Josttyn súper agradable y servicial. Nos ayudó en todo momento, en todo lo que necesitábamos. Una gran persona. Incluso sin pedírselo siempre estaba para ayudarnos. Habla español e inglés perfectamente. Siempre está con una sonrisa dispuesto a ayudar. Un 10 de empleado

title: A truly gem!!!
text:
I had the most incredible stay at this hotel, and I can't say enough about the exceptional staff who made our experience unforgettable. From the moment we arrived, they treated us like family.

Justyn, in particular, went above and beyond to make sure our family and baby were comfortable throughout our stay. His kindness and willingness to assist us at every turn were truly remarkable. He is a valuable asset to the hotel.

Felix, another standout team member, was consistently professional and attentive. His dedication to ensuring our needs were met was evident in every interaction.

Mr. Pedro deserves special mention for his sweetness, cooperation, and hard work. His warm demeanor made our mornings even brighter, and we were genuinely grateful for his efforts.

Jose and Donovan also contributed to our wonderful experience with their attentiveness and willingness to assist. Donovan, in particular, stood out with his 24/7 availability and exceptional attitude at the front desk.

Chuma, the security guard, deserves a round of applause for his dedication to guest safety. It's clear that he takes his role seriously and is willing to go to great lengths to defend the guests.

The hotel itself is lovely, and the staff's commitment to excellence elevates it to another level. We were so comfortable that we didn't want our vacation to end. The location is perfect, and the cleanliness and comfort of the hotel are top-notch.

We can't wait to return and experience this hospitality once again. Thank you to the entire team for making our stay so memorable. This hotel is a true gem!

title: Muy bueno todo!
text: Muy bueno el hotel y el desayuno! Felix nos pareció encantador. Muy buena su atención. Muy atento. Apenas llegamos nos recibió increíble. Nos dejaron entrar a la habitación antes. Las habitaciones re grandes!

title: El mejor hotel para pasar tus dias en ny
text: Increible desayuno gran variedad y podes llevarte para pasar el dia varias cosas. las camas muy comodas,Muy amables los chicos de servicio , atentos a cada pedido y con gran simpatia. Buenisima ubicacion

title: un hotel valido per new york
text: ho soggiornato a settembre 2023, posizione centrale, staff gentile e disponibile, colazione abbondante con possibilità di fare una lunch box senza limitazioni, ma non comprende salumi. oltre a yogurt, frutta, cereali, dolcetti vari e pane sono presenti ogni giorno uova, patate e carne cucinata ogni giorno in modo diverso. nella hall è sempre disponibile 24h su 24 acqua calda, caffè, tè a volontà. le camere hanno una cucina completa che ti permette (volendo) di cucinare qualsiasi cosa. per chi cerca un soggiorno a new york direi che ne vale la pena.

title: Excelente experiencia, ubicación inmejorable con una atención privilegiada. La mejor opción para recorrer Nueva York!!!!
text: El hotel tiene una ubicación inmejorable. La atención del personal es muy cordial sobretodo la de Josttyn que nos atendió muy bien en el desayuno y nos dio valiosa información para recorrer la ciudad. La caja que brindan en el desayuno es clave! Excelente experiencia

title: Hotel muy completo
text: Hotel completo. La atención del personal es excelente. Josttyn (empleado del hotel) nos ayudó con nuestras inquietudes muy amablemente, recomendándonos sitios de la ciudad, ofreciendo su ayuda y servicio durante el desayuno. Clave la caja que te dan en el desayuno para vianda.

title: Super hôtel !
text:
Hôtel très bien placé, personnel aimable et chambre très confortable. 
Le petit-déjeuner continental est riche, varié et copieux. 
Le rooftop avec la vue sur the Edge est vraiment agréable pour boire un café ou manger une pizza.  J'y retournerai sans aucune hésitation.

title: Nice service..!
text: Josttym is sweetest person in the breakfast area…! He is so helpful and friendly. Help us to clean up our table and refill the food when we told him it’s empty. Good service. thank you so much josttym..!

title: Great service and hospitality
text:
Josttym was great and provided us with excellent service! Super helpful and very hospitable. 
Would definitely recommend staying here, they helped us to check in early and even let us enjoy breakfast the morning we arrived!

title: Best stay ever
text:
I would give a 5 out of 5 stars for everything. Pedro was incredible at breakfast and made sure all the food was filled as well as all of the other staff. Joattah(spelling) made sure everything was clean. The breaks was delish. AJ  made sure we were happy. 

Washed our clothes in the laundry and didn’t have any issues. Called for more towels and other essentials for the room and were brought up in a timely manner. 
Hotel was clean. Would definitely stay here again.

title: Vacaciones
text:
Formidable hotel céntrico y limpio. Personal excepcional, amable, cariñoso y siempre facilitando y solucionando las cosas. Habitacio grande y desayuno muy bueno.situacion del hotel inmejorable y céntrica.
Repetiría con ellos

title: Muy muy bien!
text: Muy placentera la estadía, el hotel cómodo y limpio. La habitación espaciosa, éramos cuatro y estuvimos a gusto, la limpieza es para destacar. El desayuno estuvo bien, bastante completo. La atención del personal fue muy buena, todos amables y cordiales.

title: Una experiencia inolvidable.
text:
Una experiencia muy buena, la cuál repetiría sin dudarlo.
Respecto al hotel, muy buena ubicación e instalaciones agradables.
Desayuno completo.
Respecto al personal, agradables y serviciales, aún que, personalmente el que me destaca es Pedro, se ofreció a ayudarme sin dudarlo, muy profesional.

title: New york
text: Buenas instalaciones, buena ubicación, y muy bien desayuno. El personal muy simpático. Sobretodo Pedro, quién fue muy simpático, atento y cercano, ya que tuvimos unos problemas y el sin dudarlo nos ayudó.

title: Great stay while at the US Open.
text: Great location wonderful staff excellent service especially Jelani, Mahliek, and  Christina at the front desk.  Excellent value.  We arrived early and they made it possible to get into our room early. Good location- easy walking distance to Penn Station and to Times Square.

title: Oasis in a busy and noisy city
text: This is an oasis among the noisy and chaotic surrounding.   We took Amtrak to NYC and walked from the station to the hotel - so convenient! The suite we stayed in was clean everything worked; the staff members were friendly and helpful.  The hot breakfast every morning between 7 and 10 am was great.  We saw many guests pack food for their lunch or snack for their day trip.  Considering the price of food in NYC, a family could save $50-$70 per day just for the food you can bring with you!   It is also minutes from subway stations so visiting various parts of NYC was convenient.  The only inconvenience we experienced was waiting for the elevators during the busy hours (morning breakfast time, for example).  We stayed on 10th floor so a few times we simply walked the stairs up to our suite.  Checking in and checking out was convenient; you could do it on your apps and do not have to stay in line.  Hotel staff appeared to be very accommodating; we saw guests store their luggage in the lobby area; presumably they arrived early or want to leave later than check out time (12 noon) and temporarily store their luggage.  Thank you for a wonderful stay at NYC.

title: Ottima posizione
text:
Personale molto gentile. Ambiente molto curato e colazione con disponibilità di prodotti senza glutine.
Le camere dispongono di una pratica cucina con tutti gli elettrodomestici necessari per cucinare.
Particolarmente disponibile e attento ad ogni esigenza il cameriere Felix.

title: SUPER!
text:
Mrs. Karen made you feel like first class. She had a beautiful smile that brighten up your visit. I would recommend anyone I know to visit this place because of her attitude. The place was super clean !The 
uniforms were very neat.

title: Buona struttura
text: Un hotel dalla ottima posizione che ha tutto ciò che serve, compresa una discreta colazione. Ringrazio in particolare e con piacere Adriana e Felix che ci hanno sempre aiutato con estrema cortesia per le esigenze gluten free, dimostrandosi professionali ed accorti.

title: Great hotel close to Penn Station
text:
We had a wedding in New Jersey/New York and decided we wanted to take our kids to the city for the first time. 
I loved that the location is a short walk from Penn Station and had Queen beds.
We had a city view Queen Suite. We loved the full size fridge especially we could stock up on beverages from a grocery and have them cold or freeze a water bottle even. Our son wanted to buy frozen dumplings in China town and cook them at the hotel. The city view was nice and the kids loved having a late night dinner of 2 Bros Pizza on the 22nd floor rooftop terrace the night we arrived. The rotating breakfast was a great start to the day. It’s easy walking distance to a lot of Midtown attractions like The Highline, Times Square, or dinner in Hell’s Kitchen.
The staff was great and super helpful and great for food. We will definitely be staying here again.

title: Loved my stay!
text: This property provides a great location and great accommodations for travelers especially for those looking for long term stays, it’s staff are quick to accommodate as best they can and breakfast while very crowded at times is acceptable in many ways, I personally felt very lucky to have mr Pedro assist me with breakfast accommodations due to my food allergies and thank him dearly and wish him the best. This hotel I not only recommend but also hope can maintain such great service for the foreseeable future.

title: Great Property, Great Location= Great experience
text: I greatly enjoyed my stay at this property, the staff from the reception to housekeeping to breakfast (PEDRO). They were all great and very accommodating, location is best not too centered and yet not too far away from all attractions in the TimeSquare area. My family and I will return. Thank you Homewood Suites in Midtown Manhattan, much love.

title: Easy, comfortable, and convenient hotel with large rooms.
text: Large, comfortable rooms and great service from Jelani at the front desk.  They were helpful, friendly, and accommodating.  Perfect home base for a family of four’s trip to NY.  The location is convenient to everything and Jelani provided us with great restaurant recommendations.

title: Benissimo...ma con un piccolo disguido
text:
Bellissima struttura, pulita, con un'offerta di servizi non equiparabile a nulla nella zona (camera con avastoviglie, microonde e lavatrici/asciugatrici a gettoni in hotel).
Solo 2 piccoli nei nel nostro soggiorno: camera affacciata sul cortile interno con vista motori condizionatori e qualche problema con la colazione negli ultimi 3 giorni del soggiorno (12 giorni totali).
A causa di un problema con il delivery, non c'era nulla da mangiare a colazione e questo ci ha costretti a mangiare altrove, spendendo parecchi dollari per qualcosa che avrebbe dovuto essere compreso nel soggiorno già pagato.E questa è una a mio avviso inqualificabile. 
Cose che capitano,  ci mancherebbe, ma nessuno che ci abbia messo la faccia per scusarsi!

title: Great Spacious Suite with Kitchen Amenities, close to River Park.
text: This is our third time staying at Homeward Suites.   I enjoy the hospitality each time me, my husband and fur babies visit.   The rooms are very spacious with full kitchen, and you can get separated rooms attached.   Bathroom and showers are big.    Pillows and bed are very comfortable, and the AC works with no noise.   I love that they provide pool towels daily outside.  The breakfast buffet is one of the best I've seen.  Lots of food options and choices for everyone that has diet/allergic restrictions.  The next time I visit, I will start asking for what room number I want to stay in as this seems to be my families favorite get away from city life.

title: OTTIMA SOLUZIONE PER VISITARE LA GRANDE MELA
text:
Ho pernottato in questa struttura per 5 notti a fine Aprile, con mia moglie e 3 figli piccoli.
Per noi si è trattata della soluzione ideale per la nostra prima esperienza a New York. Abbiamo infatti optato per un appartamento anziché una camera semplice per avere la possibilità la sera di cenare tranquillamente in camera senza mettersi alla ricerca di un posto dove mangiare, visto che avevamo il più piccolo dei figli di nemmeno 2 anni.
L’appartamento era grande, ben arredato, con due camere separate, un divano letto, un tavolo per cenare, una cucina molto attrezzata (fornelli, forno, frigo, lavastovoglie più tutte le stoviglie) e un bel bagno grande con doccia separata.
Tutto veramente comodo e ideale per le nostre esigenze.
La colazione (inclusa nel prezzo) a buffet è davvero ricchissima di piatti internazionali e bevande sia calde che fredde. Le bevande oltretutto sono a disposizione gratuitamente h24 per tutti gli ospiti della struttura.

Al nostro arrivo ci era stato promesso che avremmo trovato la stanza già sistemata con il divano letto pronto e il lettino aggiuntivo per il piccolo già montato, ma così non è stato. Va detto però che il personale dell’hotel si è subito attivato per risolvere la questione e in pochi minuti hanno mandato un dipendente a preparare il tutto.

Unici piccoli difetti, ma completamente trascurabili:
- il fatto che gli appartamenti risentano un po' del rumore della strada essendo collocati al piano più basso, ma è davvero un difetto minimo.
- come tutti gli hotel, gli ascensori danno priorità alle chiamate dai vari piani, pertanto a volte si passa molto tempo nell’ascensore prima di poter “scendere” al piano desiderato.

In compenso, la struttura è situata in una posizione strategica nel cuore di Manhattan, a pochi metri dalla Penn Station (che collega con la metro tutta la città), vicina a Times Square e all’ Hudson Yards.
Nelle vicinanze ci sono moltissimi fast-food o ristoranti di cucina internazionale per il take away ma – per chi come noi volesse cucinare – a circa mezzo chilometro si trova il wholes food (di fronte al “the edge”), un enorme supermercato a prezzi onesti (considerati i prezzi di NY) davvero completo di tutto il necessario e comunque ricchissimo anche di pietanze già pronte.

Un soggiorno da favola per la nostra indimenticabile vacanza a NY

title: Hôtel vraiment très calme et insonorisé
text:
Hôtel vraiment génial avec du personnel vraiment agréable et toujours disponible. 
Idéalement situé en plein cœur de Manhattan, à 2 pas du Madison Square Garden. 
Le petit déjeuner est très varié avec beaucoup de choix. Le petit plus c'est que vous pouvez faire des petites boites pour partir à l'extérieur. 
Les chambres sont très propres et calmes avec de très bons matelas. 
L'hôtel est vraiment très bien insonorisé, ce qui est grand plus en plein cœur de Manhattan, vous pouvez dormir dans le calme.

title: Gran sorpresa en Manhattan
text:
Un hotel muy recomendable para ser Manhattan y muy bien situado. La insonorización es perfecta. No oyes ni un ruido en la habitación.
 
Gran acierto que tenga un pequeño servicio de desayuno (pequeño por estar acostumbrados a los hoteles de España) y una cocina para solventar aquellos días que no te venga en gusto comer la comida de allí..

Gran fallo si eres viajero de un idioma que no sea inglés, en la recepción grandes problemas de lingüística, solo encontramos una chica al cabo de dos días de estar allí para entendernos en español, pero claro no estaba siempre, había más gente con nociones de español pero  por mucho amor que les ponen no te podías comunicar.

Suerte de los trabajadores del servicio, que con mucho agrado te facilitaban la estancia, renombro a tres de ellos que se deshicieron por todo aquel viajero que les pedía algo....
No dudéis en preguntar a estas personas...
José, vivió en Barcelona, excelente trato.
Josttym, un tío fantástico que todo te lo hará sencillo.
Pedro, bellísima persona que en el desayuno te lo proporcionara todo con mucho gusto.

Conclusión: un buen hotel en Manhattan con unas soluciones muy buenas para tu estancia como es la cocina y el desayuno.

title: Soggiorno semplicemente fantastico!
text:
Sto soggiornando in questo Hotel già da tre giorni e starò qui per altri 4.
Scelta ottima per posizione e cordialità del personale, la simpatia di Luis e Pedro, che la mattina alle 6 ( mi sveglio molto presto e generalmente negli hotel a quest' ora tutto tace) ti accolgono con la simpatia e la cordialità  parlando un buon Italiano.
Ottima e varia la colazione, apprezzabilissima la possibilità di portare via un lunch box per pranzo, caffè the latte e cioccolato sempre disponibili gratis in hotel, da sorseggiare  sulla meravigliosa terrazza al 22 piano.
Un fantastico aperitivo che ti accoglie alle 1730 di pomeriggio, dopo lunga giornata in giro per NY.
