text: Estupenda localización y excelente atención por parte del personal. El desayuno está bastante bien, estilo buffet. Lo único el baño que necesitaría una reforma; la ducha funcionaba mal y las cortinas estaban muy viejas. Además  en el salón/ dormitorio el frigorífico hacía mucho ruido.

title: Homewood Suites in New York City
text: What a great hotel. Wonderful location, room was awesome and big, staff was so nice and helpful. Win, the Ambassador of this hotel, made us feel at home. I will stay here again and again. Also included is a free hot breakfast with plenty of choices. Hotel was also spotless. Thanks to Win and the entire staff at Homewood Suites.

title: Clean, welcome
text: Stay at Homewood suites for my day off, everyone are friendly and welcome, room is clean, bed is comfortable, breakfast has so many options, the rooftop is nice, you can bring your own food and drinks up, highly recommend.

title: MUY BUENO....
text:
Es la tercera vez que nos alojamos en este hotel....es muy comodo ya que tiene kitchenette ....y muy rico el desayuno....ç
Destaco la recepcion la atencion de Marko...y tambien el personal de comedor y housekipping,,,Valentin...Ana...Felix...
estuvimos con mi esposo en el mes de agosto 2022....
muy buena ubicacion cerca de todo ....

title: Clean and great location
text:
From before we arrived we received a lovely welcoming letter.  When we did arrive the front desk gentleman was friendly and attentive.  He looked at our reservation and said he noticed that we had a few special requests.  For the first time in all the hotels we’ve stayed at, he actually called house keeping to double check before letting us up to our room ! How simple but it made a world of difference in their level of caring and customer service ! Very impressive.
In the elevator, I loved that there were “smart cards” so you couldn’t go to your floor without using your room card! Love that safety feature!
Our room was exactly how we had requested which was a pleasant surprise (rarely does that happen ).  The room was listed as a “suite” but that was taking the word literally.  It was a smallish room and certainly no definition between bedroom and another room.  A love seat (sofa bed) was wedged in from the outside wall almost up against the bed.  In the opposite wall there was a refrigerator, microwave and 2 burner Stove top but not much room for anything except one small suitcase.  Not even a proper closet.  The shower was ok but water pressure was a little weak but plenty of hot water! And plenty of clean towels ! 
Everything appeared to be very clean and updated.
In the late afternoon, in the lobby, they put out a lovely spread of cheese, crackers and sweets. And plenty of seating capacity.
In the morning there were several options ie cereals, oatmeal, fresh fruit etc.  The hot entrees were  obviously prepackaged and barely warm (rubbery omelettes) and limp pieces of waffles.  There was only one flavor of muffin and a few bagels with a line to use the toaster.  The coffee was steaming hot however the hot water for tea was lukewarm at best.  
We ended up bringing our breakfast back to the room since it was obviously peak time and very very busy. 
The hotel was in the perfect location for our needs so I would definitely stay there again because of their cleanliness and customer service.  As far as size of the room goes, I think that’s a NYC given- most hotel rooms in the city tend to be small!!

title: Excellent choix
text:
Très bien situé à quelques pas de Times Square très bon rapport qualité prix
La petit cuisine intégrée et toute équipée dans la suite permet de se faire réchauffer un plat conserver des aliments etc ... Personnel disponible et très sympathique hôtel très propre 
Le rooftop permet de prendre un verre le soir avant de sortir mais il faut apporter ses boissons car pas de bar 
Un hôtel à recommander absolument

title: Great Hotel. Great Staff. Clean Rooms.
text: A great hotel all around.  I travel for a living (in a hotel 40+ weeks of the year) and this is a great find for NYC.  Love having a kitchenette and larger fridge.  The gym is awesome here also.  Easy to get to Times Square, Penn Station and midtown.

title: Perfect city based hotel
text:
Overall we had a fantastic stay.  This was our first visit to NYC but have stayed at other Hilton based hotels and this did not disappoint.

CHECK IN
We were welcomed by friendly reception staff, check in was quick and easy.  Staff took time to explain layout of hotel and hotel amenities.  

ROOM
We were on 16th floor with a room facing onto main road, as on a mid high floor we had a good rooftop view of many surrounding buildings, what I imagined would be a typical NYC view.  

Room was spacious compared to what we had seen prior to booking.  Room was clean, kitchenette was a nice addition as was good for preparing snacks later at night.  The bed and pillows were both very comfortable, we stayed for 8 days and definitely a comfortable bed for a longer stay.  Good storage space within the room and great addition of having in room safe and iron plus ironing board.  There was decent power from the shower and bathroom was a good size with good amount of space to keep toiletries etc. 

We felt the room was quiet with no noise travelling or noise fro outside, unless we opened the window.  Good AC in room and black out bling was good addition. 

BREAKFAST 
We were impressed length of time breakfast was served between 6am to 10.30am.  We were delighted breakfast was included and we had breakfast everyday of our stay.  Some times were busier mostly from 8.30am onwards but it never felt overly busy as there was a good size of seating areas between seating in breakfast area, outdoor area and reception area, we never struggled to get a seat.  There is also the option the take breakfast away or to prepare yourself a packed lunch for the day. Breakfast included range of continental including breads, pastries, cereals, fruits, bagels, yogurts.  There were also hot food options including eggs, sausage, potatoes, pan cakes and waffles. Also fruit juices, tea, coffee etc.

The hotel does not have a restaurant for evening meals but we did not miss this as we were out all day and if we did pop back it was just to get showered and changed to head back out.  There is also no bar in the hotel again this did not impact our stay at all. 

AMENITIES 
GYM
There is a hotel gym which we did not utilise but it did look a popular place and seemed to have a good range of equipment. 
LAUNDRY
It was really handy to have this facility, again we didn’t use but we had planned to use due the heatwave during our stay and required to wear shorts more days than expected but due to change in weather forecast heavy rain meant we went back to wearing jeans instead! 
LOBBY
Very modern and welcoming area, the water fall feature is relaxing and the two areas with TVs was a nice addition.  Lobby also had USB points which was handy especially final charge of phones before heading to airport. 
LOWER OUTDOOR AREA
We really enjoyed having breakfast in the outdoor area, it was very relaxing.  Area had a good range of tables and seating and additional comfy seating to relax.
ROOFTOP AREA
Good size rooftop area on level 22, as previously mentioned there is no bar in hotel but you can take own food and drinks into both outdoor area and rooftop area, which we did on 2 occasions,  Also worked out much cheaper than paying bar prices to enjoy a rooftop!  View was nice and looked onto a view of The Edge building. 
SHOP
There is a small shop off reception which sells snacks etc.  We didn’t use the shop but it is always handy to have something like this within hotel incase it is needed during stay. 
TV
Good range of channels and it was nice to have TV to watch while getting ready or to relax too once back to the room. 

HOUSEKEEPING
Our room was serviced everyday to change towels, empty bins etc.  We did request a full room service due to length of stay which you request, 

LOCATION
Location is only a few blocks one direction from Madison Square Garden and in other direction from Times Square.  Most places were within walking distance, we enjoy long walks but subway and bus stops are also only a block or 2 away, 
There are some homeless people who tend to gather at end of street but in all honesty this had no impact on our stay at all.  As we noticed moving about all areas a of NYC homelessness is a problem throughout the city and majority of hotels had people lingering either outside on within the street area.  We commute through a large city daily for work so sadly this is something we are used to seeing and maybe didn’t come as much as a shock to us as other reviewers have felt.  It seems to be something every major city is now facing. 
The hotel has 24hr security, at night can only access hotel by a room key so people cannot wander into lobby area, again lobby toilets are secured by use of room key not open to public.  

Overall we had a fantastic trip and hotel was a fantastic base for our stay with some extras like the rooftop adding to the experience of our stay.  We would recommend to friends and would stay again in the future.

title: Not ideal for vacations
text:
This is more of a business hotel, not the ideal hotel for pleasure or vacations neither family trips. 

There is no restaurant at hotel just a snack bar where you grab quick things.

Well located, very near to several metro stations and easy access.

title: Buen lugar en el centro de la ciudad
text: Vine con mi familia desde Philadelphia y nos precio muy bueno! El personal  muy muy amable ! Muy bien situado también ! Debes tener algo de cuidado pues es ny, Tienen un rooftop muy relajado donde puedes traer tu propio licor relajarte antes de ir a tu cuarto!

title: Familia Mora de Chile
text: Excelente ubicación y la atención del personal muy amable y acogedora. La gentileza de Mariana y su colega en la atención del desayuno muy destacable. Fueron mi brújula para orientarme Excelente 👌 en todo Nueva York. Les felicito.

title: Pleasant stay in the heart of NY
text:
Stayed in Homewood Suites for a couple of weeks this summer. We were there to help my daughter with her installation in NY and needed a hotel room with a kitchenette. The hotel amenities are good and they also had a nice gym that we used everyday. Be aware that the neighborhood is somehow sketchy and there are a bunch of drug addicts standing there 24/7 at the entrance of the 37th street. It wasn't unsafe but I wouldn't call it a safe area. The breakfast was decent but some of the food was tasteless or overcooked. It was better to stick to bread and bagels. 

The good surprise of the hotel was the staff. They were very reactive, pleasant, and very helpful. Especially the staff that was serving breakfast and busing the tables. Ana, Maria, and Valentin were attentive and caring to all of our demands and always with a friendly smile. Special thanks to them :).

title: Be aware
text: I recently came to new York first visit, fabulous city. We stayed at this hotel, I would not recommend if you are looking for comfort.  While the bedroom was lovely and clean, the breakfast I wouldn't recommend. We expected to be served this but instead were given plastic knife and fork to serve ourselves. A €200 fee for breakages was taken from my account upon check in, the hotel said it was a holding fee, but it was taken from my account, I found this unacceptable, I will not receive it back until 3-14 day depending on your bank. New York is a fab city lots to do, but I wouldn't recommend  to stay at this hotel ....reason been the hidden charges.

title: Decepcionado en precio/calidad + ubicación
text:
Realmente el hotel destacó la amabilidad del personal, especialmente de Mariana. 
Pero lo demás regular a lo que sale, y lo más decepcionante fue la ubicación.. la zona es muy fea"horrible" a metros del hotel hay un grupo que vende droga y ellos consumen. Luego ves gente tirada en la calle y con jeringas normalmente.. sentí en momentos inseguridad de todo esto..especialmente porque andaba con un nene chiquito.. 
No lo recomiendo sinceramente al hotel por todo esto..si pueden busquen otra zona.

title: Nice hotel but not a safe area for Families with Small children
text:
The hotel itself was pretty good, the room was a little run down and the couch had stains on it but there was lots of space and we loved the partial kitchen. The gym, hot breakfast, free wifi, business center and Wednesday reception were all wonderful. The staff is excellent as well! There is a rooftop terrace which is lovely in the evening as well to relax. 
However, I wouldn't recommend this hotel because of the area and I wouldn't return again in the future. Unfortunately there are a lot of drugs and loitering close to the hotel, one guy barked like a dog at my son in the stroller as we walked by going back to the hotel. Sadly no police presence. I would rather stay in uptown or SOHO where it's safe. We paid approx $300 per night and to be located in a poor area of the city was quite disappointing.

title: Homewood Suites midtown
text: Perfection! Above n beyond in all aspects! Staff is so friendly and professional, the rooms are a good amount of space and they all have their own kitchenette with dishes everything you need. They have an amazing complimentary breakfast that is not what you imagine... it's actually like a little restaurant downstairs buffet style and you can take your food upstairs to your room if you wish, they have little to go boxes, or u can done there. We were there five nights and each of the mornings they had a different variety of breakfast Hot and Cold.

title: Great
text: The overall service was great. The room/cleaning service was very good, everything was very clean. The breakfast dining hall served good food and the service there was excellent. We especially thank Mariana who was very attentive and helpful.

title: Awesome stay, great breakfast, nice stuff
text: We had really good time. Kareem (ambadassor) took care of us. Everything great :). The View of the room was awesome. Lovely rooftop free to use. The hotel is super close to the timesquare and other unique places.

title: Buon rapporto qualità prezzo, adatto a famiglie
text: Buon rapporto qualità prezzo, roof top a disposizione degli ospito piacevole, peccato la cucina delle camere non è utilizzabile in quanto non è possibile aprire le finestre per cui si può usare solo il microonde. Buona la colazione che consente anche lunch box, posizione centrale per visitare Manhattan, unico neo il bagno troppo piccolo per una quadrupla e la pulizia delle camere che per uno standard Hilton a mio personale parere non è adeguata.

title: Excellent choix qualité/prix
text:
Personnel serviable, déjeuner complet style buffet,
Petite terrasse intérieure pour déjeuner.
 rabais stationnement ( imprimer coupon stationnement à l’ l’ hotel)
Terrasse toit, cuisinette dans la chambre.
Bien insonorisé.
Pas loin de time square 7 min a pied et des métros.

title: Vacations New York
text:
El hotel genial y la atención y hamabilidad de VALENTIN Espectacular !!

Volveremos , hotel céntrico , higiene muy bien , el desayuno muy bien , farmacias cercas , estaciones de metro cerca , súper mercados pequeños cerca , buena ubicación !!

title: Vacaciones en Nueva York
text:
Viajamos desde España! El hotel y su ubicación han sido excelentes!!!, las habitaciones amplias y cómodas, y el desayuno variado y bueno! 

 Cabe destacar la atención de Valentín! Amable y atento! 

Gracias por todo!!!

title: Lo mejor...las personas que trabajan allí.
text:
Lo mejor....su todos Todos ,amables y rápidos.La señorita de la limpieza, impecable.No olviden pedir que les limpien la víspera la habitación.Si no lo hacen solo cambiarán toallas.Por cierto,son pequeñas para ducha y están desgastadas algunas.
Lo peor:una acera llena de droga y personas tiradas en el suelo,a todas horas.
Incluso gente pinchandose.
Yo escogería otra zona menos próxima a Times Square.
Gracias a todo el personal.

title: Lizabeth Filipe was very kind during breakfast time
text: Lizabeth Filipe was so kind while we were having breakfast and cleaning our table. The breakfast is very good and there are boxes where you may take something for lunch as well. French toasts are very tasty!

title: Really great staff
text: Good breakfast with a great service. Lizabeth Filipe was great! Staff is really helpful and nice. The hotel is super close to Times Square and the Penn Station. The hot breakfast is a great start to your day.

title: June
text:
Awesome service!   Great stay! I’ll come again! 
June was extremely helpful.  Rooms were very clean and smelled great.   I will recommend to all friends.  Best stay for the money.  Thank you to the hotel staff!

title: Three days in New York.
text: We stayed on the 19th floor. Staff were incredibly helpful at check in the during our stay. The room was clean and towels refreshed daily. Felix was housekeeping and did a great job along with his colleague. We loved the gym and terrace. The hotel has a city buzz, feels relaxed but secure and breakfast had a different menu daily. Great base to explore Manhatten.

title: Homewood suites NYC midtown Manhattan
text:
Stayed here before the Covid pandemic and came back. Great hotel. Great location and not mega expensive.
Our flight back to London was a very early one and we needed to leave at 4.45am. June and Cyndi went above and beyond

title: Service review
text:
Amazing service from Idris and Valentin they’re very kind and nice. Thanks to them our days here we’re very good, Idris find our reservation pretty soon and Valentin help us ever day

Hope to see you again guys, thanks!

title: 4 Days in midtown
text: Hotel is ideally located in midtown. Friendly staff, excellent hot breakfast. Served from around 6:30 to 10:30. wonderful room for NY City. Room is exceptionally quiet. Coffee  and tea and hot water 24/7. Large lobby area with plenty of room for eating breakfast even if crowded.

title: Excellent séjour d'une semaine
text: Hôtel idéalement situé à Manhattan, au calme (merci le triple vitrage) mais aussi à proximité de l'animation de Time Square. Chambre (1213) spacieuse et bien équipée (douche avec bon débit) et cuisine. Bon petit déjeuner tous les matins avec jus d'orange frais (les autres jus sont industriels mais restent corrects néanmoins) et bon assortiment de plats chauds (4 par jour), fruits, laitages et autres viennoiseries américaines. Possibilité de fabriquer sa box pour la journée. Ménage non effectué tous les jours mais c'est bien précisé dés l'arrivée que cela peut être fait si on en fait la demande à l'accueil, les serviettes ont elles été changées 2 fois dans les 6 jours ce qui reste suffisant. Le rooftop au 22ème étage est sympa. Seul bémol, les 3 ascenseurs, bien que rapides une fois à l'intérieur, nous font parfois attendre de longues minutes avant qu'ils soient disponibles à l'étage mais j'imagine qu'il est difficile de faire mieux. Merci aussi à Valentin, le responsable des petits déjeuners, qui a toujours été très réactif et professionnel à son poste (un employé modèle).

title: Nice hotel but will never stay here again because the street is so scary and dangerous.
text: The hotel was nice and the staff was good but as you’ll see in the other reviews the location is in a very scary area. I am from Baltimore and not much shocks me but this was pretty horrifying - I read the reviews after my room was already booked so there wasn’t much I could do. It’s on the same street as a drug treatment center and there are people doing drugs with needles shooting up in the open and the worst part was as we pulled in to the hotel to unload a man was pretty much completely naked swatting the ground furiously with a towel and we saw parts of his body that should not be seen- very very grapic- our eight and 11 year old with us were horrified and afraid to go into the hotel. The hotel parking they recommend was down the street I dropped the kids and a friend off because I did not want them walking from the garage it’s not bad. He was swatting the ground there so I had to park far away and just make a run for it… I would never stay on the street again especially with children it’s just not safe. I’ve been in New York many times and seen some crazy stuff but this was definitely the worst experience of all.

title: Oasis in the city
text: We had a wonderful 2 night stay here.  When we arrived, the lobby was a mad house, but all the staffs efficiently & patiently attended to each guest.  Room was very well maintained and spacious.  Beds & Linen were clean & very comfortable.  The Sofa Bed mattress was the most comfortable we've had.  Full size fridge & well stocked kitchen.  Roof top terrace was a great place to unwind after a busy day.  All the front desk staffs were very friendly and helpful with our questions and requests.  The hotel's location is perfect quiet & convenient.  A quick 8 min walk to Time Square & Theaters with multiple options for subway lines to get to other parts of the city.  Definitely one of our new favorite stays in NYC.

title:
מלון טוב מאד
העובדת lizbeth מאד שירותית
text:
מלון טוב מאד
חדרים נקיים
מיקום מצויין קרוב לטיים סקוור
ארוחת בוקר טובה
שרות טוב מאד במיוחד עובדת בחדר אוכל בשם lizbeth
חדר כביסה נוח.חדר כושר יפה וטוב
מרפסת על הגג גדולה עם נוף יפה ואוויר מצויין
מאד ממליץ על המלון

title: Un sitio ideal para hospedarse.
text: La higiene, la atención del personal que trabaja, a los siguientes pude conocerlos, ellos trabajan como hormigas( mucho, rápido, organizados y siempre con una sonrisa) Ana, Lisbe, Felix Valentín( al dejar la estancia lo busque para dejarle un perfume como presente pero ya había terminado el turno) Omi, Jeuri Peña y el querido Marcos que fue el encargado de despedirnos hasta llevar nuestros equipaje hasta el taxi ya de camino para el aeropuerto. La limpieza de la habitación de 10, el confort, la variedad en la alimentación, había para todos los gustos. Estuvimos alojados 8 noches.

title: Excellent motel, service and location!
text: We had a wonderful stay here for 7 nights. The rooms were very  modern and clean. The pull out couch was a twin memory foam mattress and one of the most comfortable pulls outs we’ve had. Having the large fridge and kitchen area is a huge help if staying for an extended amount of time. The breakfasts were wonderful each day and nice that they stayed open until 10:30 am. They have a light evening snack available on Wednesday evenings in the lobby. The location was great. Easy walking distance to Times Square and Broadway shows, the Empire State Building and Rockefeller Center. Subway stations located closed by. The area felt safe and key cards were required for the elevators for extra security. We visited the roof top on the 22 floor to enjoy the views, especially at night. All of the staff were very friendly but Omar at the front desk was especially helpful with giving us directions for our activities and helping us with street parking to load and unload our car. This is one of those motels where we are sad to leave since the people are so friendly and the rooms so nice. I would absolutely stay here again with a visit to NYC.

title: Muy buen Hotel
text: Estuve en este hotel 3 dias, en un habitacion para 5 personas. Somos un grupo familiar de 2 adultos, 1 adolescente y dos niñas. Super cómoda la habitación, tiene una pequeña cocina, con heladera, anafe y microondas. El desayuno era variado y abundante. La atención del personal de hotel es buena. La ubicación es excelente. A dos cuadras del metro, a 8 cuadras de Hudson Yard, 5 minutos de Times Square. Impecable. Sin dudas que volvería a alojarme en este hotel.

title: Great family place
text: Great place for our family to stay… the pull out sofa and kitchen were great.  Beds were comfortable and they had a good variety of pillows so you could get comfortable.  The hot breakfast was a solid start to the day and the kids loved the hot chocolate.  The staff was super helpful, like Lizabeth helping our family of 6 a table.  That was awesome.  Victor in the front office was also friendly and made sure we were having a good time.

title: Hotel sencillo, pero muy confortable y con excelente localización
text: Es un hotel funcional, sin grandes lujos. Las habitaciones son sencillas pero con camas muy cómodas. El gimnasio y el desayuno están bastante bien. El personal es muy amable. Y la localización es excelente, metro muy cerca y Times Square a 10 minutos andando

title: Otimo custo Benefício
text:
O hotel fica super bem localizado, tem café da manhã incluído com boa variedade e o tamanho do quarto é bem confortável para os padrões de NYC
Com certeza é uma ótima opção ! Fomos em casal, não sei como seria uma terceira pessoa no quarto, eventualmente ficaria um pouco apertado, mas para 2 é mais do que suficiente

title: Estancia correcta y agradable.
text:
El hotel está realmente céntrico, aunque en una zona demasiado concurrida. 

La habitación muy bien, si lo solicitas tienes limpieza diaria. Los miércoles dan merienda en recepción y puedes llevar cajas del desayuno con comida fuera del hotel.

Ante todo, destacar la amabilidad del personal, la mayoría hablan hispano. En especial, queremos agradecer el servicio de Valentín: teníamos un sofá cama un poco incómodo y nos lo cambió por una cama sandwich bastante mejor; todas las mañanas nos preguntaba sonriente que tal la estancia. Muy atento en todo momento.
Con los demás del servicio, como Félix, coincidimos menos, pero todos un encanto.

title: Ótima relação custo bene benefício
text:
O hotel é muito bom. Gostei da limpeza, da localização e do café da manhã (super completo com frutas, iogurte, granola, muffin, pão, ovos, bacon). Único problema é o elevador sempre com fila. 
O quarto era muito espaçoso e com uma mini cozinha completa incluindo pratos, copos e talheres.

title: Muy buena atención recomendado
text: Buen hotel, muy limpio con lo necesario. Muy buena atención sobretodo en el desayuno gracias a los supervisors Felix y Lizbeth. Además los miércoles se da una merienda de bienvenida muy buena. Café y tés 24/7 en la recepción

title: Agradable estancia
text:
Regresando a Nueva York luego de 5 años, excelente ubicación  ,desayuno bueno, internet libre,atención adecuada a la realidad pandemica
Única observación el sofá cama ya muy envejecido
Muy especial atención de Felix

title: Posizione strategica
text: Camera spaziosa e confortevole, eccetto il divano letto tipo brandina. Letto matrimoniale molto comodo, bagno spazioso e pulizia giornaliera ottima. Comodo l'angolo cottura. Staff molto gentile e disponibile per qualsiasi necessità. Posizione ottima per visitare Manhattan.

title: Comfortable stay with howling fridge and slamming doors
text:
Stayed here the other week for a week-long stay and it was a decent experience. Booked direct and my studio was available slightly before the posted check-in time.

Arrived earlier in the afternoon, did a pre-check-in, and dropped off my luggage with the front desk. There was a security in the lobby... Elevators require a keycard to go up to the Suites.

During the check-in process, there was no acknowledgement of status nor my 2 bottles of water... 

The Suite itself was spacious by NYC standards at 300+ sq feet. The bathroom was functional, although it could have used some deep cleaning at the bottom of the shower stall along with the baseboards... Water pressure was good. A handheld shower would have been good too.

The mattress was on the softer side and was the lower end Bonnell spring where the entire mattress moves when one side of the mattress has motion. The sheets were comfortable though. The light comforter was sandwiched in between two flat sheets, which was interesting...

The filter in the HVAC could be replaced as it was full of caked on dust... The A/C worked well though.

The kitchen and closet doors needed some TLC as both the hinges and handles were pretty loose...

As others had mentioned, the Suite was pretty well insulated from the outside street noise. However, the fridge was pretty noisy at night, along with the front door slamming from the other suites on my floor...bummer.

Housekeeping was by request and they did a good job taking out the trash, replacing towels, and refilling toiletries.

The kitchenette was fully stock with crockery although it was odd that there was only one pack of dishwashing detergent. There was manual dish washing liquid but no sponge to manually do dishes?!?

There was a cart that was placed on my floor every morning with additional cups and coffee which was interesting. The cart disappeared by the afternoon daily.

There is a coin laundry in the basement along with an internet cafe and gym as well.

Breakfast was complimentary and changed daily with both hot and cold items. There were poly gloves available to wear when touching the communal utensils. Staff wore uniforms, name tags, and some even wore gloves.

WiFi worked well and needed reauthorization every day or so. TV had numerous Business channels which was helpful to keep up with the markets.

title: NEVER stay here.
text:
There is just one story I will share about this hotel.

Shortly after arriving, I took out a small plastic bag with some regular bits I take with me when I travel either personally or on business. It contained an eclectic mix of items including tweezers, clippers, a waterproof phone case, a battery charger pack, some phone cables and a few other bits. I left it hanging from a door handle because the room was quite cluttered and I wanted to make sure it stayed readily in sight.

The cleaner took the bag, and threw it away.

It was nowhere near the garbage bin. It was not on the floor. It did not contain rubbish.

I spoke to the hotel staff about this issue three times and their response was absolutely abysmal. There was no apology. There was no effort to replace or compensate me for the items. One young man working on the front desk essentially told me I was lying. The hotel's general manager, Jonathan Lomitola, was apparently told but made no effort to contact me.

I have travelled a fair bit, and no hotel staff member has ever stolen my property before. But - more importantly - I have never seen such a shockingly awful response from a hotel in terms of customer service. 

Stay somewhere else. There are plenty of other options where hotel staff will not steal and then destroy your property.

title: Excellent Hotel
text: Wonderful staff, accommodations, breakfast.  Large rooms, excellent customer service, Giovanni front desk, Miguel B. supervisor, dining staff so helpful and hard working.  AT, manager, very professional also. Central hotel walking distance to everything! Will be back!!

title: A éviter !!!!!
text: Comment comprendre les avis des autres? Ai-je été dans un autre hôtel? Le petit déjeuner est le top de l industriel ( nous avons dû aller chez essen prendre notre dejeuner ) !!! La chambre vue sur mur!! Le ménage oui il faut le demander mais qd on dépose des serviettes sur de la  poussières, le minimum est de les faire? Le quartier entre les drogués qui se piquent devant vous donc seringue au sol  et les fous qui vous suivent !! Merci la sécurité et après les gens mettent 5 étoiles !!!

title: Overall great hotel, uncomfortable street.
text: Our overall stay was very good. Customer Service was great. Everyone we encountered was extremely nice. The A/C is our room didn’t seem to work at all times. Our room was hot and humid in the evenings, but the hallways and lobby were always nice and cool.  Rooms were on the bigger size for NYC. The elevators could be a little slow in mornings, but I think that’s from everyone leaving around the same time.  They were never a problem in the afternoon/evenings.  The location is great for seeing the sites, but know that there is a lot of drug users on the street surrounding all the nice hotels.  Not directly on property but you can’t walk down the sidewalk any which way without them laying or sitting in the street. Which can make you a bit uncomfortable walking with your kids.   There is a housing works-Positive Health Project location right across the street, which I think attributes to the drug users along both sides of the street, since they offer a range of services to drug users.   That is the main reason I dropped the rating down to a 4, although I know the hotel has no control over this, I wish the city could get this under control especially on streets with so many hotels and tourists.

title: Great hotel, amazing location, sketchy street
text: Everything about this hotel was wonderful - except the actual street it was on. I'm sorry to say this, as otherwise the accommodations were fantastic & so convenient to everywhere we wanted to be. I was with my teen daughter & she was shocked by the open drug use on the street. Each day, we crossed to the other side of the street (thru traffic, not at a crosswalk) to avoid certain areas of activity on our side of the street. I know there's nothing the hotel can do - & there are 2 other nice hotels on this same block. It's just really unfortunate.

title: Service
text: Breakfast each morning was great! My daughter has celiac disease, so she has some specific dietary restrictions. Lizbeth (working in the breakfast area) was very helpful with what would and wouldn’t be safe for my daughter to eat. She even offered to get her some special bread from the kitchen! Very thankful for employees like Lizbeth who go out of their way to ensure my daughter could eat safely.

title: Very nice stay
text:
We have spent five incredible days at the hotel! The rooms are very clean and the best thing during our stay was the indredible service of the people. Always trying to help the guests. Special thanks to Valentin & Ana from the kitchen all the mornings we felt very welcomed during the breakfast time!
We will come back again!

title: EXPERIENCIA AGRADÁVEL
text:
Gosto muito deste Hotel. É a minha terceira vez que me hospedo nele.
Atendeu plenamente as minhas expectativas e necessidades.
Possui uma mini cozinha, muito útil para fazer refeições rápidas.
Quanto a limpeza, você tem que solicitar que a façam todos os dias, senão somente trocam as toalhas, arrumam a cama, fazem a reposição do kit de banho e esvaziam as lixeiras. 
O café da manhã é estilo americano, Possui pães, ovos, granola, iogurte, frutas (melão, banana, maça e laranja) e cupcakes. Precisa chegar cedo.
Eu como sou alérgica, solicitei pão sem glúten e me atenderam prontamente.
Alias, gostaríamos de agradecer a Ana Rosário e o Pedro que foram muito atenciosos e prestativos.
Na recepção,  a Cindy e o Henry foram muitos atenciosos também.
Hotel com boa localização, na 37st próximo a Times Square e aos Teatros da Broadway.

title: Great weekend in New York City
text: We travelled to New York City for a musical and ballet. Great weekend and this was a great hotel for the stay. I like the Homewood Suites brand by Hilton, so typically looks for one where I travel. This was a great location and an excellent hotel!! Great breakfast!!

title: Nice and sweet
text: The service is great, everyone is super nice, it’s a great location when it’s a hot or rainy day and you need to  go inside. They are right next to an easy market. They have all the channels. The beds are the best and the cleaning people do a great job

title: Nice Hotel
text: We chose this hotel, because we needed a room for 5 people. I would have given 5 stars, but the location is a bit sketchy  at night. HOWEVER, it is near Times Square, so there was a lot "street life", which is to be expected. Rooms were nice, but small, like all NYC rooms. The free breakfast was fabulous, and the staff were very friendly.

title: Best service and hotel ever
text: Lizbeth fue súper atenta en el buffet. Ella y sus compañeros me brindaron un servicio excepcional. Quede encantada y la limpieza en la habitación estuvo excelente. Me encanto todo pero lo más que me encanto fue el desayuno buffet!

title: Excelente, super recomendable
text:
Realmente tuvimos una estadía muy agradable. El personal es todo, super amables y serviciales tanto del front desk como los que estaban en el desayuno. El desayuno es completísimo. La habitaciones impecables. Es hermosa la vista del roof top y muy lindo para tomar algo ahí. 
Lo único que no me encanta es la ubicación, si bien está cerca de todo, desde el hotel a la avenida 8 no es muy lindo el ambiente

title: Vacances avec 2 ados séjour de 5 jours
text:
Après avoir consulté nombreux avis, le choix de l'hôtel "Homewood by Hilton" s'est imposé. Je n'ai pas du tout regretté mon choix. Nous étions 3, chambre spacieuse, grande salle de bain, équipée avec sèche cheveux, belle douche, un coin cuisine tout équipée, très bien insonorisée, même si la climatisation était un peu bruyante.
Idéalement situé,3' de Penn Station, et proche des principaux sites de visites. Petit déjeuner varié inclus dans le prix, possibilité d'emporter. Service de conciergerie avec dépose bagage avant le check in (16h) et check out tardif (12h). Bref, propre, calme, bien situé, moderne. Manque peut-être des prises USB dans la chambre, mais présentes dans le hall. 
Je recommande vivement cet hôtel. Je n'ai pas pris de photos, je ne pensais pas donner un avis.

title: Customer Service Review
text:
I needed some assistance in the dinning area and was helped by the employee named Lizbeth.

I would like to eagerly report she was very helpful and displayed a great attitude.

This is one of the hallmark traits in dealing with people traveling from all over the world.

title: Great hotel, super unsafe area
text:
This hotel was very nice and the staff was very nice. 
Unfortunately, I had to give it a 2 because of the location. It is directly across the street from 

 Ginny Shubert Center for Harm Reduction.(which does not show up on google maps probably because no one wants you to know) 

It is extremely unsafe by the hotel. There are tons of drug users and homeless all over the street and the surrounding blocks. I was traveling with my children and it was very sad they had to see all of that. 
A person asked for a dollar and when we said no screamed on my husbands face. A person also got into the hotel and the front desk had to kick them out. The person then starts yelling fowl language at the worker. Really great for your kids to watch! Extremely unsafe here.

title: Great hotel!
text: This hotel is a wonderful gem in the center of Manhattan. The hotel is clean, and the staff are very friendly and welcoming. All the staff were eager to help and to even offer suggestions. The free breakfast was plentiful, with many options. We took advantage of the backyard and of the rooftop lounge space. The area outside the hotel, however, is not safe and leaves a lot to be desired

title: Average Hotel
text:
I thought the hotel had great upgrades, and it was in a perfect location. But we arrived at the hotel after 4pm and our rooms were not ready. We waited over an hour in a hot lobby. Our rooms were great and we loved the rooftop. 

Cons: The breakfast was not good. There were lots of choices but when you say it will be hot breakfast, it actually needs to be hot. Parking, its awful! On your website it says parking is available, very misleading. Its $45 a day, it's not close, and you cannot come and go as you please.

Lizbeth was awesome, could be the sweetest young lady I have met. The ladies who cleaned the rooms were so awesome and very respectful.

I understand that the people at the front desk are extremely busy, but you guys are the 1st ones we see when we come in and I did not feel the love. June was not kind. He was there to do a job and could care less if we liked it or not. Maybe showing a little compassion, and kindness.

title: Great hotel
text:
Fantastic stay at this hotel. Ideal location for exploring the city. Rooms are small but adequate- they have everything you need, so useful to have a kitchen. Beds were comfortable. 
The breakfast is fantastic and well organised. The staff are amazing- definitely an asset to this hotel. 
I will definitely return.

title: Ideal Location For Spending Your Precious Time!
text:
The hotel is great not only for its location but for service, staff, food, and many options!
The workout facility is perfect for gym lovers and rooms have a fridge, microwave, and coffee maker. The most lovely thing I liked was the rooftop that gave me immense pleasure and this place is best for meeting new people.

title: Perfekt lokation
text: Godt hotel, venligt personale, dejlige værelser, god morgenmad, lækker tagterrasse. sovesofaen var ikke så behagelig. (Vi var der i 10 dage)God placering, der var ikke langt til metro og shopping. WiFi fungerede godt. Personale var meget imødekommende. God stemning på hotellet.

title: Hidden gem
text: From the outside you wouldn't realize the brand new cool vibe this hotel has. The staff was excellent. They have a roof deck that is a great spot for  relaxing. My room had a full size fridge, microwave, dishwasher, dishes, and everything looked brand new. The elevators have the security of having to tap your room key. I didn't utilize the workout room but it looked nice. The coffee for the complimentary breakfast was ok but the breakfast was good with nice choices. I would definitely come back.

title: BUENA ESTADIA
text: Estuvimos varios días hospedados, la habitación si bien tiene todo lo que uno necesita, no tiene placar suficiente, solo uno muy pequeño que dentro tiene plancha y tabla de planchar, lo que lo hace aun mas pequeño. Cama y almohadas muy cómodas. El baño bien equipado y con renovación de toallas todos los días. La limpieza hay que pedirla con un dia de antelación.  El desayuno es correcto. Muy destacable la atención de Valentin y Miguel, atentos, cordiales y dispuestos siempre a cualquier necesidad que tuviéramos, GRACIAS!

title: Amazing hotel & amazing staff + clean rooms and ambiance
text:
The hotel is amazing , location was perfect near to everything 

Hotel staff “ Amanda , Lizbeth and Marco where specially so friendly warm and very much helpful “ 
You are always greeted with a smile & love highly recommended  and I will come again

title: Esperava mais
text:
Pelo valor da diária eu esperava mais do hotel.
Quarto limpo , chuveiro e cama bons.
Internet caia com frequência e café da manhã bem basico. A cada 3 dias mais ou.menos o cardápio se repetia.

A limpeza do quarto  é apenas troca de toalha e retirada de lixo. Limpeza mais ampla deve ser solocitada.

As portas são muito pesadaa e acabam fazem muito barulho qndo fecham..chegando a tremer o drywall.

A localização é ótima.

title: Excelente trato por parte del personal de servicio
text: Mi más sincero agradecimiento a Valentín y a Mariana,por la información y la ayuda por parte de ellos dos,son dos excelentes personas y muy trabajadoras,un cordial saludo y gracias de nuevo,y espero volver a veros pronto.

title: Review
text:
Lizbeth is extremely diligent keeping up w/ the demands of patrons visiting the kitchen.  Employees like her make for an enjoying stay!

The centralized location beneath those not familiar with New York City.  The rooms are very accommodating and easily fit a large family.  

The front desk staff are genuinely helpful, cheerful and go out of their way to make you feel at home.

title: Great value for your money!
text: The hotel staff and the free breakfast are the upsides of the hotel. Not to mention the rooftop with a nice view of the city. We stayed in a room for five people - one of us in a wheelchair -, and we loved the size of the room. We will be back

title: Staff very helpful
text:
stayed with my family at the Homewood Suites NYC Manhattan and overall the hotel is good but has maintenance issues ( faulty AC).

The staff though is what makes this place a good one.
I'd like to recognize the two maintenance guys that came to our room to fix the issues. Don't know their names but they were great.

Also Valentín is also an angel. Very polite and hard working young man. He answered all my questions and he's bilingual!

title: Marvelous staff
text:
I would like to thank Valentín for being so helpful with the mess I did with the coffee at the breakfast. He is a really nice and polite person.
And I would also want to thank Miguel on the front desk because he lend me his personal umbrella in a rainy day and save our walk. 
Thank you.

title: Nice hotel and convenient to subways and walking to many places
text: We enjoyed staying relatively close to Penn Station. It is a pretty good neighborhood, convenient to walking to many nearby places. On our last day we walked to the Hell's Kitchen area and found it very modern and interesting. Our room was pretty good for four people and all our stuff. We did use the sofabed and it stuck out in our walkway a bit too far. We bought drinks in the hotel convenient store a couple of times. That was fine. What was not good was the ice cream we decided to buy once. The ice cream cones were very old and tasted terrible. I don't recommend anyone buying the frozen items there. I think the hotel should not even stock frozen items if they are going to let them sit and get that old and tasteless.

title: Great location and very nice room
text: Room was quite large and had a nice kitchenette. Very friendly staff. Staff was a 10 out of 10. Great location: 37th street between 8th and 9th avenue. Lobby had coffee available, its seemed, all throughout the day. Water pressure in shower wasn't the strongest but that may be just NYC thing. Hotel may want to do, especially during the summer months, keep a  cold water cistern available in the lobby. They would have this out for breakfast but then remove it after breakfast. It would of been nice it they kept this next to the coffee through out the day.

title: Una estancia genial para conocer Manhattan.
text:
Pasé una semana con mi familia a principios de Junio de 2022. Dos adultos y un niño. El alojamiento excelente, cómodo, limpio y amplio para los tres. Las habitaciones con cocina te dan mucha libertad a la hora de organizar las comidas y cenas, y ahorrar un poco de dinero. Aunque encontrarás lo justo (una vitrocerámica, microondas, tostadora, cafetera, nevera y lavavajillas), es más que suficiente para cenas rápidas.
La localización es estupenda, y te permite conocer andando muchos puntos de interés turístico de Manhattan. Y la proximidad al Metro te permite cualquier tipo de desplazamiento. 
Las habitaciones son amplias y muy silenciosas a pesar de su situación tan céntrica, con aseo muy cómodo con ducha, aire acondicionado y ventilador.
El personal es muy atento (muchas gracias Valentín y a todo el staff por vuestra amabilidad).
El desayuno está bastante bien (mi hijo lo disfrutó muchísimo con las tortitas y el sirope), y tienes café gratis en cualquier momento...
No hay que obviar que está situado en unas calles muy céntricas, y los contrastes son muy grandes, pero en ningún momento tuvimos sensación de inseguridad.
En definitiva, muy recomendable.

title: Great location, good room, friendly staff
text:
Family of 5 with 3 teenagers for five nights. Got a great price and the room is a decent size by Manhattan standards, given that we were not spending much time there, though might not be considered big by some! 

Excellent central location, a few blocks from the madness of Times Square and walking distance from the High Line, Penn Station, Madison Square Garden and several Subway lines. There were a few 'interesting' characters on the street the hotel was in, but not in a threatening way. 

Breakfast was included and was fine, saved going out looking each day, hot food selection was basic, but rest of the selection was good.

2 Bros Pizza takeaway one block is cheap and tasty if looking for a quick bite on the hoof, you can also bring food back to the outdoor area at the back and there's a small rooftop garden, so you don't ever need to eat in the room. 

Room was quiet and cool, we were on 6th floor looking over the street and never heard a sound from street or from other rooms.

All staff we met were friendly and helpful, a plus! 

Recommended for a group stay in NYC.

title: Welcoming and Kind
text: Lizabeth & Felix were super caring and attentive and ive never felt so welcomed at another hotel before, Thank you so much! Food was warm and everything was clean, They were prepared and polite. We will be back!

title: I recommend this Hotel to anyone visiting  New York City
text:
Everyone at this hotel was great. The rooms were tidy, clean. Breakfast was to
my liking. There is free wifi which was very convenient because I was able to keep in touch with my family. I definitely recommend this Hotel to anyone.

title: An amazing staying with a special staff
text:
I spent an amazing time at Homewood Suites Hilton for my 30th birthday holiday. All staff was friendly, in particular I want to address a special thanks to Lenny Terrero, the Housekeeping Manager, who helped me to sent a package I forgot from the hotel to Italy.
I received today the package with everything inside, and I was so happy since the staff I forgot has an important sentimental value.
Lenny has been personally in touch with me via mobile phone for three days. She helped me in the shipping with patient and taking care, showing a problem solving and a deep professional attitude.
I really appreciate my stay at Homewood, feeling like at home.
I'll be happy to come back here for next times in NYC.
Thank you
Micol

title: Great Stay, Great Hotel, Great Location!
text: I was in the city for a few days for meeting. the location of this hotel allowed me to easily get around the city to my meetings and then walk to restaurants and entertainment in the evenings. The staff was really friendly, professional and had great recommendations for things to do in Midtown.  I highly recommend the the hotel for a business or leisure stay.

title: Excelente hotel para venir con familia
text: El desayuno extraordinario, la habitacion de primera super limpio cama y almuada comodisimas y el personal fabuloso en todo momento en especial valentin que estuvo atento en todo momento. Volvería sin duda a este hotel

title: Super Hotel
text:
Für einen Aufenthalt in NYC super Hotel. 
Zentral gelegen, Sehr Sauber! Super Freundliches Personal und super Frühstück!!! Für US heisst das was - ein sehr gutes US Frühstück. 
Parken geht extra aber ist nur 100 yards weiter. 
Discount gab es auf die Parkplatz gebühr. 
Trotzdem ist parken nicht billig
 (50,00$ ohne Rabatt)
Alles in allem super Preis Leistungsverhältnis.

title: Ubicación y personal excelente !!!
text: La ubicación es excelente podes ir caminando a todos lados.  El personal súper amable y además la mayoría habla español.  El desayuno súper variado y rico, y lo podes llevar a la habitación. Las habitaciones equipadas con todo heladera, cocina podes comer allí! Además cafe, te y chocolatada todo el día!

title: NY
text: Great service. Spanish talking crew a plus. TV service in rooms must be updated. Good breakfast menu. The outside dining very interesting. Must add crew for room service so checkins and checkouts get faster.

title: Hermosa y cálida experiencia
text:
Estuvimos 11 días con mis hijas, el punto donde está ubicado el hotel es muy bueno, quizás la cuadra no es muy linda pero sólo la usamos de paso para ir y venir. La habitación muy bonita, al tener cocina, heladera con freezer, microondas y lavavajillas es plus adicional. Las instalaciones del hotel son muy cómodas y nos sentimos muy a gusto.La mayoría del personal es muy amable y servicial, la limpieza de las habitaciones la realizan cuando uno lo solicita, lo que  me pareció re bien, asi uno diagrama esto, las toallas las cambiaban todos los días. El desayuno es super variado, y contundente. 
Párrafo aparte merece la atención de Valentín, Ana y Mariana, agradezco mucho su calidez y predisposición para que no nos faltara nada. Valentín se ocupó personalmente de solucionar un  tema con el  sofa cama de nuestra habitación y estuvo pendiente al otro día para conocer si habíamos dormido bien. Tanto él como las chicas muy agradables y predispuestos, definitivamente son personas que trabajan muy a gusto y se nota. También quiero agradecer la hospitalidad de Marcos, quien desde el primer día se acercó y nos recibió con mucha calidez.

title: Hotel does not care
text:
Had a terrible experience. Despite being a Hilton Honors Rewards member, the experience was as if I was being treated as a "no-one"= probably the behavior and attitude of a "big city"......( read - rudeness, attitude of {do not care")...

1. Booked a car to drop us at JFK....the car did not show up. The front desk did not care. Finally had  to book a Lyft to get to airport. 
2. Room key card magnetization is horrible. Every other day, you have to go to front desk to  ask them to re-authorize the room key. 
3. The lock went bad in the room. Were locked out at 9 pm in the night till the maintenance department took one hour to manually  force open the room and reinstall a new set of locks. 
4. Requested "full service" every day since we were 4 person in a suite and needed fresh towels and clean room/ toilet  everyday. Had to call 3 out of 5 days before they finally realized that we really needed "full service". 

Good Bye Hilton and welcome Marriott!!! This is the last time we try Hilton ever again as  a first choice of  stay.

title: New York Trip
text: I just had to Mention our stay was greaT at this hotel. Felix and Mariano were outstanding when it came to serving us when we had our breakfast, very friendly.  Bfast was not the typical continental bfast. The hotel is very very convenient!! Great location. I would highly recommend it!!

title: Volveríamos !
text: Si bien la cuadra no es súper linda, el hotel es cómodo, habitaciones con cocina, heladera con freezer, microondas y lavavajillas. Un lujo para estancia larga (10 dias). Esto junto al desayuno del hotel, laundry y rooftop lo hacen altamente recomendable.

title: Overall Great Hotel and Breakfast
text:
I booked here for the final leg of my Northeast swing primarily because of the free breakfast and the fact that the price was competitive with other hotels in the area.

Being that it is in Manhattan, it's kind of hard for a hotel to really be poorly located, although there was a complication that was no fault of the hotel's and that was that for Memorial Day weekend, the E train was rerouted and didn't run through Penn Station, which made it harder to go north towards the museums.

Service throughout was extremely welcoming and accommodating and everyone I encountered in the hotel staff did as well as I could have expected.

The room itself was quite small: I know it's Midtown Manhattan but it is an all suite hotel and I thought it was odd that they placed us into a studio when we had three people. The room was quite clean and aside from some wear on the wallpaper there wasn't any real issues and the blackout curtain actually covered the entirety of the window (which was very pivotal given that at the previous hotel I had stayed at this was most certainly not the case). We were also given free water and chips. The only major problem with the room was that the sink for the kitchenette was very narrow, so water kept splashing onto the counter.

The bathroom was, similar to the room, fairly small and was clean aside from some slight mould growth in the caulking near the shower door. The shower also actually had good pressure, which was something that had been lacking for most of my trip. The faucet for the sink was positioned weirdly, so the water flow had to be controlled in order to prevent it from spraying onto the countertops and there was also limited space in the vanity area to store toiletries.

Breakfast in the morning was among the best I've had at any establishment and the highlight of the hotel. There were four hot options which rotated on a daily basis so there was always something different on consecutive days. The usual breads and cereals were available as well as four different types of juices, yogurt, and hard boiled eggs. Another nice addition was the 24 hour free hot chocolate, coffee, and tea in the lobby.

While the room didn't quite live up to my expectation mostly due to the size, the cleanliness was actually a fair bit better than the other hotels I had stayed at during my trip and while the hotel wasn't extremely cheap relative to other hotels, the immense breakfast selection holds a lot of value and with very good housekeeping standards, it outweighs the room not quite matching up to a Homewood Suites standard.

title: Good family experience
text:
I love this hotel! Very clean, good rooms and a good services, especially Valentin who helped with the food of my baby.  
Recomendado para quedarse con familia de 5 personas. Todo cerca, buen servicio!!

title: Lots of great things about this hotel but no wifi
text:
There are many things about this hotel I liked, especially the clean air rooms without carpeting, the way every hotel should be. The wifi was non-existent, even the upgraded version. I kept getting the message that it wasn’t configured securely and that my phone would not accept the connection. That should be easily fixed. The staff (who are not responsible) were well aware of the problem

Positives:  

Wonderful staff. Especially appreciated the kindness and attention to detail Mariana showed me in the mornings, remembering and bringing me gluten free toast

Clean air room

Full breakfast with lots of choices

Coffee, tea, etc available 24 hours

Location was convenient 

Cons:
Expensive compared to other chains
No wifi

If they can fix the wifi I would definitely stay again.

title: Girls trip
text: Breakfast was outstanding. Lizbeth did a phenomenal job restocking items and cleaning tables during the busy Memorial Day weekend. I was highly impressed. Hotel was fantastic. Room was clean and huge for NYC. Don’t hesitate to book your next stay here. Thank you Lizbeth!

title: Vacaciones disfrutadas
text:
Hemos estado una semana y todo ha ido muy bien, limpieza en la habitación, cambio de toallas diario, no veo bien que se tenga que solicitar que te hagan la cama, pero pasa en todos los hoteles ya. Con referencia al desayuno, completo y variado, yogures, fruta, distintos productos salados, etc, muy amplia la zona para desayunar por lo que no tienes que esperar colas. He utilizado el gimnasio, que está muy completo, cuenta con toallas, toallitas húmedas para limpiar las máquinas y depósito de agua, los ascensores son muy rápidos.  Mi problema es el idioma y siempre hay en recepción alguien que habla castellano. El personal muy agradable y servicial,  siempre dispuestos a ayudarte. En el tema de servicio de habitaciones y servicio de desayunonos han atendido muy bien Valentín, Ana y Mariano.
El hotel muy bien ubicado
En términos generales muy contentos

title: Comodisima
text: Todo magnífico, Félix y Liberta atienden muy bien el desayuno y son muy agradables. El hotel es muy cómodo, el desayuno rico, también por la tarde hay un piscolabis en la entrada. Todo el personal muy amable. Los ascensores muy rápidos. Si pongo un pero es que no me gusta que tengas que solicitar que te limpien la habitación, tendrían que hacerlo como antes de la pandemia, todos los días sin solicitarlo. Es la segunda vez que vengo y repetiré. Gracias a todos el equipo.

title: Buffet, maintenance, front desk, housekeeping
text:
Buffet - We had a very pleasant experienced in their buffet area. Felix and all his colleagues was very helpfull, they assist you in getting your table, they take your food when its finished. You will not see them having an attitude while they clean or refill the foods. By far the most friendly staff in the kitchen, some might not smile but you feel you are special.

Maintenance - he cleaned our toilet and the guy was nice.

Front desk - everytime we arrived in the late night, they always greet us and very courteus. you feel very special.

Housekeeping - they clean our room as per request and they done a good job. I left a tip but they did not accept it.

title: Still a wonderful experience
text: I have been staying at this property since coming to the city on a pretty regular basis, with the only exception of a small world virus that changed life and travel for so many. The location remains perfect for our weekends. We can walk to MSG and many places to eat that we have come to love. The rooms are clean and inviting and offer an oasis to a busy and fun getaway. Now, let me tell you the true jewel of this property, its the employees.  We have always had great service and smiling faces at this property. Although he is no longer there Jackson in Food services was amazing. This past encounter was Marcos, AC, and June. Marcos was attentive, professional and present in the moment. I feel as though I am taken care and the service is always great. This alone is what makes me want to return to this location whenever I am in the city. I tell anyone looking for a place for a weekend or week, that they will not be disappointed at this location. Thank you to all who greet me at the desk and make sure my stay is comfortable.

title: valentine mariana
text: Valentine was very helpfyll and friendly.  He went out of his way to make sure guests were having a great visit. He personally came and removed my  breakfast items after I was done. I ala saw him interacting with other guests and making sure they were all taken care of

title: Girls Trip Takeover 2022
text: Lizbeth and Marco were the best. Lizabeth kept the food stocked and Marco came and spoke to us. The rooms were nice. The only thing was our room wasn't ready on time,  but the service made up for that.

title: Awesome hotel
text: This hotel is awesome. Great location, great clean room and awesome staff.  All the staff was friendly and helpful with recommendations and directions. Always greeted us everyday and everywhere we were.  We really appreciate the daily breakfast. Saved us time and money and it was awesome. Something new everyday. The staff at the breakfast Buffett was the best I’ve experienced.  Felix, Lizbeth and Mariana are on it.  They ensure the stations are clean, all food is constantly stocked and they work hard. They also seem like they enjoy their job and you don’t see that too often in customer service anymore. They really go above and beyond.  I enjoyed seeing them every morning. Keep up the good work

title: Great Hotel. Highly  recommend!!
text: I have stayed here many times . Great hotel. Great location.The hotel staff are professional, friendly and helpful. Highly recommend ! Rooms have everything you need. Great breakfast. Mariana  and the staff  were also super wonderful! And the hotel is close to subway. A very nice hotel!

title: Melhor custo benefício
text: Excelente custo benefício.  O quarto que ficamos é grande, com 2 camas de casal. Há uma mini cozinha super bem equipada com utensíliose máquina de lava-louças. Café da manhã variado com embalagens para viagem e funcionários atenciosos. Felix Lizbeth nos atendeu bem todos os dias. No lobby também  há chocolate quente  e café disponíveis dia e noite.  O hotel ainda tem máquina de lavar roupas no subsolo. Gostei e recomendo.

title: Great place for extended stay
text: Family of three staying one week. We enjoyed our stay here for many reasons. First, the staff is very friendly and helpful especially Felix and June. Second, the room was well appointed and clean although the bed was a little uncomfortable after three nights.  Third, breakfast selection was the average American breakfast and we would have like to have seen a little European style fare such as Muesli, croissants, fresh tomatoes and stewed prunes. Location was excellent

title: Disappointing so far
text:
Just  checked in. Disappointing so far compared to the other Homewood suites in we just checked out of.
Room is small but we were expecting that. 
BUT
- major stains in the sofa. We are checking to see if they can replace. 
- phone in the room doesn’t work. We all have cell phones, but it convenient to have an easy way to contact the hotel directly. 
- pillows are too soft and uncomfortable. We asked and they don’t have other options. 

We will update the review after our stay, but so far there’s room for improvement and lots of other places to stay in the area.

title: Felicitaciones
text:
Excelente  desayuno abundante y variados todos los días 
excelente atención  Feliz y Lizbeth 
Lo recomiendo la ubicación todo  a pocos metros 
Café a disposición las 24 horas 
Internet con todas las habitaciones

title: Absolute gem in the heart of the city!
text: Booked this property for the location and it was perfect! Walking distance to Times Square and subway. Tons of restaurants in the area - no shortage of places to eat at all hours of the day.  Room was spacious with fridge, stove, microwave. Great for keeping beverages cold and storing leftovers! Nice breakfast offerings - all very Covid friendly.  Take out containers, disposable cutlery and plates. Complimentary coffee, tea and hot chocolate available in the lobby 'round the clock. But the best part of the trip was the staff. EXTREMELY accommodating, welcoming, helpful, friendly. Always willing to help, smiling and personable.  Rooms were clean upon arrival - full Housekeeping service is available upon request, but light touch service of fresh towels, amenities and trash removal is provided.  Elevators were quick. Booked an UBER to and from La Guardia and it was easy for driver to stop in front and drop us off.  Would highly recommend this property. You won't be disappointed!

title: Visitor at home wood suites
text: The kitchen staff, were great. They made sure all the food was fresh and available, as well as cleaned up serviced the customers pleasantly. I was very satisfied. Especially with Felix. I’m addition the entire hotel staff were very nice and accommodating

title: Best property in this area
text: This hotel. in midtown. room spacious with a working kitchen with microwave and  cooker. can walk to penn metro station even street bagel and pizza be easily found on streets nearby. can walk to seven Eleven

title: Don't look any further...
text: This place is brilliant.  Clean and comfortable room.  Very handy location for bus or rail. (ok, midtown isn't the nicest of areas but that's not Homewood's fault),  Staff outstanding - every single one of them. I will not be looking elsewhere  for accommodation on future visits.

title: Familly trip
text:
Petit déjeuner copieux Personnel très sympa notamment Lizbeth qui nous a gentiment coupé le reste de notre gâteau d'anniversaire. 
Hôtel très bien placé chambres spacieuses et personnel très agréable juste penser à demander le ménage à l'accueil car sinon seules les serviettes sont remplacées

title: Awesome!
text:
I loved staying here! The room is quiet and comfortable and clean. The staff has been exceptionally nice and welcoming. Liz Beth and Ana made breakfast way more than we could have expected. Everything was delicious!
And also, very efficient.....the tables were cleaned promptly and food was replenished as fast as it was eaten. Thank you for an incredible stay!

title: Outstanding in every way.
text: Start to finish I was blown away by the staff. Everyone who worked there went out of their way to say hello, ask if I needed anything, how my trip was going, etc... I felt like a dang celebrity. The hotel was gorgeous and clean, the room was plush and immaculate. I really can't overstate what a wonderful stay I had, and I can't recommended the Homewood Suites enough.

title: Fantastic still, this is the perfect New York Hotel
text:
Hotel has great facilities and the staff are wonderful. Buffet breakfast is good and Lisbeth the server was fantastic.
We were situated very close to Times Square and all the attractions are within easy reach.
Many thanks and we will be back

title: 3 generation in NYC
text: The hotel was very helpful in every circonstances. I came here with my mother and my 3yr old daugther and we had a great welcoming from the structuee that I truly recommend. You can visit a lot of Manhattan walking distant.

title: Will come back
text:
Great rooms, nice and conformtable beds. Breakfast is very good and they switch the menu up every morning.
Attention from Felix and Ana was great at breakfast. Very nice and pleasant people.
Will come back when I visit NY again…………………………..

title: Great service and excellent location
text:
I was welcomed by Henry who was fantastic. I appreciate is great help.
The location is within walking distance to most places and access to the metro if needed.
Good breakfast, and the staff was friendly and keen to help.

title: Delicious breakfast. Looked after by Felix!
text:
Delicious breakfast. Looked after by Felix! 
We came to New York for the Katie Taylor fight at Madison Square Garden. It was an emotional experience from the build up to the ring walk to the actual fight to the final result. Hotel location was handy.

title: Excellent service
text:
Felix, Ana and Lizbeth went above and beyond to keep the breakfast area clean, and refilled. They are kind, and friendly. 

Great service at Homewood Suites! Visited NYC for my 56th birthday. Had a blast and the hotel was in the perfect location.

title: Bien en général
text:
C’est un hôtel qui n’est pas de première fraîcheur mais il est plutôt bien entretenu.
La literie commence à souffrir et en particulier le lit d’appoint sur un sofa pliant.
C’est un hôtel calme malgré son emplacement en plein cœur de NY à deux pas de times
Square.
Le ménage est sur demande, changement de serviettes tous les jours. 
Le buffet du petit-déjeuner est très bien.
Le personnel est plutôt agréable et serviable.

title: A good location at a good price
text: Great location. Walked most places but Uber easily available too. Moved to a low floor so we could take the stairs as elevator lines could be long. Really happy with our 4th floor room at the back. No view to speak of but very quiet. Varied breakfast and always found a seat though it could be taken to the room. Enjoyed taking a drink up to the roof top terrace too. Would recommend for the price and location.

title: Homewood Suites Great Staff!
text: The staff was fantastic! We were celebrating our 2 nephews birthdays and the entire staff signed birthday cards for both boys in addition to a surprise birthday gift for both of them. The breakfast is great but the lobby can get crowded.  We enjoyed our stay so much we are headed back this weekend. Highly recommend!

title: Fantastic Stay-Marco is a true gem!
text: I love Homewood Suites but had never stayed in one in NYC. The rooms were small which was to be expected, but very thoughtfully designed. I was also surprised except for hearing people slam their doors and chatting while waiting for the elevator, I heard absolutely no noise from the rooms. But the thing that puts it over the top for me was the presence of Marco roaming the lobby every day I was there, warmly greeting guests, asking them how their stay was going, if they needed any assistance, etc. I've never stayed in a Homewood Suites with a "concierge"-type person and it really was special. Kudos to Marco. Also thanks to Cyndi for helping me find a room that suited my needs.

title: Perfect location with great staff
text: I was in NYC with my husband and kids and a friend of mine offered to let us stay in her empty apartment on West 76th and 7th Ave for free, but we still chose to pay to be at Homewood Suites and it was worth every penny. The location is just unbeatable because we could walk to almost everything we wanted to see, Broadway shows, Macy's, Penn Station, etc. For anything further away, the subway stations were so close. The staff is exceptional -- reception was unerringly kind, the food service people were always polite to us, AT came to make sure we were happy with our stay. There were five of us and we stayed in two rooms. My large 15 year old son slept happily on the sofa bed, which I was worried about beforehand, but it was no problem. It was awesome to have the large fridge and free breakfast every morning. We had the premium King rooms, which I think were mostly worth it for the excellent premium wifi. The free snacks mean that you're allowed to choose $10 worth of snacks per room from the little store in the hotel (items are way overpriced) but my kids loved doing that every day. When we left, we had a ton of suitcases, which the staff kept for us until we came back to pick them up. The only thing was I wished we didn't have to tell reception that we wanted our rooms cleaned, though the kind receptionist did write it down for the duration of our stay so I didn't need to go back to mention it every day. It was definitely worth it for us to stay here and we'll absolutely choose this place again next time.

title: Good hotel in a great location!
text: I have been staying at this hotel for a number of years since it was renovated and rebranded as a Homewood Suites.  The location on 37th Street between 8th and 9th Avenues in Midtown Manhattan is extremely convenient to Penn Station and tourist attractions.  The price is reasonable for New York, a wonderful buffet breakfast is included,  and the staff, especially Marco, could not be more helpful.  In my last stay, however, I found a number of maintenance issues in my room including a refrigerator that froze any liquids I put in it, a leaking shower, a non-working phone, and a non-working alarm clock.  I reported these problems to the management, but there wasn’t sufficient time to correct  them while I was occupying the room.   It’s obviously challenging for a hotel to be kept “fresh” and in good working order as it ages.  I have every confidence that the management will meet the challenge.  I will certainly stay at this hotel again.

title: A recommander !
text: Très bon hôtel, tout était parfait ( situation, chambre très grande, petit déjeuner, personnel , décor...) Le bémol est le confort du canapé lit qui reste vraiment à âmeliorer). Je recommande vraiment et le quartier est safe.

title: Excelente servicio
text: El Hotel Homewood Suites NYC Midtown Manhattan es una excelente opción para venir en plan familiar a conocer esta bella ciudad! Marco el administrador es el alma del hotel, el servicio de restaurante es excelente uno de sus empleados Félix nos atendió con mucha gentileza. Volveremos indudablemente ♥️

title: Fantastic and friendly customer service
text:
My family and I are traveling from Canada and this is our first time staying at Homewood Suites NYC in Midtown Manhattan. 

Breakfast here is quality and a friendly worker named Pedro was kind enough to ask and get our finished dishes away. We love how the team here talks to us and tries to make us feel welcomed. 

10000000% recommend booking and staying here. We love how clean our rooms are and how they equip you with pots and utensils in our rooms. Very rare to see in a hotel room. 

You’ve got customers for life! Keep up the quality work!! We appreciate it!!

title: Buena calidad precio
text: La estancia en general ha sido buena. La ubicación para el precio es inmejorable (reservado con mucha antelación). La habitación para 5 de una familia es un poco justa, pero suficiente teniendo en cuenta que la usamos para dormir y pocos más. Cuenta con una pequeña cocina que permite algún apaño sin grandes pretensiones. Las camas y la climatización muy bien. No se oye mucho la calle a pesar de lo ruidosa que es NY. La atención del personal bastante bien. Lo único que desmereció bastante fue el desayuno, muy muy muy pobre, escasa variedad (a penas hay fruta y está verde, tres cosas calientes poco comibles y bollería de poca calidad). Acabamos desayunando tostadas de pan de molde con mantequilla todos los días como única opción "segura". Una pena.

title: Recomiendo este hotel
text: Tuve una agradable estadía, todo el crew es muy servicial y amable! Felix fue muy atento y nos ayudó en todo. Gracias. Recomiendo este hotel, el sector en el que está, puedes hablar español con varias personas del crew.

title: Muy buen hotel
text: Es un muy buen lugar para alojarse en Manhattan. Su ubicación es cercana a varias estaciones de colectivos y subtes, que te dan la posibilidad de ir a distintos lugares.  Lo bueno. La excelente atención del personal. Nosotros no hablamos Inglés, solo español, y siempre había algún asistente del hotel que te ayudaba con ese tema. Dentro del personal, debo destacar por su cordialidad y profesionalismo, a Fernando, Pedro, Lizbeth y Félix, quienes se desviven para hacerte sentir como en casa o mejor. Muy educados y serviciales. Lo regular. El desayuno. Es un poco limitado. Apenas lo justo. Nada de continental. Pero es suficiente. Lo malo.  El aseo de la habitación. Tenés que pedir todos los días que te la arreglen, sino solamente te cambian las toallas y colocan jabón y papel higiénico. Ni el inodoro limpian. En 8 días que estuvimos, nunca nos cambiaron las sábanas. Detalles que no son menores, pero que se solucionan hablando. Calculo que algunas de estas situaciones son producto de los tiempos que vivimos y que pronto se normalizaran. En general, es un hotel que recomiendo.

title: Perfetto
text: Soggiorno piacevole e posizione perfetta! Hotel vicino a Times square e Central Park. Colazione ricca. Mia mamma è celiaca e i camerieri sono stati gentilissimi a portarci cibo apposta senza glutine. Grazie alla cameriera Lizbeth per essere stata gentile e premurosa nei nostri confronti, servizio perfetto! Grazie

title: Decent hotel but very disappointed with the wasteful practice of offering plastic forks and paper plates at breakfast
text: This a decent hotel close to Penn Station and the new Hudson's Yard development. The staff were welcoming and we had everything we needed in our suite, though it was smaller than expected. The main reason I've given 3 stars is because of the wasteful use of plastic cups and cutlery and paper plates at breakfast. How can Hilton be committed to waste reduction targets while allowing this practice? The amount of single-use plastic wasted by guests was truly shocking. Washable plates and glasses were provided but hidden below the counter. Sadly it would affect our decision to stay there again.

title: Perfect stay!
text: Our stay was just what we wanted- super easy check in, upgrade available, room ready early, great free breakfast, and staff was all wonderful. Marco was phenomenal and helped us navigate the city for some specific shopping we were looking to do. Location convenient to subway, Madison square garden, Hudson yards, and Times Square. Met or exceeded all of our expectations!

title: Clean nice hotel with great location near penn station and times square
text: Great hotel, great value.  The hot daily breakfast was wonderful-hot, delicious and well staffed quickly refilling empty buffet trays for the next guest in line.  Kudos to Pedro for prompt service, cleaning and keeping the breakfast seating area clean and ready for the next guest.  We enjoyed meeting A.T. and Marco who  were very hospitable and welcoming and ready to answer any question and meet our needs.

title: Birthday trip to NYC
text: We stayed here for a friend’s birthday trip and had a great experience! Clean, very friendly staff (shoutout to AT and Marco!), good breakfast with plenty of variety. Decent location. Would definitely stay again!

title: This is a VERY GOOD Hotel and will never disappoint you!
