text: We stayed at this hotel several times and we have been always treated kindly. A special mention to Mr. IDRIS who is very attentive and has superb professionalism. Larger rooms than those commonly found in NYC, very comfortable beds with clean sheets, good breakfast and very helpful staff.

title: Great choice
text: Very pleasantly surprised by this. Great location with tons of restaurants, take-out choices right there, grocery and subway just a short walk away. No carpeting in room, so it felt cleaner than average. You have a full kitchen so easy to eat in room. Staff was friendly but not invasive. Good breakfast choices and not crowded if you go early. Room was off a side corridor, so even if near elevator very quiet. Good gym and self-serve laundry. Would absolutely choose it again and recommend to others who are willing to spend a bit more but can't afford the top end.

title: Homewood suites 37th  & 8th Manhattan
text:
AWESOME! We love staying here as we are here quite often. Perfect location. Thanks Jonathan lamitolla for your kindness 
The room was clean as always, the front desk staff always professional. Bonus for the morning breakfast! 

Donna p

title: Great stay in NYC
text: Friends and I went to NYC for a birthday extravaganza. We stayed at Homewood Suites and it was great. A.T. and Marco were especially friendly, professional and welcoming. Our room was so nice, had a nice hot breakfast everyday, and elevators were super fast ;) Great location & stay. Would highly recommend.

title: Girls Trip!!
text: Lisbeth was an amazing breakfast staff person. She made sure we were helped and had all that we needed. Lewis made sure i was taken care of and exchanged my mattress, sheets and brought water up… And he was handsome! Kudos Marriott on job well done!

title: Unexpected traveler
text: The Front desk representative was so awesome when check in last night. I told the gentlemen that I've been having trouble with the digital key when I stay hilton hotel and just give me the regular key, The Front desk agent said give him 5 minutes and he's going to fix it for for.I said ok and sure enough  he told its fixed try it out I used the digital key in the elevator one shot I used it on my room door one shot bless that young man for taken his time for fixing my problem then I got even more excited about my room it was gorgeous. The moral of the story is Hospitality at its finest / What to expect when you arrive at a Hotel.

title: A great central Manhattan position, excellent services and staff
text:
3 minutes from the Port Authority Bus Station and about 10 from Times Square. The hotel breakfast is great with excellent service from Felix and the team.

The room was at  the back from away from the road and fantastically quiet, aside of in the in room big fridge kicking in to action throughout the night. We were used to it after the first night and slept right through

Recommended

title: Perfect Hotel!!!
text: I’m Brazilian and I went to New York City to study. I’ve stayed in Homewood Suites By Hilton for 1 month. The room, staffs and breakfast are perfect! Thanks for everything guys! I hope see you soon!!!

title: Weekend Birthday
text:
Had a GREAT Stay at this location 3/24-3/28. That staff was very professional, courteous and helpful. The location is right in the heart of Manhattan. Just a few blocks away from Macy's, Penn Station, Broadway and Time Square. Uber, Lyft and Cabs are very busy in this area. A.T, Tatiana, and June gave a GREAT concierge experience. The breakfast was a great start to our day hot and plentiful, very clean with all the safety precautions in place. The room are spacious for NYC and comfortable bed for those long day of sightseeing. Highly recommend this Homewood Suites!!!

D. Calvin

title: Top off manathan 👍🏻
text:
Emplacement exceptionnel au cœur de manathan, hôtel près du métro et du madisonsquare garden 👍🏻chambre spacieuse, propre , bon accueil réception et conciergerie appréciable.
Excellent petit brunch au déjeuner avec possibilité de ce préparer des lunchs box pour la journée 👍🏻
Réserver via Booking.com tout est nickel et fiable . 
Près de Time square animation garantie 👍🏻
Réfrigérateur dans la chambre très pratique et café et thé à disposition 👍🏻
Personnel agréable et sympathique. 
Je vous recommande cet établissement. 
Tarif correcte en fonction des saisons.

title: Dreckiges Zimmer trotz Beschwerde ignoriert.
text:
Wir haben 2 Nächte dort verbracht. Unsere Erwartung war nicht extrem hoch. Lediglich sauber sollte das Zimmer sein. Leider war dies nicht der Fall. Nachdem wir eingecheckt hatten haben wir Haare im Bett sowie verdreckte Ablagen vorgefunden. 

Es wurde weder vom Service nach der Beschwerde sauber gemacht noch durften wir das Zimmer wechseln. Am Ende haben wir mit Desinfektionsmitteln selbst einigermaßen den Dreck entfernt.

Positiv:
+ gute Lage 
+ freies Frühstück mit OK Qualität 
+ schöne Dachterrasse

title: Home from Home
text:
We were on standby flights from London Heathrow  so could only book accommodation on the morning of our stay once we had checked in. For the flight. Booking this late meant we did not get the best price available. 
There were three adults in our party, and we were looking for a suite rather than a hotel room and this property fitted the bill. 
We took a yellow cab from JFK  , and just over an hour later we had arrived at the property. As it was before 3.30pm we could not check straight in, but the hotel stored our cases for us leaving us free to go off and have some lunch. 
We then checked in a while later, this  was easy and quick. The suite was large with a good size kitchen area, large fridge, 2 ring cooker, and microwave. There was also a dishwasher. 
The bathroom was large and had disabled facilities. Hand rails shower seat. 
The large super king bed was very comfortable, the sofa bed was small and not comfortable to sleep on our son said. 
The hotel offers free breakfast, a choice of hot or cold food but the seating area was small and could not cater for the number of hotel guests. We varied our times but every day was the same. On the last day we collected the food and took it back to our suite, this was a good option. 
The hotel is in a good location, walking distance to Central Park was about an hour. Time square was about 20mins. 
Masks were recommended and there was hand sanitation facilities throughout. 
The rooms were not cleaned during our stay due to Covid but you could request clean towels etc. 
We liked this property and would stay here again.

title: Amazing People
text:
The breakfast was really good and I loved that they had a lot of frozen food for us to eat when everything was closed. 
But the people I met there, Felix and Lizbete, were AMAZING... so kind and eager to help when I needed it the most. I'd give them the world if I could.

title: An excellent hotel
text:
This newish Hilton is clean and comfortable, has an outstanding staff who work very hard, and has very good amenities. I've stayed in NYC many times and paid a lot more for less.  I will stay here again. My breakdown:

Staff: They were always present and always helpful. The hotel is packed (a sign of its success) and these people work very hard. Omar and Idris, behind the front desk, in particular were so awesome. I cannot speak too highly of them. They often seemed to be everywhere, taking care of so many things.

Room: Yes, it is a smaller room. But by NYC standards, *not* small. I had a King with a sofa and was very pleased. (I was traveling alone for business but there is room for two people as well.) The bed was extremely comfortable... one of the best hotel beds I've had in a while. The small kitchen is such a plus, particularly for a long stay. 

Amenities: The laundry room in the basement is a huge plus. (There is also a good dry cleaners right next door.) The gym is nothing fancy but is nice sized for NYC and has what you need to get in a good workout. The breakfast is much better than average. They seem to work hard to vary it day to day, and every day oatmeal and bagels and fruit, etc, are present along with hot items. Coffee is 24/7 in the lobby as well.

Yes the hotel can be very busy and the lobby crowded... they've been sold out the entire time I've been here. I believe it is indicative of how good the hotel is. The elevators can be packed, yes. These older buildings have small elevators, that's NYC. But each floor does have lights indicating where the elevators are. And if you know how to manage elevators (ride up first so they don't fill up before they get to you on the way down; stay on a low floor so you can walk; avoid prime time, etc) you will be fine. 

The hotel is a great location … very easy walk to Times Square, The High Line, etc etc… It’s a winner.

title: Good hotel with select amazing staff
text:
My family and I stayed here for an extended weekend as a short getaway.  Our room was clean, but quite small.  We had a king efficiency studio with "twin" sofa bed.  My children sleep on a twin bed at home, and I must say this was sub-twin size at best.  On the other hand, the king bed was very comfortable and adequately sized.  
Our flight came in early and we did end up having to wait until close to 4pm (the "official" check in time) to get a room.  The front desk staff kindly kept watch over our luggage and even gave my children a bag of chips to help hold over their hunger.  However, we still had to busy ourselves and find a real meal , as we waited nearly 4 hours before any rooms were available.  I can't say that I have experienced this many times with any hotel chain I have ever stayed with.  Arriving early is usually not a problem, but I could see that one front desk staff in particular was trying very hard to accommodate us as best as she could (kudos to Rochelle!).  

The first morning we were here, breakfast was well stocked and had ample variety of hot items (including eggs, potatoes, pancakes, beef, etc), pastries, cereal, yogurt, and a great variety of fresh fruit.  However, the second day was very disappointing.  I came out to eat around 9:40 (breakfast isn't over until 10:30) to find almost no pastries, none of the fruit medley, no bananas, and many other items quickly vanishing and not to be replenished.  As a person on a plant based diet, a variety of fresh produce is essential.  However, the cafeteria workers (like Lizbeth) explained the situation and seemed equally frustrated with being unable to meet the needs of the guests.  Lizbeth directed me to whom I should address my concerns. I went to front office and was met with EXEMPLARY customer service from Rochelle.  She was aware of my health issues and dietary needs and went above and beyond the call to go to a nearby store to purchase some fresh fruit and additional food items for me.  This level of customer care and hospitality is rare and should be commended!  Employees like Rochelle are an asset to the Hilton brand!  Rather than excuses and empty apologies, she affirmatively took steps to rectify the situation.  Rochelle's concern and actions are the epitome of customer service.   
While there were some minor cosmetic issues with the room (peeling wall paper in the bathroom, touch up paint needed) that I felt could be better, this was an overall pleasant stay.  The hotel is walking distance to many shops, restaurants and NYC hot spots.  But the amazing staff, especially Rochelle at the front desk, is what sets it apart! We would definitely come back again.

title: Buena experiencia.
text: Buena relación calidad precio. Habitaciones con cocina bien equipada, buen desayuno y personal de servicio muy amables y atentos, en especial Felix y Lizbeth en el desayuno siempre dispuestos a atender los requerimientos de los huéspedes.

title: Newyork 2022
text:
Excellent séjour dans cet hôtel que je recommande,top emplacement à manathan , propreté , respect des normes Covid , personnel agréable, excellent petits déjeuners avec possibilité de lunch box 👍🏻
Merci pour cet excellent séjour 👍🏻

title: Centrale ma da migliorare
text:
Hotel centrale vicino Penn Station, l'Empire State Building, Hudson Yards e Times Square.
Tuttavia in una zona molto rumorosa e (purtroppo per loro) con molti barboni (il covid si è fatto sentire) che non ti fa sentire in sicurezza totale.
Personale della recption abbastanza sbrigativo e poco soridente in generale (mentre il personale della colazione è il contrario, molto gentile).
Camera abbastanza grande con  punto cucina, ma frigorifero rumorosissimo e una sola sedia per mangiare anche se la camera è per 2, quindi poco pratico.
Colazione a buffaet con ampia scelta, ma se si arriva all'ora di punta si fa fatica a trovare posto.
3 ascensori possono sembrare tanti, ma in effetti non lo sono visto il numero di camere e di piani, quindi spesso si aspetta a lungo prima di poter salire.
Lavanderia automatica comoda, anche se un po' cara.

title: Buen desayuno y muy buena ubicación.
text: Recomiendo este hotel, las camas son muy cómodas y el desayuno está bastante bien. La ubicación es excelente y es un hotel de un tamaño medio. Lo único que a veces el ascensor en horas puntas tarda demasiado porque solo hay dos ascensores. Pero en general todo bien y siempre que el precio es razonable escojo este hotel.

title: Mostly good, but some hiccups
text:
Our family of three stayed in the king suite with pull out couch. It is New York City, so the rooms are small, but I felt it was plenty big enough for the three of us. It looked like the rooms were recently updated. I appreciated the laminate floors as opposed to dirty carpets. The bathroom was fine; not a lot of counter space. Shower was good. Overall it was clean.
The complimentary breakfast I thought was great. There was something each day (eggs, French toast, pancakes, bagels, fruit, yogurt, oatmeal). However, there was little seating; not enough for the size of the hotel. That being said, we were able to sit every day, although it was on the couch, but it was fine.
The elevators had some issues. Often times one or two of the three were not working and it would take a long time to catch an elevator that was not full. We often took the stairs from the 10th floor to go down, because it was faster.
I did not like that the rooms were not cleaned every day. We were not told that you have to request to have your room cleaned 24 hours in advance. They did come in and replace the towels, but one day housekeeping did not show up at all.
Location is good, but if you are looking to be close to Times Square, it is about a 10 minute walk, so it is not like you step out of your hotel and you are there.

title: Okay for location but there are better choices
text:
This place is under-staffed and overwhelmed. Not sure where to start. All downtown hotels are small. This one is very small. The rooms are small, the elevators are small, the lobby is small. 

Two people working at front desk and 14 people in line. Three elevators that are always full when they are working. Your only prayer is to hit UP if you want to go DOWN so you are in there like sardines. 

Breakfast is good but runs out of food and closes EXACTLY at 10:30. No place to sit if you do get food. 

Lobby is always full of people just hanging out. Room promised at 4 pm; not ready until 6:30 PM. No restaurant or room service. No foam pillows, 

Doors SLAM like a rock. 

WiFI is SLOW. 

Won't stay here again.

title: Buen servicio
text:
El servicio es excelente,en especial fui muy bien atendida por Felix y Lizbeth, grandes profesionales y amabilísimos, atentos y entrañables 

Me encantó poder hablar en español pues de ese modo pude relacionarme con mayor facilidad.

title: Good, everything You need
text: The hotel it's ok, although they don't have cleaning service in the rooms. The included breakfast si very good, Elizabeth and Felix are great and they help in everything but it is difficult in business ours to mantain things because it is a lot of people and only two people helping. Thank you.

title: Great location
text:
Great location for broadway shows, nyc attractions and thousands of restaurants.
Good size rooms with microwave, hot plate, dishwasher and full size refrigerator. You probably won’t get a room with a view, and rooms are not luxurious, but very functional.
Good breakfast included in rate, but best to eat early as it becomes a bit chaotic later!
During our stay one of the 3 small elevators was out of service and guests were very frustrated by the lengthy wait for the 2 overworked units.

title: Felix lo mejor
text: El hotel tiene una ubicación estupenda, pero lo mejor sin duda es Felix, un trabajador amable, servicial y atento en todo momento. Gracias a Felix por su ayuda y su amabilidad durante toda nuestra estancia.

title: NYC trip
text: Flex and Omar at the Homewood suites were amazing employees!  The Hoel was close to everything we visited in midtown NY. I will be back and the staff here is amazing and cleanliness was on point.  See you soon.

title: Big room but a bit dark
text: Good location..37th @ 8th AV and our room (311) was very large. Only one small couch and not much furniture but could be because handicap access room. Lots of dark wood and not great lighting. Three elevators for 24 floors and we ended up doing the stairs several times due to long waits. Breakfast was adequate...the usual. Staff was friendly and helpful.  We were on front over 37th and no noise. Good soundproof windows. Place is fine if you can snag a good rate.

title: First Timer in NYC
text: Felix and Lizbeth were extremely helpful at the breakfast. Staff was helpful and room was satisfactory. Parking is across the street at an independent garage. Make sure to ask for instructions prior to attempting to park.

title: Close to everything
text: Breakfast in hotel is great! After night out that what you need :) Felix the server is helping you to find everything you need and keep place clean and safe. Thank you for warm and welcoming service. Will return for sure

title: Excelente experiencia
text: Todo el staff del hotel se desvive porque los huéspedes tengan una experiencia magnífica como la que tuvimos nosotros. El desayuno muy completo, la cena de cortesía que ofrecen de lunes a jueves un gran detalle.  Muy cerca de Times Square y el metro a 2 minutos. Lo único que no nos gusto es que tenías que pedir que te hicieran la habitación el día de antes. Sin duda cuando vuelva a NY me alojaré en este hotel.  Mi hijo que es el más crítico de la familia me pide que diga que su nota para el hotel es un 10. A destacar la amabilidad de AT. En resumen, supero ampliamente nuestras expectativas.

title: Cumple las expectativas
text:
Todo lo que buscábamos lo encontramos en este hotel: ubicación excelente, habitación muy amplía y silenciosa, desayuno completo y atención en recepción muy cordial.
Relación calidad-precio muy acertada!
Sin duda repetiríamos en un futuro viaje a Nueva York

title: Boa Escolha mas precisa melhorar a atenção ao cliente e Serviço ... os pequenos detalhes fazem diferença!
text:
Hotel moderno, confortável e limpo , boa localização mas que pode melhorar a receptividade e atenção ao cliente...
Eu Havia solicitado quarto em andar alto e frontal a avenida e mesmo chegando durante a tarde fui informado que era o único quarto disponível... ao usar o chuveiro pela primeira vez, o box  apresentava vazamento .... informei a recepção e me disseram que somente seria possível trocar de quarto no próximo dia e que eu teria que descer com as malas e aguardar ... o problema do box foi ignorado e sequer me ligaram pra perguntar a respeito .... como já estava alocado , achei melhor deixar do jeito que estava mesmo estando insatisfeito... achei isso um grande descaso .... o serviço de quarto é bem básico....só trocam toalhas e retiram o lixo .... 
Wi-fi cai com frequência... outro ponto a melhorar ...
No geral acho sim uma boa escolha na região mas por ser um hotel de bandeira Hilton , deveriam dar mais atenção ao cliente e não te tratar como simplesmente um cliente a mais....

title: Great service
text:
The personnel was nice. Good breakfast! It include eggs, french toast, pastries, bread, fruits, cereal, oatmeal, coffee and more. Thank you Félix and Ana for your kindness and service.

 I Will come back. The hotel is about 13 minutes walking from Times Square.

title: MUY BUEN SERVICIO
text: Todo muy bien. Las instalaciones son modernas y estan en muy buen estado. Las habitaciones son super cómodas, la cocina esta muy bien para salir del paso, es decir sirva para calentar o hacer alguna comida no muy elaborada. El desayuno es muy completo, abundante y rico. La limpieza esta muy bien. Destaco la atención y amabilidad de Felix. La ubicación esta muy bien, todo esta muy cerca.

title: Everything was great at The Homewood Suites
text: The rooms are very comfortable and it’s near to Times Squre and to the Metro. The breakfast is very good, Felix and Lizbeth are great!! The only problem is the Wifi in the room!! We are coming back for sure!!

title: Authentic Presence
text:
I would like to take time to highlight all of the staff at homewood suites in midtown for the work that they do everyday.   

This week I'm sending kudos to Oliver for his consistent pattern in showing not only a professional mindset but a true authentic leadership style.  His life purpose of showing up to work with a smile and interacting with guest definitely connects with the hotels mission and values.

Thanks Oliver for showing me your trueself.

title: Super café da manhã
text:
Café da manhã ótimo, entendimento especial de ANA e FÉLIX, com muita boa vontade e animação! 

Recomendamos o hotel 🌟

Ótima localização, próximo aos hells kitchen e a TS, quartos com tamanho razoável!!

title: Fabulous choice, great location
text:
Our experience with this hotel couldn’t have been better! Nice, friendly staff. Clean, well-equipped room. Very nice hot breakfast. Great location. Discounted parking at garage across the street. Great experience. 

They let us check in to our room at 1:15 on a Saturday. We were pleasantly surprised by the size of our King room. It was equipped with microwave, coffee maker, fridge (not mini), stove, and dishwasher. Also stocked with pots, pans, dishes, etc. We weren’t there long enough to cook, but great option for longer stays. 

Gym is very nice and the rooftop has lovely seating areas to hang out. 

We will gladly be back.

title: My favorite hotel to stay in. Very clean!!!!!
text: The associates are very welcoming from the beginning to the end. What I love about this hotel is that you have everything you will need especially the microwave and refrigerator. Will book again soon.

title: Excelente desayuno
text:
El personal es muy amable especialmente Felix y Lisbet, te ayudan en todo lo que necesites. Hotel limpio y bien ubicado.
Cerca de todos los puntos de interés.
Desde que llegamos nos atendieron muy bien.

title: Atención y servicio
text: Excelente recepcion...muchas gracias en especual a Felix y Lizbeth del buffet que nos han tratado muy atentamente. Un buen trato hace a tener satisfaccion de alojarse en este hotel. Buena ubicacion y limpieza.

title: Dirty
text: There was food in the microwave from I don't know from how many guest before me guest before me. The food was so old it had mold. It was just nasty and when I reported it to the front desk agent he acted like he didn't care I would've appreciated an apology at least.

title: Excellent rapport qualité/prix/localisation
text:
Situation idéale à 3 blocks de Times Square, du départ des Big Bus, de l'Empire State et du rockfeller Center.
Chambres spacieuses, excellente literie, petit-déjeuner convenable (et gratuit). Très bon rapport qualité/prix.

title: Très correct, dans un quartier qui l’est moins
text:
Situé entre Penn Station ( 5 mn à pied) et le terminal de la 42ème , l’établissement est dans une rue plutôt calme mais le quartier génère une faune pas toujours agréable à croiser, souvent réfugiée dans le métro , rats, mendiants ou junkies : naturellement, l’hôtel n’y est pour rien et je suggère un autre choix, ce que je ferai la prochaine fois.
Lobby occupé jour et nuit, à l’américaine, les clients y mangent leur fast-food avant de regagner leur chambre.
Personnel relativement aimable, rien à voir cependant avec les commentaires dithyrambiques précédents ! Tenue et maintien correspondant à la catégorie de l’hôtel.
Ascenseurs rapides malgré un WE très fréquenté. Chambre sur rue insonorisée, lumineuse et bien équipée , le ménage n’est fait que sur demande.
Buffet de petit déjeuner changeant chaque jour suivant une rotation éprouvée, qualité standard . Beaucoup de monde mais pas de cohue.
The last but not the least : rapport qualité prix très correct

title: Everything you would hope for......
text: Stayed in corner suite on 20th floor. Huge room, typical view, quiet, very nice amenities within the room, clean, modern and well kept. Staff was very helpful and courteous in all areas. Fulfilling and plentiful breakfast. Great location within walking distance to Times Square, Theater District and amazing store (Brooklyn Fare) just up the street for everything you could possibly need. Also very nice, big and clean gym/equipment too. Stay again? In a New York minute......!

title: Hotel à minima, expérience mitigée
text:
Après une longue réflexion pour donner mon avis, je souhaite faire part de mes impressions mitigées sur cet hôtel, où nous avons séjourné 6 nuits: 
Les points forts: situation (à deux pas de Time Square, de port Autority pour ceux qui arrive en bus de Newark), chambre spacieuse, hôtel propre, petit-déjeuner très correct, coin cuisine (avec plaque et réfrigérateur), plutôt calme.
Pour les points faibles: modification des chambres réservées (3 chambres studio au lieu des 2 suites à 2 lits et canapé-lit réservées 3 mois plutôt pour 2 familles avec 5 enfants mineurs). Mais le plus gros point faible réside dans les équipements ( parures de drap du canapé non fourni, 3 serviettes pour 4,  des couverts pour 3 quand on est 4, pour 4 quand on est 5, pas de torchons, pas d'éponge, pas de produits pour le lave-vaisselle, pas de balai alors que le ménage se limite au changement des serviettes).
C'est juste dommage et incompréhensible pour cet hôtel qui mérite beaucoup mieux. Alors n'hésitez pas à faire comme nous: réclamer, réclamer, réclamer...

title: FIRST RATE CUSTOMER SERVICE !! A++++ FOR THE STAFF!!
text:
Traveling particularly during a pandemic can be difficult as well as stressful. But the staff at the Homewood Suites makes you feel right at home. They put the "us" in Customer Service.  They put us, the customer first. 

From Mr. Omar, to Ms. Rochelle at the front desk as well as the fantastic and super attentive Mr. Oliver (I like to refer to him as the Ambassador) everyone was supreme.

Give the staff a raise!!! They're worth it!!
And I will surely return because of them!!

title: Todo Excelente..su personal muy cordial ..recuerdo al Sr Felix muy amable y atento. Las habitaciones impeclables
text:
Excelente hotel, todo impecable , su personal siempre dispuesto y atento.
Los cuarto aseados y oredenados
El desayuno abundante y variado
Super recomendable para alojarse tanto sea por vacaciones o negocios

title: No compassion during the recent bomb cyclone snowstorm
text: I had a reservation for the weekend of January 28th 2022 for a business meeting. This was the weekend of the huge east coast snowstorm. The Friday morning of January 28th my meeting was cancelled due to the huge snowstorm. I immediately called the hotel to cancel and spoke with both the operations manager, Nick, as well as the hotel manager, John. They offered a 50% return of my money because it was the day of arrival. I tried to explain that the storm is currently in progress, my meeting was canceled because of the storm and there is no reason for me to travel up I95 from Pennsylvania in the storm. Needless to say, both were quite smug and stated they needed to defer their costs and they would not issue a full refund. As a decades long Hilton Honors member, AMEX Hilton cardholder, and customer, it is amazing that this hotel can't see the forest for the trees. Additionally, if you try to contact Hilton themselves, you can't get any satisfaction. They refer you to Guest Assistance and EVERY agent you get is from far outside of the United States. All they do is call the hotel, get the same answers, and then after putting you on hold for 45 minutes, tell you there is nothing they can do. If you ask to speak to somebody in corporate, they tell you that they are the highest level that the public can access. Hilton has lost my business forever. There are so many great choices for other hotels in Manhattan and around the world. Use another hotel that can appreciate their long term loyal customers and not treat them like fools!

title: Awesome breakfast experience!
text:
Complementary breakfast was over the top!
Anything and everything you could want for breakfast buffet. Even the servers were on top of everything Lizbeth  & Felix went out of there way making sure we were ok,food stocked and area constantly cleaned while people constantly coming and going.  Love it!

title: Review about the hotel employees
text: I really liked how Felix, Ana and Lizbeth (the hotel employees) were always attentive to what you need. It was an excellent service and I would really like to come again to this hotel. They made my stay at the hotel a nice experience.

title: Great find in midtown
text: Stayed here for 10 nights - hotel room was the quietest hotel room I’ve ever stayed in. Space and bed was comfortable and loved having the kitchen. Hotel is walking distance to everything in midtown and nearby subway so nyc is within reach. Everyone was extremely friendly and helpful at the hotel, especially Lizbeth and Rochelle. Breakfast was always good and so nice to have included daily. Will continue to recommend this hotel to everyone I know and will be back!

title: Hotel homewood suite NYC
text:
Los mejores habitaciones limpia y ordenada 
La cómoda desayuno gran variedad y excelente 
Y sus empleados ana lizbeth 
Volvemos son los mejores 
Los recomiendo 100%

Muy atentos serviciales y responsables .

title: Ótima acomodação
text: Adoro este lugar, limpo e bem localizado e organizado, sempre que vou a NY fico neste lugar. Os funcionários são educados e agradáveis. Super recomendo. Minha família ama este lugar, não vejo a hora de voltar.

title: Friend's Birthday Weekend
text: Stayed over for the weekend, celebrating my friend's birthday. We had a great time! Breakfast was great at the Homewood suites NYC Midtown Manhattan. The studio room was perfect! Looking forward to go back! Felix was great!👍

title: NY visit
text: Excelente servicio, todo es muy bueno, las personas que ayuda en la zona del desayuno están muy pendientes todo el tiempo (Félix y Lisbeth). Muy recomendado el hotel, también la habitación es son muy amplias y realizan buen aseo.

title: Nice for the  price
text: The front desk was very pleasant. The room for NYC standards was large and Clean. , we got the smallest King  (fine for 2 ppl) with a small sofa do not know if opens or not. The bathroom is small with a nice shower,t although it's overhead not a handheld showerhead,.safe, full-size fridge, 2 burner stove, microwave & small dishwasher. There is a laundromat in the bldg. Rooftop open-air with chairs. We sat for a while, view ok, No bar or restaurant, but you can BYOB. Breakfast was ok, They have gloves and wipes although I really didn't see anyone use. Coffee/tea available 24/7. The eggs looked/tasted pre-frozen so ehh, pancakes, turkey sausage links, slices of bread with a variety of portions of speads, cereal, and Fresh Fruit apples, bananas, and oranges. They also had cut fruit which tasted good. Location is ok lots of delis, so other restaurants nearby. . There is a wine store block away. 2-3 other hotels and some office buildings. 2 parking lots neither is cheap but its NYC.  Overall for the price, I would recommend it. unless breakfast is really important, then stay at cheaper place and buy breakfast out. It was fine for us. if you have a ? feel free to ask.

title: Excelente atención
text:
Muy buen desayuno, muy completo. El staff siempre super atento. Nos vamos contentos! Recomendaría 100% el hotel con la opción de desayuno. Especial shoutout a Felix, un genio :) 
Nos encantó la barra de te y cafe disponible todo el día, fundamental para los días frios! La ubicación del hotel excelente tambien

title: Fam vacation
text: We had an awesome stay! Breakfast was very good and it varies everyday! Absolutely loved the complementary coffee and tea you have unlimited access to (perfect for cold weather when you leave and come back home).

title: Family Stay
text:
Homewood Suites is somewhere we have always stayed; It’s a very cozy hotel. Very clean and very comfortable to be in. Individual Kitchen, Fridge, even dishwasher included in the hotel room! There is a nice area downstairs with a laundry room, business room and fitness center. Also a nice rooftop but it was too cold to be able to enjoy it. All very clean. The staff is very friendly and always open to help; from the staff at the breakfast bar to the staff at the front desk. The breakfasts are okay, but still a very comfy option to go for! The rooms, due to COVID, aren’t cleaned unless you ask and we have to ask for new towels and amenities every once in a while. Other then that, a great stay!
We definitely know that if we ever come to NYC again, we’re staying here!

title: Kudos to Felix
text: During my stay from 1/22-1/26, Felix in house keeping was very pleasant and friendly. I asked for Splenda delivered to my room (1602), he brought it quickly. It's pandemic times and there is staff shortage. Number of guests has likely not reduced. So there is extra pressure on staff. He not only delivered on time, he had a big smile on his face when he showed up. I greatly appreciate his service with a smile and promptness.

title: Solides Hotel, gute Lage, schön ruhig
text:
Problem beim Einchecken mit Kreditkarte, unfreundlicher Umgang. (We can’t check you in, there’s a problem with your bank)

 Erst die Aufforderung, den Manager zu sprechen, hat geholfen, der hat sich dann auch bemüht und es geklärt.

Heizung funktionierte nicht, wurde aber rexht schnell repariert. Viele Stellen, die nicht sauber waren. Küche/Besteck…

Ansonsten ein gutes Hotel, ruhig, solid ausgestattet, gute Zimmer. Typisches amerikanisches Frühstück, viel Plastikbesteck u Papierteller. To-Go option ist sehr gut.

title: Muy Bueno
text: Buenas habitaciones, excelente la ubicación (prácticamente caminas a todos lados). Si bien no me gusta el desayuno gringo, en este caso encontre gran variedad para desayunar. Aveces hay mucha gente bajando y subiendo y los ascensores demoraron un poco. De no estar en un piso 7 siempre utilizaria las escaleras

title: 1st Time New Yorker
text:
It was our families first time to New York. Definitely a different pace but still enjoyable and memorable. Accommodations made is easier.
Pleased crew took care of us all the way. Cleanliness. Nice views of city skylines.

title: Manhattan Disappointment
text: Reserved a queen suite, upon arrival room was switched without knowledge to king suite which doesn’t accommodate (3) adult guest to include (1) male.  Ultimately found out the queen suites were under renovation until 1/10.  Room changed to a lower exchange room and charged and upgrade fee of $75 per night.  Heat went out in room the first night and couldn’t be fixed immediately.  We were switched again.  The lodging part of my trip was extremely unsatisfactory.  Contacted Hilton Honors.  Awaiting a response.

title: Outstanding experience!
text: Recently visited NYC to accompany a family member to see a specialist at Mt. Sinai Hospital. I called ahead of our trip to explain our situation as I was concerned about traveling due to COVID. A very kind and empathetic front desk agent explained to me all the pandemic protocols that were in place, and assured me that our room would be sanitized and ready for our arrival. We were warmly greeted the moment we entered the lobby, and subsequently checked into an incredibly immaculate and very comfortable room. Our entire stay was flawless, the staff is uniformly kind, efficient, and courteous. The hotel itself is remarkably quiet and conveniently located. All the common areas such as the lobby, elevators, and dining area were very clean. The complimentary breakfast had a great variety, and containers were readily available to facilitate returning to your room to eat. The business center was great, I truly appreciated being able to print some last minute forms on site. While I chose not to request housekeeping services during our stay, a call to the front desk to replenish some items brought them quickly to our door. I was able to extend our stay  effortlessly, the gentlemen at the desk always graciously assisted us as our needs changed. Thanks to everyone for all the kindness and support.

title: Our family vacation
text: Staff very courteous and helpful. The breakfast was very good and cafeteria was clean but we felt that they rush you towards the end of the breakfast time period. They need to improve on that. The rest of our stay was excellent. Clean , secure and comfortable accommodations.

title: Great Hotel
text: Excellent service. Great breakfast, with múltiple options including gluten free. The staff is very friendly and respectful especially Lizbeth who is very kind and  attentive. They are always cleaning the tables so everything is impecable. The rooms are confortables and and well equiped. everything is perfect

title: Ottimo rapporto qualita'/comodita' e prezzo, soprattutto per essere nel pieno centro di Manhattan
text: Ottimo rapporto qualita'/comodita' e prezzo, soprattutto per essere nel pieno centro di Manhattan. La stanza era molto ben equipaggiata e i servizi offerti in aggiunta (lavanderia fai da te, cucinino in camera, colazione inclusa) sono di gran valore se si soggiorna per qualche giorno a NY

title: Feels like home
text: The staff was very helpful in getting our family two adjoining rooms for the week.  Complimentary breakfast is lovely.  Lizbeth was wonderful and personally made sure we had everything we needed in the morning.  Three out of four in my family are gluten free so the staff toasted us some delicious gluten free bread for our breakfasts!

title: Buena opción para el centro de Nueva York
text: Buena opción para el centro de NYC y en donde la gran mayoría de los hoteles no ofrecen desayuno ni facilidades en su lobby. Limpio con un relativo comedor de desayuno espacioso solo llegando a chocar entre huéspedes en días de fiestas y periodos muy ocupados como Navidad, Año Nuevo, etc

title: Second stay in a month
text: We stayed here in August 2021 and returned in September 2021 we liked it so much. The front desk is very professional with special shout out to Idris. The location in Midtown is very convenient to everywhere we wanted to be. The hotel was kept very clean and we enjoyed the complimentary breakfast very much. Part of the staff from housekeeping we had interaction with were Felix, Lizabeth and Ana and they deserve recognition for their good work. Can't wait to return soon!

title: Blood stains on sheets
text:
This hotel made me feel gross. Packed with people, only 2 elevators for a 22 floor hotel, staff was not trained properly, did not welcome us as gold members. 

We went to sleep on sheets that had blood stains on them because we didn’t think we would need to pull them back to look at them. I was so grossed out the next morning!

They took $100 off my rate after I showed them photos… but the GM didn’t even bother coming out to talk to us. The whole experience was unnerving. Quite frankly I don’t think the $100 off was enough - we definitely won’t return and it honestly makes me want to avoid Hilton hotels in the future.

title: Great stay during Christmas
text: Everything was great from top to Bottom. Enjoyed the stay. We arrived on Christmas and staff was really nice. The breakfast was great and the location was right where we wanted to be. Time square and lots of stores within walking distance.

title: Not accommodating at all for COVID cancellations
text:
Booked a room for Monday, December 27th.  Was planning on being in town for a Broadway show.  The show was cancelled on Friday, December 24th.   I called the hotel the next morning, they said they couldn't help me because I had an Advanced Purchase reservation--which apparently means no changes could be made by the hotel.  They said I'd have to talk to the Advanced Purchase team, but that they only take calls Monday-Friday.  When I called back Monday to talk with the Advanced Purchase team on Monday, they said since I was calling on the date of the reservation there was nothing they could do.  
The Hilton rep said they were open for calls on Sat/Sun even though the front desk rep had told me they weren't.
It's very frustrating.  I bought a $672 ticket, and Hilton was unwilling to make any concessions (not even a credit for a future stay) for a situation that was outside of my control.  This is not the Hilton experience I've come to expect!

title: Nyc Hilton
text: We had a good stay. Loved the phone app for key to room. Did not like the heavy bathroom door that would not close, shampoo and toiletries not great, and the cleaning of housekeeping could be improved.

title: Excellent property!
text: We enjoyed our stay during Christmas. Perfect location - close to Herald Square (Macy’s), Empire State Building, and Times Square. Excellent customer service from front desk. One issue, but maintenance responded quickly.

title: Perfect Place for Family of 5
text: We stayed 2 nights. The room was clean and spacious to accommodate 5 people. It was within short walk to Times Square, Broadway, and the subway. We took advantage of the discounted parking garage across the street. Family enjoyed the complimentary breakfast. Staff was helpful for us 1st time visitors. Will definitely stay here again for our next NYC visit.

title: Great stay in NYC
text: Was very pleased with my stay at the Homewood Suites in Manhattan, NYC. The breakfast was really good. The rooms were nice & and big as well. The place was super clean. I felt very secure with the keycards being needed to activate the elevator.

title: Holiday Sparkle in NYC
text: What a breakfast buffet? Wowzaaaa! Fantab! Friendly & helpful staff, waived fee for an early check-in, nice fitness center, outdoor private courtyard, rooftop terrace, location easy to get anywhere in Manhattan, allowed late checkout, guitar player/singer in lobby day of check-out a plus, clean, safe, plenty of storage space in room, comfy bed, nice bathroom, full fridge/freezer, dishwasher, microwave, sink and two-burner stove and coffee service 2/7!  Can’t think of anything missing. Loved it!

title: Great location
text: We stayed one night for exploring the city for the holidays. Hotel accommodated our request to check in early due to dinner reservations and upgraded our room for more space for my family. Parking garage across the street was convenient and priced reasonably. Great location to midtown and short drive for Ubers to uptown.

title: A little disappointed
text: I was a little disappointed in this hotel. There wasn’t a charging station in the room and no outlets near the beds. I use a CPAP machine and it is very important to have an outlet to plug in my machine. I had asked the front desk for an extension cord and was told no but there is a CVS nearby. The beds were also to firm for my taste.

title: Hilton Still Got It..
text:
Stayed here from 9th - 13th Jan and then again checked in again on the 14th after a short trip out of NYC. The On-App Check-In worked amazingly well, the room was ready even before I arrived and I got to pick my room on the app from my cab.
The staff is amazingly polite and helpful.
Had a small issue with the house keeping but the on-duty manager, Mr Dontavius resolved the issue immediately. He even came up to my room to personally check the issue. 
Mr Dontavius and Mr Henry at the check in desk are doing an amazing job keeping the guest happy. The room was clean, spacious with a complete kitchen.   Breakfast surprisingly  amazing considering the other hotels are just maximizing the profits under the garb of pandemic restrictions.
Very Very well located on 37th, which is like five minutes walk from Penn Station, Macy and many other shops.

title: Home away from home!
text: Aloha NYC!! This hotel is a must stay for so many reasons. The hotel is spotless is clean. They use every precaution to keep you safe during your stay. Your room has a full bathroom & kitchen. If you are so lucky to get to know the staff like I did like Samir, Miguel & the entire front desk you will be thankful. As well as Kayla & Kevin in sales just super down to earth people. There is no other hotel I will every stay in NYC. They made me feel as I was at home.

title: Excelente servicio
text:
Muy buena ubicación
Excelente servicio 
Muy bien Félix en el servicio de desayuno
Muy buena seguridad en todo el Hotel las arias comunes limpias los baños limpios todo estuvo perfecto en mi estancia en especial el servicio de Felix en el desayuno vuelvo a comentar

title: Great Attention / Service
text: Senaida is a great representative for this hotel. Very attentive, knows her guests and is very helpful.  The hotel rooms are spacious, clean and comfortable.  Parking is easy and convenient. I also appreciate having a good gym.

I absolutely loved my stay at this hotel. It’s a seven minute walk from Penn Station in about a 10 minute walk to Times Square if that & it’s right in the garment district. When I arrived I was promptly greeted by hotel staff tour extremely friendly and accommodating & I was given two complimentary  water bottles so that was nice. The view from my room on the 17th floor was absolutely beautiful & I never had to wait too long for an elevator so it was great. The terrace on the 22nd floor was really Nice even in the cold weather. If you’re looking for a nice hotel in Midtown close to Penn Station then this is it. the price was extremely reasonable & the room was nice sized. I stayed in a king suite with a kitchen it so it had a fridge, stove, dishwasher, sink & Dishes and cutlery. The room it’s self was clean as well as the bathroom. I would definitely recommend staying here if you’re spending a few days- long haul trips in the city. The only thing I didn’t like was that check in is extremely late- 4pm is kind of crazy but there’s lot to do in the area to pass the time. Overall I enjoyed my stay and will definitely come back!

title: Almost a 10 highly recommended hotel
text: Very clean and spacious (Manhattan standards) hotel close to Penn station. Kitchen was great, hotel was very clean as was lobby. Staff were very friendly and helpful. Minor concerns, broken door handle in room and lobby/beeakfast areas were very packed with people. But really this is a great hotel. We will stay there again!

title: Vacanza
text: Ottima posizione,buona colazione camera buona,ma pulizia quotidiana inesistente.ottimo per visitare a piedi il centro di Manhattan.Buona l’accoglienza,molto gentili e disponibili.Ripeto la pulizia della stanza non è esistita.

title: Trotz Corona-Einschränkungen empfehlenswert
text: Es hat etwas gedauert, bis wir alles kapiert haben. Der Service ist während Corona ausgesetzt. Er findet nur auf Anfrage statt. Das sollt beitritts beim Einchecken gesagt werden - wäre hilfreich. So waren wir die ersten Tage sehr verwundert, als das Zimmer nicht gereinigt und die Handtücher nicht gewechselt wurden. Dann gings aber ganz gut. Nach Anfrage wurde schnell reagiert.

title: Nice stay
text:
I had a great stay the staff was very helpful and friendly specially the guest agent with glasses ( African American ) 
And thanks to breakfast team who was making sure the food area was always clean all the time

title: Not so great
text: The room was smaller than it appeared on the web site.  Even with a kitchen of sorts, it was not conducive to cooking and eating in.  The room also needed maintenance, such as one of the shower doors.  The location was good; near buses and subways.

title: Viaje inmejorable a NY!
text:
Recomendable 100%! 
Hotel muy muy bien ubicado, cerca del metro y de times square. Habitaciones grandes con mini cocina. Servicio excelente y el personal, especialmente Felix, super amable. Desayuno incluido y bebida disponible todo el dia.

title: Potenziale buona soluzione ma..
text:
l'hotel è in buona posizione a pochi passi da Times Square e dalla metro (sebbene la sera tutta l'area di Midtown è molto malfamata piena di homeless/disperati). Ad ogni modo veniamo all'hotel: early check in a pagamento salato (100 USD); colazione inclusa (il che è un plus per NYC) ma molto monotona e poco assortita di qualità mediocre. 
I punti dolenti in realtà son i servizi: in pratica, se non vengono avvisati giorno per giorno, non ti rifanno le stanze ne alcun tipo di pulizia/cambio di asciugamani, il che è inaccettabile per un Hilton e considerato che in ogni caso per una camera standard ci vogliono non meno di 250/300 dollari a notte. detto questo, esperienza da non ripetere, a quel prezzo probabilmente a NYC, anche in zone migliori, si trova molto di meglio. peccato!

title: Ottimo rapporto qualità prezzo
text: Hotel ben organizzato, pulito con un plus che è la colazione inclusa. Lo studio è comodo per 2 persone , in 3 un po’ troppo piccolo . La cucina adatta più per scaldare qualcosa, certo non ci si può cucinare. Comunque buona esperienza! Sicuramente consigliato

title: Not So bad, not so good
text: Water was cut off mid shower due to pipe issue. Issue with room being serviced as requested. Breakfast was decent. Staff was nice, overall. I’ll definitely shop around with hotels in the same area before booking this one. It was centrally located.

title: Tolle Lage, leider nicht wirklich sauber
text:
Die Zimmer waren schon zu Beginn nicht wirklich sauber. Reinigung hat aufgrund Pandemie auch während des Aufenthaltes keine stattgefunden. 

Beim Frühstück gab es wenig Auswahl und es wurde auch zum Ende nicht mehr aufgefüllt. 

Lüftung im Zimmer lässt sich leider nicht abstellen und pustet genau Richtung der Kopfkissen. 

Kühlschrank ist sehr laut. 

Die Lage ist okay.

Das Personal war freundlich.

title: Bad management Bad problem resolution followed by horrible customer service.
text:
I booked through Hilton specifically to avoid third party reservation nightmares, only to arrive and find out they had the wrong room booked for me, one that will not accommodate my family.
Then I was sent to the garage at midnight to park my car and the garage was CLOSED because it’s FULL!!! I had to drive around randomly in NYC looking for a garage. Finally i was told if I needed room service they needed 24 hr notice, I gave them three of those just in case and came back and still nothing was done. The cherry on top when the manager came and was upset at me why i was upset and started bragging about if he punched me I won’t get up!!! At that moment I decided to go to my room and cancel my membership with Hilton Honors. I don’t need this abuse, especially when we have a lot of other options.

title: THIS PLACE HAS GONE DOWNHILL - AVOID!
text:
I’ve been coming to this hotel for years but it has really gone downhill. Lots of homeless out front and staff that does not seem to care.  We had to file multiple complaints with the front desk because of all the noise the cleaning crew was making at all hours of the day AND night.  Constant banging because they would clean with the door security lock in place and every time they went into the room which was 20 to 30 times per room you would hear loud banging noises as the door would slam shut.  There was also constant yelling in the hallways, and if you wanted to walk to your room you would have to walk over piles of used towels and bed linens which were stacked in the hallways. Not exactly sanitary in the Covid era.
When we complained to the front desk, they tried to put the blame on other guests for the loud noise but we could clearly see who was making the noise. Finally after two days of this, I asked to speak to the manager however the front desk claims no manager was working. It got so bad that we finally decided we had to leave the hotel which was a first ever for our family.    When we tried to check out, the front desk got aggressive and told us we would be charged for an early departure fee even though we didn’t stay the night.  Again we asked to speak to the manager and they said he left for the day and was not taking any phone calls even though the front desk agent kept going to the back office to talk to him by phone.  The front desk agent informed me after speaking with the unavailable manager that any issues with billing needed to be addressed with the manager, again who left for the day and would not take our call. Whoever heard of a major hotel chain not having a manager on site?!? If that’s the case, they clearly do not caring how the hotel is being run or if a customer was checking out because of numerous issues.  We ended up being charge $420+ for a ‘leaving early cancellation fee’. Absolutely ridiculous. Avoid at all cost if you value sleep and safety. THIS PLACE IS REALLY BAD!

title: Excellent service
text: Our expirience in this hotel was the best. Thanks Felix, Lizbeth the front desk and the room service personnel. We value your service. Rooms were clean, warm lobby and the breakfast always right. Thanks

title: A sentirse como en casa en un Excelente hotel, con personal muy cordial
text: Excelente ubicación, hotel cómodo completo y muy bien cuidado, cumpliendo con todos los protocolos sanitarios. Excelente  atención, en especial del Sr. PEDRO  y FELIX,  personal de mantenimiento. También muy cálidas y cordiales las srtas. ANA y AMANDA, a  quienes destaco en su función de atención al cliente. También conocí al General Manager -no recuerdo el nombre- y  me sorprendió su sencillez y cordialidad. Es muy genial que cuenten con personal bilingüe y mucho mejor, si se destacan por su amabilidad. VOLVERE SIN DUDAR Y RECOMIENDO 100%

title: Da urlo
text:
Un viaggio a N.Y con la famiglia, resa ancora più piacevole nel rientro in albergo, con la possiibilitá di sedersi nella sala bevendo un buon tee oppure un buon caffé americano, a chi piace chiaramente! 
Poi mettersi a letto ed avere un comodo materasso, che aiuta il sonno! Poi la mattina potersi fare un tee in camera era un vero toccasana!

title: Buen hotel. La ubicación no es muy buena, son cuadras feas.
text: Todo bien, salvo algún inconveniente en el desayuno y deben explicar cómo es el nuevo sistema de limpieza de las habitaciones.muy bueno el café y el té libre en todo horario. La habitación y el baño son grandes.

title: MEJOR, IMPOSIBLE
text:
Mi esposa, hija y yo, nos quedamos en el  Homewood Midtown durante 28 noches.
Excelente servicio desde la llegada por Amanda.
Nos atendieron nuestra necesidades con rapidez
El servicio en el restaurante espectacular, sobre todo Lizbeth y Félix.
El desayuno muy sabroso
El servicio por parte de housekeeping buenísimo.
Muy recomendable.
La ubicación excelente.
Muy cerca de Hudson Yards y Times Square
Muy cerca de lo mejor de Broadway

EL MEJOR HOTEL EN EL QUE ME HE HOSPEDADO EN MIDTOWN, NYC, NY

title: Anniversary trip
text: Located very close to Times Square.  We flew into NY to celebrate our 30th anniversary and the staff made it extra special by gifting us wine, sparkling water, and chocolates.  It was more than we ever expected!  The room was clean and comfortable.  The gym was spacious with numerous machines and free weights.  The morning breakfast was very good.  I would stay here again.

title: Homewood suites by Hilton midtown Manhattan
text: Conveniently located. Streets Felt a little iffy outside, but ultimately were not. Room was fairly clean, except for the laminate wood which seem to be a little dirty when you walk with your socks on. But the rest of the room was clean and tidy. Breakfast was as you would imagine for serving that large amount of people. But was pretty good. Staff are really great.

title: Good location and great Hotel!
text: The room was clean, and we had a small kitchen which was a plus. The Breakfast menu was different everyday and for people with food allergies, it had written what was in it, they kept it simple so it was good. The people working in the breakfast room were extremely nice and kept everything tidy. The location was great, close to a train station and main touristic places. All was clean, and they had tea and coffee available, which was great.

title: Decent hotel
text: The hotel is at a great location in Midtown. The reviews about homeless people outside the hotel and marijuana smell are spot on. For proximity to good metro lines and Times Square it is good. The rooms are decent sized and the shower has good water pressure. The breakfast has a huge variety and there is coffee and tea available 24/7. The room could have been a bit cleaner as there were hairs in the drawers which made it feel slightly grimy.  I would recommend this for location but, if walking past homeless people to get into your hotel is a problem for you -you might want to look elsewhere.

title: Excelente hotel
text: Muy bien ubicado, muy cerca a la estación penn stacion, buen desayuno, habitaciones cómodas, los ayudantes de desayuno Lizbeth, Félix y Azsa, son muy amables en la atención, recomendadisimo.  Variedad de frutas que puedes llevar, muy cerca de los sitios turísticos de Manhattan, puedes ir caminando o en tren !!!

title: Excelente hotel
text:
Una muy buena ubicación, el hotel tiene desayuno, el cual es balanceado y muy nutritivo y la atención de los ayudantes Lizbeth, felix y azsa es muy buena. Aparte de lo anterior las habitaciones son muy cómodas y el servicio en general es excelente.

Hotel 100% recomendado

title: Five star
text: ‘Home’wood is not an exaggeration this is going to feel like home. My partner liked it so much and were treated so well, the only hard part was leaving - even this was made easy by the  accommodations the staff provided; they watched our bags for the whole day until we left town, we were able to walk up to central park without our luggage and spent a great day taking in all the sights before getting on a late flight. Highly recommended, we can’t wait to come back!

title: Recomendable
text: Hotel que tiene algunos detalles para mejorar pero al que volvería y lo recomiendo. Tiene buena ubicación y todo funciona bien. Para destacar la amabilidad del Sr Felix en el desayuno, siempre atento, al igual que la Sra Lizbeth.

title: Great Breakfast by Felix! Great Suites, and had a Balcony in the City.
text: Great Breakfast by Felix! Great Suites, and had a Balcony in the City. The next time we are in the city, this is where we will be staying. Close to Times Square & Madison Square Garden. Once you get settled in at this hotel, it will not disappoint.

title: Excellent Stay in the Heart of Manhattan!
text: Stayed for a long weekend with my son. The location is excellent, basically half-way between Penn Station and Broadway. It’s a beautiful, clean property. We love the room. I should emphasize all rooms have a fully functioning kitchenette. We upgraded from a normal studio to a one-bedroom, and we feel like we were the King of NY.  We also love the 2nd floor view of the street. In the post-covid era, this is one of the best breakfast buffets I've seen, and the 24-hour coffee/tea is most appreciated. There are two individuals who deserve special recognition. We have some special needs, and Miguel went way above and beyond to meet and exceed our expectations there. On our last day, we had some travel complications, and Samir came to our rescue.

title: Great value!
text: For being on the cheapest side of commercial Manhattan hotels, this property is great. After all taxes/fees, we avg $265/night for an upgraded “clean air” room which I did think the air was cleaner than your avg hotel room, basic but nice staff, large rooms (for NYC), good gym, on-site laundry ($7 per load), free breakfast, kitchens in room, free wifi, free snacks/water ($15/day), I think this is a great value and I would certainly stay here again. The main guy who works overnight front desk was really helpful and professional (I wish I would have written down his name to offer my thanks!) and the rest of the staff was fine, but didn’t stand out. Location we thought was great…a lot of reviews talk about homeless/drug addicts nearby, this is accurate, but we saw the same thing in numerous blocks throughout Manhattan and we’re not actually bothered, except a bit sad, same in every city. We also booked through the Marriott app, and was able to use the app for picking our room/checking in, and unlock our door, which was very helpful as we arrived after midnight!

title: EXCELENTE HOTEL!!!
text: Excelente hotel, volvería mil veces! Impecable, la mejor atención, la habitación linda y súper cómoda, la terraza espectacular, muy céntrico y fácil acceso al metro. A un paso de Times Square y del Madison Square Garden. La atención de Félix y Lisbeth en el comedor es la mejor! Muy atentos y cordiales con todos los huéspedes, siempre tan  amables!!! Sus desayunos son sustanciosos, variados y ricos. Lo recomiendo con los ojos cerrados.

title: Pleasant Stay at Homewood Suites
text: The hotel has a great location. The check Inn was very quick and the staff is very friendly and provide service. Breakfast is included with your stay and have a good variety. Felix and Lizbeth are the friendly Staff for the breakfast area and they are constantly making sure everything is clean and the food trays are full.

title: Muy buen hotel!
text:
Excelente servicio y super amable todos los empleados, especialmente feliz Lizbeth, siempre dispuestos a ayudarte!!!
Muy variado el desayuno y rico!! 
El hotel y las habitaciones súper limpio en todo momento!!!!

title: Excelente hotel
text: No tengo nada malo para decir. Tanto las habitaciones como el desayuno y las instalaciones en general superaron nuestras expectativas. Quiero destacar el servicio y la amabilidad de Felix Lizbeth. Volvería sin duda

title: What a wonderful stay thanks to an awesome staff like Lizbeth and Azsa.
text:
Let me get the bad out of the way first…
The room was not ready at check in had to wait for for a half an hour, no biggie. 
The elevators had a key card security scanner that didn’t read the cards too easily so it was a bit of a pain, no biggie. 
The pillows were comfortable but the mattress was a bit too hard and not at all comfortable for me due to back problems, so that was a big one for me because I did not sleep well. 
Now for the things that made this hotel awesome…
Let me start with the staff, friendly & courteous is an understatement. 
The rooms were beyond expectation. They were modern and clean and had everything you would need to cook a meal for 4. Nice large fridge and microwave, and even a dishwasher. A large flatscreen TV on an articulating wall bracket was a nice touch.
The 22nd floor terrace had 2 seating areas and decent views of the city.
Now Breakfast time!!
Lizbeth was soooo sweet and attentive with so many people that I have to give her credit. She showed a lot a patience even when I thought I might not have. My wife had not had potassium in at least 3 days so I asked Lizbeth for a banana after breakfast hours and she got it for me in seconds. I asked her for her name and the chefs name because I had to leave a nice review for her..
Chef Azsa made this egg, potato, onion and cheese soufflé that was out of this world. Coming from an oatmeal snob, the oatmeal was absolutely perfect.
Parking garages in the area is a bit high but this hotel makes it all worthwhile and a lot is made possible by it’s above average staff. Thank you for a memorable stay.

title: Muy buena experiencia
text: Lo mejor fue el servicio, la amabilidad de Felix, Lisbeth y Asza nos hizo sentir muy cómodos en todo mometo. El hotel muy bien ubicado my cerca a todo. El desayuno aunque no cambia mucho dia a dia es relativamente variado

title: Hotel de alta calidad
text: Servicio excelente desde la llegada de parte de Giovanni con la ayuda para el check-in ,  Felix fue muy atento y amable en el salon  de desayuno, la comida excelente y variada. La habitación muy cómodo con una excelente vista, la limpieza del hotel totalmente impecable.

title: Excellent hotel, great location!!
text: This hotel is nice and clean, the staff is friendly and helpful. Even better, it’s in a perfect location. Walking distance to all the highlights and plenty of subway stops for anything too far to walk. (Downtown) The full breakfast has great choices and makes for a great alternative for those trying to watch food costs.  Highly recommend staying at this hotel for any trip to the city!

title: Homewood Buffet Service
text: Felix and Lizbeth were our waiters at the breakfast buffet and they were very kind and alert. They came and greeted us, took our plates, asked about the food and if we liked it. Overall great service and would come back again

title: Homewood suites NYC Midtown Manhattan
text: Great service especially from Felix Lisbeth. The food was great and very clean. The hotel staff was very friendly, the rooms are clean, the hot water runs great and its very centric so you can get anywhere fast.

title: Great breakfast!
text: Felix Lizbeth did an amazing job preparing breakfast for the guests. For only two people working to make breakfast for so many people, they did an amazing job! Felix was also very helpful with the guests as well, gathering their plates and keeping the dining hall tidy.

title: Way overpriced. Smallest hotel room ever.  Lots of homeless outside.
text: Picked this hotel because of generally good experiences at Homewood. But this one was awful. Smallest room of any hotel ever — and I’ve stayed at hundreds. Two people couldn’t even sit in the room. Only 1 chair and no room to squeeze in another. 1 of us had to sit on the webbed luggage rack. And 5-8 homeless people were permanently camped outside just 30’ from the entrance. Way, way overpriced.

title: Worked for our needs
text: Friendly staff. Options for breakfast. Coffee/hot chocolate in the lobby. Full sized fridge is rare in NYC and that was awesome! The only real negative was how uncomfortable the bed was-seemed very old like a motel 6 bed. But after being so exhausted each night it did us just fine.

title: Surprisingly great.  Excellent front desk staff
text: Just had a wonderful Hilton experience at the Homewood Suites Times Square on West 37th Street in NYC. Wait, what?  Wonderful and Homewood and NYC in the same sentence?  Yes. *** Due to some safety issues, I had to vacate my 92 year old mom from her NYC apartment and find us two adjoining rooms for a few nights.  I needed kitchenettes, comfort, clean and easy.  Called the Hilton Diamond Desk and they found us this property. But they went one better and called the Manager to ask him to preblock adjoining rooms. When I arrived, the Front Desk said no way. I asked them to check the notes and BOOM there it was - two adjoining rooms blocked off. “You hit the jackpot”, the Front Desk said.  Rooms were spotless and super quiet.  Perfect kitchenette, great bathroom and fluffy towels. Didn’t avail ourselves of the breakfast but it smelled good.  Everything you could want within a block radius — Italian breakfast/lunch place, 7-11, Dunkin Donuts, Hasidic barber, a ping pong studio across the street and blocks from both Times Square and Penn Station. A special shout out to Idris and team at the front desk.

title: Homewood Suites Mid town NYC better than expected
text: Big room,very quiet full kitchen in room with dishes, big refrigerator and microwave.  Fresh towels and amenities daily on request.  Walkable to a lot of what NYC has to offer. Free breakfast and coffee tea and hot chocolate available all day

title: Quick trip to NYC
text:
I want to congratulate the breakfast staff at the hotel for their quick and super friendly work, especially Felix, who went out of his way to help us!  Thanks!!
Our stay was very nice and fulfilled all our expectations for a 3 day weekend in NYC.

title: servicio 100%
text: Nos gustó muchísimo este hotel!! tiene todo lo que se necesita para una estadía placentera. Todas sus instalaciones son muy confortables y me encantó la terraza del piso 22 . El personal muy servicial y amable....sobre todo Felix Lizbeth. En todo momento fueron atentos con nosotros.  Sin duda volvería a este hotel.

title: Great hotel for families
text:
It was an excellent experience at the hotel. Delicious breakfast everyday. Installations are nice and good level of cleaning.
Felix was very kind at the restaurant, also Idrius in the front desk. Great attention from the personnel in charge.

title: Great Staff & Large Room
text: What a surprise! The room was super clean and the view was great for the location of the hotel. The staff all had smiles which made check in and my stay even lovelier.  I will absolutely come back and stay here in my return visits to NYC

title: Great stay so far and nice breakfast experience
text: I've been staying in this hotel for four days now and I am impressed with the breakfast service. Especially with Felix. He has been very helpful and nice. Sometimes small things like that can make someone's day.

title: Wonderful Stay In NYC
text: From the moment we checked in to the moment we checked out it was wonderful, we couldn’t have asked for more. The staff was friendly and helpful, not only for us but for everyone as we saw them assisting others in directions, recommendations and much more. The dining area was clean and the food was good – thanks to Felix, Lizbeth and Azsa. The hotel and room were clean and the bed was comfortable. The laundry room was so convenient. Thank you for providing such a wonderful experience/stay.

title: Great weekend trip to NYC
text: We had a great time staying at Homewood Suites by Hilton. The staff was really kind and helpful. Kudos to Felix Azsa, who constantly checked in with us, making sure we were doing great. Highly recommended place.

title: Experiencia
text: ¡Excelente Hotel! Personal muy amable y atentos.  La habitación es moderna, amplia, cama cómoda y limpia. Desayuno rico y variado.   Muy buena localización, restaurantes y tiendas cerca. Servicio de calidad

title: Exellent hotel and service. Kitchen personal excellent
text: Very pleased. Will stay again. Very centric and great experience. Very clean and all things were in order. Great views. Close eating restaurants and fast foods. Close to Times Square. Very unique experience

title: Give it an 8 while seeing the Broadway show Six
text: Nice room efficiency; front desk got us into a room even though initially looked to be a 2 hour wait- maybe Diamond level helped.  The breakfast was  very good ; in particular the team of Felix, Azusa and Lizbeth everything clean and well stocked - really took pride in their work and the results were very good.  Bravo 👏!

title: NYC Trip
text: Pedro was absolutely wonderful, every morning in which we encountered him.  He always greeted us with a smile and asked if there was anything that he could do for us. Now, every time we are down around the lobby, we look for Pedro, even if it is just to say "Hi"!

title: Beyond Excellent
text:
The staff at this hotel are very pleasant and professional. I would like to shine a light on Lizabeth ,Felix , and  Ana for their exceptional ability to handle the kitchen duties with a smile each. 

Lizabeth is a full force dedicated working person who takes on duties with speed and consistent effort.  Watching the kitchen employees go the extra mile each day to ensure that guest are pleased puts a smile on my face.  

Thank you Lizbeth, Felix, and all the entire team.  I truly appreciate you all.

title: Breakfast
text: Lizbeth and Azsa were a treat for breakfast! Lizbeth hooked me up with some great variety of fruit (which I NEVER get when I travel) and related to my light breakfast needs! Azsa’s breakfast reminded me of home! Thanks y’all!

title: Fall Break 2021
text: Great place to stay.  Close to Times Square, MSG, Empire State Building.  Clean and friendly staff.  Felix Lizbeth made sure our complimentary breakfast was perfect every morning of our visit.  Tip- Grab some 2 Bros Pizza at the corner of 38th and enjoy on the rooftop of the hotel in the evening.

title: Ricos desayunos
text:
Awesome breakfasts everyday.
Different menus as well.
Great experience to enjoy with family, or couple or friends.
I’ll come back for sure. Nice rooftop with city ski line.
Makes NYC experience more enjoyable.

title: Feels More Like Home... Than My Own Home
text:
My mother and I stayed here while transitioning from one apartment to another. This hotel has a beautiful, welcoming and pleasant lobby. However, I need to shoutout 4 people who made us feel like family.

Omy: at the front desk. Speaks perfect Spanish/English. Is the main reason we decided to stay not just one week but three weeks. Every single request ( and my mom had plenty!) he was so attentive, answered the phone every time, solved all kinds of issues on our end. Without Omar, this place doesn't run the same.

Felix: Our point person during breakfast. This hotel includes free breakfast. When Felix is not working, you can tell. When Felix works, nothing runs out. He always has a smile on his face! Cleans up after us without asking. We enjoy heading to breakfast when Felix is working. Thank you!

Lenny at Housekeeping: We brought our pet with us so we needed assistance with cleaning the room. You can tell Lenny knows what she is doing! Is so attentive to make sure our room is clean when we ask her to send someone. The level of talent in this hotel and HOSPITALITY amazes me.
Pedro: Thank you Pedro for always answering our questions! Pedro is always so attentive to any request we might need. Every time we see him he makes sure to ask if we need anything in the room. 

In conclusion, don't think twice about coming here. The location is perfect to get anywhere you want and right in Times Square! The hospitality is wonderful, and you can't beat the free breakfast.

title: Great location to stay in NYC
text:
Central location. The customer service at Homewood Suites NYC Midtown Manhattan is superior. Idris, Henry, and Samir greeted us upon our arrival and helped us several times throughout our 4 night stay. I was able to check in earlier than anticipated. After a long flight and lugging our luggage through Manhattan, I could have just hugged each of them for getting us our room to relax for a bit before hitting the sights!

A free breakfast is always appreciated. Felix, Lizbeth, and Ana were great hostesses. Anytime we were done, they cleared the plates and always provided assistance with getting us condiments, etc. 

Beds were comfy, room was large, and the fitness center has a lot of options and is large. The upper floor patio available to all is a quiet oasis from the busy street below. 

Would stay here again.

title: Love it!
text:
I love this hotel and that they accept dogs! anda our rooms had a small kitchen, so you can cook sometimes. Also the people there are so nice, especially Felix and Lizbeth.

Thanks for making our stay more pleasant.

title: Nice hotel with good breakfast and helpful staff!
text: Nice and clean hotel in Midtown with very convenient location.  Close to Times Square and several Subway stops. Great service from staff.  Very good breakfast with hot food options, cereal, bread and fruit.  Super helpful and customer friendly staff at the breakfast area.

title: Convenient Location. Comfortable stay.
text: Great comfortable stay. Fresh breakfast early in the morning is awesome! Thanks to Our server Lizbeth and cook Azsa for accommodating breakfast before we left. Great people awesome service. The overall experience was very good. Perfect location for everything.

title: Nice and Clean.  Super Staff
text: Nice location in the middle of Manhattan.  Subway was close and easy to get to Battery Park and Central Park. In minutes.  Nice restaurant around the corner.  Shops near for shopping.  Nice security on hotel.

title: Desayuno
text:
Un encanto Lizbeth, quien atiende en el desayuno. Muy atenta y dispuesta a ayudarte con todo, se encargo de que no nos falte nada y cumplir con todos nuestros deseos. 
El desayuno increíble, la cocinera Azsa hace los mejores muffins de banana y limón con amapolas. Muy agradecidas con ellas por su amabilidad y predisposición.

title: Muy buen hotel y pet friendy
text: Me encató que el hotel acepta mascotas y que teníamos en nuestra habitación una pequeña cocina. Además, el personal del hotel fue muy atento, en especial Felix y Lizbeth. El hotel en general esta muy limpio.

title: Feel like home.
text: Comfortable, safe and clean. All staff really friendly and helpful. If you have anything, just let them know they will try to fix. This hotel serves complimentary breakfast. It provides hot food, bread, etc. See you again next time.

title: Great stay
text: We stayed in a double room suite with a small kitchen. This hotel is located in a safe area. You can walk to Empire State Building from here. Very close to restaurants. There’s a 711 nearby for small items needed too. The room was clean and spacious. Staff was very helpful everyday of the stay. They did things promptly and cheerfully.

title: Feels like home
text:
Thank you Idris, Henry and NYC Hilton staff for a wonderful and relaxing stay. Lobby, rooms and gym are clean and cozy. The guest room windows keep all the loud noise of this wonderful city outside and the room quiet and relaxing.

It was also refreshing to visit the 22nd floor roof terrace was privet and clean with many sitting options.

My Florida family will definitely stay here next NYC trip.

title: Visita
text: La atención en el lugar desde que llegamos fue muy buena, el Sr. Samir nos explico todo sobre el funcionamiento de las áreas y sus amenidades. Las instalaciones están muy buen cuidadas y la suite que nos toco es bien espaciosa. Tiene su sala, kitchenette, habitación y baño.

title: Una semana con la familia
text: Excelente recepción. Agradezco a nuestros amigos Idris, Ana y Samir que nos recibieron de manera excelente, nos dieron las indicaciones en inglés y español y nos aconsejaron los pasos para tener una grata estadía.

title: Estadía en familia
text: Los jóvenes de la cocina , Feliz , Azsa y Ana , fabulosos al igual que un Sr. No recuerdo el nombre que mantiene desinfectando las áreas comunes,  al igual que un Sr. En la recepción dominicano , excelente trato y atención,  han hecho la estancia placentera , a todo momento las dudas sobre la ciudad que hemos tenido han sido amables y colaboradores , pueden contar con ellos , amablemente seguros serán atendidos , si son de habla hispana mucho más

title: Excelente , 100 % recomendable
text:
Excelente Hotel, la disposicion del personal excelente , gracias Ana, Jeferson, Asza , Felix, muy amables y nos ayudaron con todo, Felicitaciones.
Buenos desayunos 
Todo muy bien, lo recomiendo 100 % , muy buena atencion en especial Ana.

title: Too Business-Like for the Times
text: We arrived at the Hotel at about 2pm completely exhausted. We were hoping to get a room before the Check.in time of 4pm.
