The gentleman at the reception told us politely in a distant tone that we had to wait till 4pm, but was gracious enough to put my food items that required refrigeration into the freezer. At about 10 minutes to 4pm  and asked if our room was ready and he said yes. Was wondering why he had to wait for us to ask. He could have just beckoned on us  especially when he knew we were keen to get into the room as early as possible.  Overall, the staff are extremely polite and helpful, but need to make guests a lot morn welcome by looking less stern

title: Opinión de Ana , assa, Jefferson y felix
text: Muy buen servicio, buena disposición, muy amables, te atienden siempre, estaban siempre al tanto de tus necesidades, cualquier duda ellos te ayudaban , Ana nos ayudo mucho, en resumen muy buen servicio.

title: Uncomfortable and sketchy location
text: our family experience was overall not good.  The elevators are awful, the check in process was behind schedule, the location of the hotel seemed sketchy, and the noise on our floor paired with the worst hotel bed led to some awful sleep.

title: More comfortable than my own apartment
text: From the moment I booked my reservation, I was treated with outstanding customer service and even being in a busy city such as Manhattan, the response time was astonishing. I have to shout out Samir at the front desk who really was my go to person during my stay. Through the Hilton app and in person, he was not only extremely helpful but quick, knowledgeable, and always professional. The entire staff was a true example of divine customer service, attending to multiple guests at once while always remaining professional. The hotel was updated, extremely clean, and the facilities were all top notch. This hotel is a gem in such a crazy city. Will definitely be staying here again.

title: Buen desayuno y servicio
text: El desayuno muy delicioso, el personal muy atento a ayudarte a cualquier inquietud y siempre esta impecable el lugar cuando llegas al lobby o la zona de comida. En general todo ha sido muy bueno.Muy recomendado.

title: Excellent staff
text: The staff at the hotel was great. Samir at reception provided a legitimate 5 start service. Additionally, Oliver and Felix were kind, very professional and ensured that all requests were taken care of in a very efficient way.

title: Great hotel
text: Great hotel very near the center of Manhattan. Walking distance from subway and time's square. Comfy rooms, great breakfast and great staff. Omar, Lizbeth, Jefferson and Ana where especially helpful. Will come again.

title: Great Service
text: The breakfast was great everything is clean and organized and Jefferson was very pleasant and very helpful.my room was clean the bed was comfortable and close to time square, Madison Square garden, and any where you wanna visit. Best hotel I’ve stayed at by far!!!!!

title: Saw a roach
text: My second night at this hotel I saw a roach in the kitchen area. They moved me to another room which was no better, the only difference was that I didn't see a roach. The area is horrible. Drug addicts and homeless people. As a woman, I didn't feel safe to walk around that area at night alone. I would never stay at this hotel again!

title: Great hotel, loved the service
text: Very good relationship quality price. Located near metro stations and Time Square. Super clean which is my no 1 priority, thank you Adelina for the impecable housekeeping. Very good breakfast too and very nice staff, thank you also to Felix, Lizbeth, Ana and Azsa who served us so politely:) Well sure come back to Homewood in our next visit to the great apple

title: Very nice, excelent location.
text:
Very good rooms, complete kitchen. Very complete breakfast. Super nice and kind staff. Excelente cleaning from Adeline AND service from Felix. 
Just you need to askw reception for complete cleaning every 3 days, otherwise theyw dont do it. 
Thanks a lot!!

title: Horrible Customer Service
text: This hotel screwed up our reservation and did not care.  We were given a different story every day of our stay and finally told it was our fault for changing our reservation a week before our stay.  As a result of their incompetence, my 20 yr old son had to spend four nights on the absolute worst sofa “bed” I have ever seen.   Nick, who is apparently their Director of Operations was rude and unprofessional.  In all my years as a Hilton Honors member I have never encountered such treatment.  We travel frequently and are pretty easy going with our accommodations and this Hilton stay was beyond disappointing.    The homeless people smoking pot just outside the doors did not help either.

title: Dobry nocleg dla odwiedzających
text: Hotel umiejscowiony niedaleko dworca Penn Station idealnie pasuje dla osób, którzy chcą spędzić kilka dni i eksplorować NYC. Miła szybka obsługa. Check-in trwał mniej niż 10 minut. Check out trwał mniej niż minutę. Taras na najwyżym piętrze jest dobrym miejscem do relaksu wieczorem. Śniadanie z dobrym wyborem dań ciepłych oraz bajgle, ciasta i mufinki. Możliwość jedzenia na powietrzu na dziedzińcu hotelu. Polecam pokoje na wyższych piętrach, wtedy nie słychać szumu ulicznego. W pobliżu liczne restauracje. Za rogiem sklep 7-Eleven dla uzupełnienia zapasów. Polecam dla rodzin typu 2+1 lub 2+2

title: Meh- but free breakfast
text: This hotel was where it was advertised but the outside was a bit rougher than expected at night. However, we know the hotel can’t control homelessness in our country. What they can control, however- is the cleanliness of their bathrooms and towels- both of which had many hairs that were definitely and obviously not anyone in our family’s. This led us to be cautious about the cleanliness of the bedding and wondering about other supposed cleaning protocols. Overall- this was a fine stay for a later booking on our end. If you have more time, however, I’d recommend finding a stay further up towards Central Park or in the upper west or east side if you’re with children.

title: My go to hotel for NYC
text: Love this hotel - great location and rooms offer so much more than ordinary hotel room.  I make full use of the cooktop, microwave and refrigerator.  Brooklyn Fare market about a block west b/w 9th & 10th is a great place to pick up heat up meals.  Notice NYC Firefighters like to go there to pick up lunch.  All around solid choice for midtown and easy access to Penn Station.

title: Very good
text: Enjoyed big apple thanks to the location and quality at reasonable price. Of course with things getting more Normal many improvements will come by itself , but the prices will also go up..  perhaps the lower floors may have to be priced less as the guests gets comparatively poorer ambiance , we wish we could have got a higher floor to enjoy the stay

title: Home town review Oliver
text: The must stay at home was lovely I’m up-and-coming artist la Familia BlackRose you know I had  the best hospitality in a long time especially by my Oliver once again la Familia The BlackRose came to perform artist is killed Oliver killed it to.

title: Outstanding  service
text:
Great location near everything you want to see in NYC. Nice and quiet rooms. And best of all the staff. Lizbeth, Azsa, Felix and Ana will make you feel at home at breakfast 🍳 🥞 ☕️ 😊 
Our room was 1109. Nice cleaning service. Little kitchen we’re we could make sandwiches or cook simple meals. Bed is very comfortable (5/5) and in our case a sofa/bed that could be better (4/5). 
Gym is fine although if you want to run you can do it by the water and enjoy the city so I just used two times y a ten nights stay. Not a big fun of gyms, right? Terrace is cool (4/5).

title: No hot breakfast
text: Hot breakfast isn’t available until 8am- went with family at 6:30am, only cold cereal and bread products.  Very disappointed stayed one night with my wife and 3 young kids for the funeral on my father in-law.  We decided to stay based on the value which included hot breakfast, as stated on the website and verified by a call placed to the hotel.  We went to get breakfast at 6:30am, and there was no hot breakfast. I asked someone at the front desk, and I was informed that it isn’t ready until 8am. We were forced to go to McDonalds, very disappointed!

title: Great Stay !
text: Wanted to give a shout out to the staff at Homewood suites for making our 2 week stay pleasurable. We chose this hotel as we wanted to be at a great location, as well as wanting a kitchenette with a microwave, refrigerator and laundry.  There are very few in New York to begin with. It’s a very clean hotel that serves up a generous breakfast. The lobby and outdoor seating areas are plentiful. There is plenty of attention to immaculate house keeping thanks to Lenny and her staff. The hotel is constantly cleaned including the pavement that is powerwashed frequently.  I would definitely staying here in the future and would strongly recommend this place to anyone looking for a comfortable stay

title: What you would expect from a Hilton hotel
text: Outstanding location in Mid-Manhatten with the type of service you would expect from a Hilton hotel. Front desk personnel, Samir and Idris, will definitely take care of your concerns. Restaurants, subways and Amtrak station all within walking distance.  Free breakfast included! Hot coffee and tea available for free throughout the day.  What more can you ask for?

title: Family trip
text: I was very happy with my stay there and room was clean I was happy with the complementary breakfast location for my family was good also stores in walking distance and also time square also walking 14 minutes

title: Amazing!!! 2021
text: First of all my stay for 5 weeks and 2 days have been amazing my suite became my own in every way. I felt like a Queen. The following staff as gone above and beyond and i hope they are treated with respect and showed appreciation on a regular basis in action.  The following are Junior-Engineer, Samir Hossein, Pedro Olivarez, Omar Cedeny, Audreen Corbin, Idrissa Idra, Mulanza-Housekeeping. They all made my stay enjoyable with their great! service they each specialize in. They were always professional, courteous, smiling, helpful. I always felt good around these individuals helped and respected. They are all very talented and can rise to greater levels in leadership. You are very blessed to have them working at Homewood Suites Ms. Brenda333

title: Best central hotel EVER + amazing customer service!!!
text: My mom and I planned a 4 day daughter and mother trip to nyc! She hasn’t been to New York since 2002 and had never really explored nyc. This hotel not only is it located in the best spot but the service here is top notch. Plus break fast included? Say whaaaaaat? During breakfast Felix and Ana always said good morning and we’re so attentive to make sure everyone had what they wanted/needed for breakfast. The front desk provided all information needed to get around the hotel and make sure if we needed anything in our room to let them know. We received clean towels everyday. The hotel room was sparkling clean and such an amazing layout. If you are coming for more than 4 days the room includes everything you need to cook a nice meal to save some money. Overall our stay was really unforgettable and we will def be coming back!!

title: Visit
text: Felix helped us a lot and made sure we had a nice time. Thank you! Our room was also clean and the people at the front desk were helpful. We stayed here for four days and the staff gave us good advice. This hotel is close to most everything we were interested in visiting.

title: Sagittarius Zaharya
text: I enjoyed a Very Tasty complimentary breakfast prepared by Azsa ! I enjoyed the potato wedges, scrambled eggs and coffee. The workout room was clean and open 24/7. The location was also great, it was easy to get around

title: The hotel was very nice, we felt welcomed, safe and very comfortable!
text: We had a nice time in NY. Our niece got married in Little Italy. The hotel stay was very nice. We were not too far from anything we wanted to see. Within walking distance of most everything. Staff were all wonderful! I can't say enough about the staff. They made our stay very nice. But you all know you need umbrellas to give to your guests. We were there during a tropical storm. Power stayed on at the hotel. Nice and sound, we didn't even hear the storm.

title: Great food service in morning
text:
Great food service for breakfast. Thank you Lizbeth, Ana and Azsa! 

Also, rooms are clean and  elevators  are fast.  Convenient gym and laundry in basement.  Close walk to Times Square and subway. Better than another Hilton we stayed closer to time square.

title: Stay at Homewood Suites
text: Amazing people working here, very kind and helpful. The room was very clean and was perfect for a family. The staff were very kind and helpful when asking for something. Overall we had an amazing stay and would definitely stay again!!

title: Excellent Hotel and services
text:
First class attention , the staff with extreme kindness and helpful, Felix , Ana and Lisbeth are great ,t hey made us feel wonderfully. 

we would definitely return. to this hotel with a staff as good as that have

Vielkha and Alberto

title: Outstanding service and excellent staff
text: The Hilton Homewood Suites is by far one of the best hotels I have ever stayed in! The staff was so welcoming and warm. They were always available to help and made sure I had everything I needed for my room. The rooms were exceptionally clean and the complementary breakfast was absolutely delicious:) I will absolutely be staying there again and recommend it to anyone who wants to visit New York!!

title: Dirty room
text: Dirty room floor,  hair in bed broke blanket the smell in the room was disgusting we live the next morning to a different hotel because for 269 plus tax at night was a crappy night poor sleep. Breakfast was ok people in front desk was friendly

title: Horrible experience
text: The room was absolutely filthy. The floors, walls, light switches and electric sockets were nasty. The bathroom wasn’t cleaned. There was a weird splatter on the bathroom door. The kitchen sink smelled. The room had a weird odor.  The bed slept terribly. The bed was hard and the pillows flimsy. There was no blanket or comforter.  The refrigerator made loud noises. There was a weird light timer in the bathroom. The light went off and in throughout the night. The loud refrigerator combined with the hard bed and weird light timer made for a terrible sleeping experience. One of the ceiling fan blades hung low in disrepair.The ceiling looked like had been repaired, but not completely painted.   The room was overpriced for shockingly poor condition of the room. Overall bad experience

title: Home away from home
text: My family will come back to this location every time we visit NYC. It’s very close to Penn Station, and not too far from Grand Central, so we could get there easily. Every member of the staff was kind, and the room was comfortable and clean, and very roomy for the city.

title: Ideal para ir en familia
text:
Habitaciones equipadas con anafe eléctrico, microondas, cocina, lavavajillas.
El desayuno es muy bueno. Quiero destacar a parte del staff que fue muy atento con nosotros: Felix, Ana y Azsa.
La relación precio calidad es de lo mejor que vimos. Somos 6 personas y nos hospedamos en dos habitaciones.

title: Manhattan vacation
text: We have stayed at Homewood Suites 7 nights. We loved the location of the hotel and a complimentary breakfast. However the servers in the breakfast area were not very friendly and often borderline rude.
